analyzed: snying po brten zhing khong stong med //

original: mi chos mi phyed mtshan nyid can //
analyzed: mi chos mi phyed mtshan nyid can //
translated: having the characteristic of not being divided by human dharmas,

original: mi tshig ba dang mi nyams pa'o //
analyzed: mi tshig ba dang mi nyams pa'o //
translated: not being destroyed or impaired.

original: stong pa nyid ni rdo rjer brjod //
analyzed: stong pa nyid ni rdo rjer brjod //
translated: Emptiness is called vajra.

original: ces gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: ces gsungs pa yin no //
translated: This is what is said.

original: sems dpa' srid pa gsum gcig pa //
analyzed: sems dpa' srid pa gsum gcig pa //
translated: The being is the unity of the three existences.

original: zhes bya ba gsungs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs pa la /
translated: Thus it is said.

original: yod pa'i srid pa ni sems dpa' ste /
analyzed: yod pa'i srid pa ni sems dpa' ste /
translated: The existent existence is the being,

original: rkyen nyid 'di ba'i mtshan nyid can don bya ba nyid de phung po lnga'i bdag nyid can no //
analyzed: rkyen nyid 'di ba'i mtshan nyid can don bya ba nyid de phung po lnga'i bdag nyid can no //
translated: having the characteristic of being conditioned, having the nature of the five aggregates.

original: de yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze thams cad ces bya ba ni phung po lnga'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze thams cad ces bya ba ni phung po lnga'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: And that was said by the Blessed One in the Brahmana Sarva: The five aggregates are all.

original: de ni srid pa gsum ste lus dang ngag dang yid do //
analyzed: de ni srid pa gsum ste lus dang ngag dang yid do //
translated: That is the three existences, body, speech, and mind.

original: de dag gcig nyid du gyur pa ni //
analyzed: de dag gcig nyid du gyur pa ni //
translated: Their unity is

original: gnyis kyi dngos pi med pa ste //
analyzed: gnyis kyi dngos pi med pa ste //
translated: the non-existence of the duality.

original: 'do gsal ba'i mthar thugs par gyur ba'i phyir /
analyzed: 'do gsal ba'i mthar thugs par gyur ba'i phyir /
translated: Because of the attainment of the end of the light of the world.

original: shes rab rigs pa 'di nyid ni //
analyzed: shes rab rigs pa 'di nyid ni //
translated: This very reasoning of wisdom

original: zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang dbu ma'i dpyad pa 'di nyid do / rdo rje sems dpa' zhes byar brjod //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang dbu ma'i dpyad pa 'di nyid do / rdo rje sems dpa' zhes byar brjod //
translated: is called Vajrasattva.

original: ces bya ba ni chos kyi sku'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni chos kyi sku'o //

original: ye shes chen po'i ros zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: ye shes chen po'i ros zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /

original: ye shes chen po ni theg pa chen po phul du byung ba'i chos so //
analyzed: ye shes chen po ni theg pa chen po phul du byung ba'i chos so //
translated: The great intuition is the Dharma of the Mahayana.

original: de'i ro ni myong ba ste des gang ba'o //
analyzed: de'i ro ni myong ba ste des gang ba'o //
translated: The taste of that is the experience of it, and it is filled with that.

original: 'di skad bstan par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di skad bstan par 'gyur te /
translated: This is the explanation:

original: mchog tu 'bar ba'i rin po che sna tshogs kyis rab tu spras pa'i gzhal yas khang gi nang na shin tu rnam par dag pa'i mtshan dang dpe byad kyis rnam par mdzes pa'i sku dpag tu med pa'i rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs dang lhan cig bsdu ba dang spros
analyzed: mchog tu 'bar ba'i rin po che sna tshogs kyis rab tu spras pa'i gzhal yas khang gi nang na shin tu rnam par dag pa'i mtshan dang dpe byad kyis rnam par mdzes pa'i sku dpag tu med pa'i rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs dang lhan cig bsdu ba dang spros
translated: Within the immeasurable palace adorned with blazing various jewels, the yoginis' assembly with immeasurable bodies beautiful with the completely pure signs and indications gather and emanate the five light rays of compassion.üîΩ

original: pa'i tshul gyi rang bzhin gyis bde ba chen po'i ros ngoms shing 'khor ba ji srid kyi bar du 'pho ba med pa'i rtag par gyur pas rtag ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: pa'i tshul gyi rang bzhin gyis bde ba chen po'i ros ngoms shing 'khor ba ji srid kyi bar du 'pho ba med pa'i rtag par gyur pas rtag ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúpermanent‚Äù is that the great being, together with a host of yoginis, is satisfied by the taste of the great bliss of the nature of the mode of gathering and emanating immeasurable bodies, which are beautiful with the completely pure signs and features, in the inner celestial mansion that is completely adorned with various blazing jewels.

original: de lta bu'i sems dpa' chen po de ni sangs rgyas kyi longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de lta bu'i sems dpa' chen po de ni sangs rgyas kyi longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku zhes bya'o //
translated: That great being is called the ‚Äúenjoyment body of the buddhas.‚Äù

original: rtag tu zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sbyor bas kun du 'gro ba'i phyir dam tshigs ste /
analyzed: rtag tu zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sbyor bas kun du 'gro ba'i phyir dam tshigs ste /
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúcommitment‚Äù is that it is a commitment because it is omnipresent through the application of ‚Äúalways‚Äù and so on.

original: ci ltar rigs pa'i thabs kyis gdul bya sna tshogs la rnam pa sna tshogs kyi khams gsum du 'byung bar 'gyur bas dam tshig @4a * //
analyzed: ci ltar rigs pa'i thabs kyis gdul bya sna tshogs la rnam pa sna tshogs kyi khams gsum du 'byung bar 'gyur bas dam tshig @4a * //
translated: By means of whatever methods are appropriate, he will appear in the three realms in various forms for the sake of the various disciples.üîΩThus, he is the pledge being.

original: go ; / de la rtag tu 'jug par gyur pa nyid kyis na sems dpa' sta /
analyzed: go ; / de la rtag tu 'jug par gyur pa nyid kyis na sems dpa' sta /
translated: Since he is always engaged in that, he is the hero.

original: sangs rgyas rnams kyi sprul pa'i sku'i rigs dpag tu med pa ni dam tshigs sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i sgras brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams kyi sprul pa'i sku'i rigs dpag tu med pa ni dam tshigs sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i sgras brjod pa yin no //
translated: The infinite family of the emanation body of the buddhas is referred to by the term ‚Äúpledge being.‚Äù

original: rdo rje snying pos gsol ba zhes bya ba la don ci zhig gsol zhe na /üîΩbrtse ba'i rdo rje'i rdo rje 'chad nyid kyi rgyu'i ming gis gang mtshon pa'i don zhus pa ste /
analyzed: rdo rje snying pos gsol ba zhes bya ba la don ci zhig gsol zhe na / brtse ba'i rdo rje'i rdo rje 'chad nyid kyi rgyu'i ming gis gang mtshon pa'i don zhus pa ste /
translated: Vajragarbha asked, ‚ÄúWhat was requested?‚ÄùüîΩHe asked about the meaning indicated by the name of the cause of the vajra of love.

analyzed: dgyes pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba mtshan ma bsdus pa 'di lta bu zhes pa'o //
translated: He asked about the meaning of the name ‚ÄúHevajra,‚Äù which is a condensation of the name.

original: thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: ‚ÄúHaving the nature of method and wisdom‚Äù and so forth.

original: rgyud ces bya ba ni rgyun no //
analyzed: rgyud ces bya ba ni rgyun no //
translated: ‚ÄúTantra‚Äù means continuum.

original: de yang rnam pa gsum ste /
analyzed: de yang rnam pa gsum ste /

analyzed: rgyu'i rgyud dang 'bras bu'i rgyud dang thabs kyi rgyud do //

analyzed: de la 'dir rgyu ni rdo rje'i rigs can gyi sems can no //

original: yongs su rdzogs pa'i dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i gzugs ni 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: yongs su rdzogs pa'i dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i gzugs ni 'bras bu'o //

analyzed: thabs ni 'chad par 'gyur pa'i mtshan nyid can bya ba dang bcas pa'i lam mo //

analyzed: de dag so sor bshad par bzhed pas nyon cig ces bya bas thos pa la sbyor bar mdzod do //

original: ci de yang bstan pa tsam zhig gam zhe na /
analyzed: ci de yang bstan pa tsam zhig gam zhe na /

original: lta stangs dgug dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs ta /
analyzed: lta stangs dgug dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs ta /

original: ci rigs par zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: ci rigs par zhes bya ba ni /
translated: ‚ÄúAs appropriate‚Äù means

analyzed: lha'i le'ur gsungs pa'i dman pa dang 'bring dang mchog gi rim pas so //

analyzed: bskyed pa ni dbyings dang kha dog la sogs pa'o //

original: gnas ni rten no //
analyzed: gnas ni rten no //

analyzed: byed pa ni zla ba dang nyi ma dang sa bon dang phyag mtshan no //

analyzed: nus pa ni bzlas pa dang sgom pa mthar thug pa las rab tu skyes pa'o /

original: rnam shes ni slob dpon gyi las so //

analyzed: dang por zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /

analyzed: ci'i phyir dang po zhes bya zhe na /

analyzed: theg pa chen po gsang sngags 'dir las dang po pa'i sems can rnams dang por 'jug par bya ba'i phyir lha'i sku bsgom pa bstan pa yin te ;

original: gang yang 'di skad du /
analyzed: gang yang 'di skad du /

analyzed: dang po'i las can sems can la /

analyzed: lha yi sku ni bsgom pa nyid //

analyzed: zhes gsungs pa yin no //

analyzed: gnyis pa 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rdzogs pa'i rim pa la ltos nas de bstan pa'i @4b phyir gcig ces bya'o //

original: rgyu zhes bya ba ni thabs chen po'o //

analyzed: dngos po nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur zhing 'gro ba gzhang yi ngo bor 'gyur ba ste phung po lnga'i mtshan nyid can gyi lus so //
translated: One will arise as a thing, as the nature of the world, the body that has the characteristic of the five aggregates.

analyzed: de nyid kyis grol bar 'gyur ba'o //

original: rdo rje snying po snying rje che //
analyzed: rdo rje snying po snying rje che //

original: zhes bya ba ni bod pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bod pa'o //

original: phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su phung po med pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi thar pa kha cig gis smra bar byed cing 'di ltar rtogs te /

translated: Some say that liberation is the characteristic of the absence of the aggregates in the dhƒÅtu of nirvƒÅ·πáa without remainder.

analyzed: gal te dngos po nyid kyis grol bar ji ltar 'gyur na 'dir 'ching ba gang zhig yin zhe na /

original: de'i phyir / dngos po yis na 'ching bar 'gyur //
analyzed: de'i phyir / dngos po yis na 'ching bar 'gyur //
translated: Therefore,üîΩOne is bound by entities.üîΩ

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, it is said:üîΩOne is bound by entities.

original: de la dngos por 'dzin cing bden par mngon par zhen pas te /
analyzed: de la dngos por 'dzin cing bden par mngon par zhen pas te /
translated: There, one is bound by grasping at entities and by the manifest clinging to truth.

original: bden pa nyid du mngon par gnas rgyal byed pa'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bden pa nyid du mngon par gnas rgyal byed pa'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is: by the manifest adherence to truth.

original: de ltar na grol bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar na grol bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How then is there liberation?üîΩIt is said:

original: de yongs shes pas zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de yongs shes pas zhes bya ba ste /
translated: By thoroughly knowing that.

original: de yongs su shes pa ni de yongs su shes pa ste /
analyzed: de yongs su shes pa ni de yongs su shes pa ste /

original: 'chad par 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid can de kho na nyid kyi le'u nas bstan pa'i sbyod pa /
analyzed: 'chad par 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid can de kho na nyid kyi le'u nas bstan pa'i sbyod pa /
translated: The conduct taught in the chapter on reality, which has the characteristics that will be explained,

original: ngo bos gzugs med mthong ba med //
analyzed: ngo bos gzugs med mthong ba med //
translated: is thoroughly known by the one who sees the formlessness of entities.

original: ces bya ba la sogs pa phung po lnga bskyed pa med pa'i mtshan nyid can du yong su shes pa ni grol bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ces bya ba la sogs pa phung po lnga bskyed pa med pa'i mtshan nyid can du yong su shes pa ni grol bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The thoroughly knowing of the five aggregates as having the characteristic of non-production, as taught in the chapter on reality, is liberation.

original: rgyu de'i phyir /
analyzed: rgyu de'i phyir /

original: dngos po bsgom 'gyur shes ba can //
analyzed: dngos po bsgom 'gyur shes ba can //

original: zhes bos pa yin te zla ba dang nyi ma dang sa bon dang phyag mtshan yongs su gyur pa las skyes pa'i lha'i gzugs ni sbyor bsgom par bya ba yin pas bsgom par rigs so zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bos pa yin te zla ba dang nyi ma dang sa bon dang phyag mtshan yongs su gyur pa las skyes pa'i lha'i gzugs ni sbyor bsgom par bya ba yin pas bsgom par rigs so zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the form of the deity born from the complete transformation of the moon, sun, seed, and insignia is to be cultivated in meditation, so it is reasonable to meditate on it.

original: dngos po med pa zhes bya ba la yang dngos po med ba de ni nges par yongs su shes par bya ba yin te /
analyzed: dngos po med pa zhes bya ba la yang dngos po med ba de ni nges par yongs su shes par bya ba yin te /
translated: As for ‚Äúnon-entity,‚Äù that non-entity is definitely to be understood.

analyzed: ma byung ba'i dngos pa ni dngos po med pas te ma skyes ba zhes bya ba'i don to // de yang 'di skad du /
translated: A non-arisen entity is a non-entity, meaning ‚Äúunborn.‚Äù

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis lang kar gshegs pa las /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis lang kar gshegs pa las /
translated: And this is stated in the Descent into La·πÖkƒÅ S≈´tra:

original: gang gis dngos rnam pa dngos med shes pa //
analyzed: gang gis dngos rnam pa dngos med shes pa //
translated: Those who know entities and non-entities

original: de ni dngos po kun la chags mi 'gyur //
analyzed: de ni dngos po kun la chags mi 'gyur //

original: gang zhig dngos po kun la chags med pas //
analyzed: gang zhig dngos po kun la chags med pas //
translated: Those who are not attached to any entity

original: des ni mtshan med ting 'dzin reg par 'gyur //üîΩzhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: des ni mtshan med ting 'dzin reg par 'gyur // zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: will reach the signless meditative absorption.

original: de ltar he ru ka bsgom bya //
analyzed: de ltar he ru ka bsgom bya //

original: zhes bya ba ni bstan ba'i mtshan nyid can de bzhin du'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bstan ba'i mtshan nyid can de bzhin du'o //

original: dngos po med pa zhes pa ni dngos po med pa yongs su shes par bya'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa zhes pa ni dngos po med pa yongs su shes par bya'o //
translated: Non-entity should be understood as non-entity.

original: rim pa gnyis pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir lus la zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: rim pa gnyis pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir lus la zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: In order to teach the second stage, he says, dwelling in the body, etc.

original: lus la gnas @5a * //
analyzed: lus la gnas @5a * //
translated: Dwelling in the body,

original: par gyur pas lus la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: par gyur pas lus la gnas pa'o //
translated: having become situated in the body,

original: bde chen yang yin la ye shes kyang yin pas ye shes chen po'o //
analyzed: bde chen yang yin la ye shes kyang yin pas ye shes chen po'o //
translated: is the great bliss and also the intuition, thus it is the great intuition.

original: gal te lus la gnas pa yin na ye shes chen por 'gyur zhe na /üîΩdngos po kun la khyab pa po //
analyzed: gal te lus la gnas pa yin na ye shes chen por 'gyur zhe na / dngos po kun la khyab pa po //

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: He says, pervading all things.

original: zag pa med pa'i bde ba chen po lhan cig skyes pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi chos nyid las chos thams cad phyi rol du gyur pa ma yin pas /
analyzed: zag pa med pa'i bde ba chen po lhan cig skyes pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi chos nyid las chos thams cad phyi rol du gyur pa ma yin pas /

original: de'i phyir lus la gnas na yang lus las skyes pa ni ma yin zhing lus kyang de'i rgyu ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir lus la gnas na yang lus las skyes pa ni ma yin zhing lus kyang de'i rgyu ma yin te /
translated: therefore, although situated in the body, it is not born from the body, and the body is not its cause.

original: lus ni brdzun pa slu ba'i chos can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lus ni brdzun pa slu ba'i chos can yin pa'i phyir ro //

original: de'i phyir dri med sgra med gzugs nyid med //
analyzed: de'i phyir dri med sgra med gzugs nyid med //
translated: Therefore, there is no stainless, no sound, no form itself,

original: ro dang sems kyi rnam par dag pa med //üîΩreg dang chos med thams cad rnam par dag / rang bzhin dag pa'i 'gro las grol bar shes //
analyzed: ro dang sems kyi rnam par dag pa med // reg dang chos med thams cad rnam par dag / rang bzhin dag pa'i 'gro las grol bar shes //
translated: no purity of taste, no purity of mind,

original: zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: no touch, no phenomena, all are pure, known to be liberated from the pure nature of beings.

original: de la 'dir dang po'i tshig gi thos pa zhes bya ba'i sgras bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pas gnyis mtshon zhing bstan nas /
analyzed: de la 'dir dang po'i tshig gi thos pa zhes bya ba'i sgras bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pas gnyis mtshon zhing bstan nas /
translated: Here, first, the word ‚Äúheard‚Äù indicates and teaches the two, the creation and perfection stages.

original: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i dgyes pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rten gyi dkyil 'khor ni lus nyid yin la /
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i dgyes pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rten gyi dkyil 'khor ni lus nyid yin la /
translated: The support ma·πá·∏çala of Hevajra of the perfection stage is the body itself.

original: brten pa ni rnal 'byor ma bco lnga'i rang bzhin gyi rtsa'o //
analyzed: brten pa ni rnal 'byor ma bco lnga'i rang bzhin gyi rtsa'o //
translated: The supported is the nƒÅ·∏çƒ´s, which are the nature of the fifteen yoginƒ´s.

original: 'on kyang de dag du zhig ltar rnam par gnas /
analyzed: 'on kyang de dag du zhig ltar rnam par gnas /
translated: However, how many are there, and how do they exist?

original: de'i mngon par rtogs pa ni ji lta bu zhig yin pa mi shes pas dri bar 'dod nas /
analyzed: de'i mngon par rtogs pa ni ji lta bu zhig yin pa mi shes pas dri bar 'dod nas /
translated: Since it is not known what their realization is like, it is desired to ask.

original: skye bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: skye bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: The Blessed One, etc.

original: byang chub kyi sems 'bab ces bya ba ni lhan cig skyes pa 'byung bar gyur pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems 'bab ces bya ba ni lhan cig skyes pa 'byung bar gyur pa'o //
translated: The descent of the bodhicitta is the arising of the innate.

original: rtsa rnam pa gsum ni gtso bo ste zhes bya ba'i dgongs pa ni 'di yin te /üîΩrtsa gsum gyi rnal 'byor yongs su zhes pa tsam nyid kyis chog par 'gyur te /
analyzed: rtsa rnam pa gsum ni gtso bo ste zhes bya ba'i dgongs pa ni 'di yin te / rtsa gsum gyi rnal 'byor yongs su zhes pa tsam nyid kyis chog par 'gyur te /
translated: The three principal nƒÅ·∏çƒ´s means the following.

original: de nyid du lhan cig skyes pa'i mtshan nyid can gyis brtsi ba'i rdo rje nges par lhag pa mtshon par bya ba nyid yin pas so //
analyzed: de nyid du lhan cig skyes pa'i mtshan nyid can gyis brtsi ba'i rdo rje nges par lhag pa mtshon par bya ba nyid yin pas so //
translated: It is sufficient to practice the yoga of the three nƒÅ·∏çƒ´s alone, because the nature of the three nƒÅ·∏çƒ´s is the three vajras, which are to be ascertained in that very place.

original: gsum po de dag gi ngo bo nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gsum po de dag gi ngo bo nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to explain the nature of those three,üîΩit is said,

original: shes rab rang bzhin la la n'a //
analyzed: shes rab rang bzhin la la n'a //
translated: The lalana is the nature of wisdom,

original: zhes bya ba gsung ste go sla'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsung ste go sla'o //
translated: and so on, which is easy to understand.üîΩThe purpose of the question beginning with

original: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pas zhus pa'i dgos pa ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pas zhus pa'i dgos pa ni 'di yin te /
translated: the Blessed One, etc.,

original: ci rtsa'i gzugs nyid bsgoms par gyur pa kho nas dpal rdo rje 'chang ge go 'phang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba zhig yin nam 'on te gzhan zhig gis yin zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: ci rtsa'i gzugs nyid bsgoms par gyur pa kho nas dpal rdo rje 'chang ge go 'phang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba zhig yin nam 'on te gzhan zhig gis yin zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: What? Is it only by meditating on the form of the channels that one attains the state of glorious Vajradhara? Or is it by something else?

original: de la bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: de la bka' stsal pa /
translated: To that, he said:

original: srid gsum yongs gyur zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: srid gsum yongs gyur zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: The transformation of the three worlds, etc.

original: srid gsum @5b ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad de /
analyzed: srid gsum @5b ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad de /
translated: The three worlds are all the qualities of the Buddha,

original: de dag sku dang gsung dang thugs kyis bsdus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag sku dang gsung dang thugs kyis bsdus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are included in body, speech, and mind.

original: de yongs su gyur pa ni de'i ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: de yongs su gyur pa ni de'i ngo bo nyid do //
translated: Their transformation is their nature.

original: de nyid kyi phyir /üîΩgzung dang 'dzin pa rnams par spangs //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir / gzung dang 'dzin pa rnams par spangs //
translated: For that very reason,

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: the abandonment of grasped and grasper.

original: yang na zhes bya ba ni phyogs gzhan ston pa'o //
analyzed: yang na zhes bya ba ni phyogs gzhan ston pa'o //
translated: Or else indicates another position.

original: thabs ne thams cad rdo rje 'chang gi go 'phang thob pa'i thabs su gyur pa'i rgyud nyid rtsa'i rang bzhin nyid kyis 'khor lo 'dir //
analyzed: thabs ne thams cad rdo rje 'chang gi go 'phang thob pa'i thabs su gyur pa'i rgyud nyid rtsa'i rang bzhin nyid kyis 'khor lo 'dir //
translated: All the methods are the tantra itself, which is the means of attaining the state of Vajradhara, by the nature of the channels in this cakra.

original: la la n'a'i rang bzhin ni 'di lta bu //
analyzed: la la n'a'i rang bzhin ni 'di lta bu //
translated: The nature of the la la na is like this:

original: ra sa n'a ni 'di lta bu aa ba dh'u t'i ni 'di lta bu /
analyzed: ra sa n'a ni 'di lta bu aa ba dh'u t'i ni 'di lta bu /
translated: The Rasana is like this, the Avadhuti is like this.

original: zhes slob ma yongs dus gzung ba'i phyir ro //üîΩdngos po'i mtshan nyid du ni brtags //
analyzed: zhes slob ma yongs dus gzung ba'i phyir ro // dngos po'i mtshan nyid du ni brtags //
translated: In order to hold the disciple's attention.

original: zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: The characteristics of entities are investigated.

original: chos pa'i dbye ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: chos pa'i dbye ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The division of the Dharma, etc.

original: phyi rol gyi rgya che ba'i chos rnams nang du rtogs par rnal 'byor ba gang gis nges par byas pa de ni de'i sdom pas te lus su bsdus pa'i phyir dang / bsdus pa'i mchog nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi rgya che ba'i chos rnams nang du rtogs par rnal 'byor ba gang gis nges par byas pa de ni de'i sdom pas te lus su bsdus pa'i phyir dang / bsdus pa'i mchog nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The yogi who has ascertained the external extensive Dharma as internal is bound by that vow, because it is included in the body and is the supreme collection.

original: de'i dbye ba ni rnam pa du ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i dbye ba ni rnam pa du ma yin no //
translated: Its division is manifold.

original: a'a li k'a li zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: a'a li k'a li zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The Alikali, etc.

original: yi ge aa la sogs pa dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu drug ni a'a li'o //
analyzed: yi ge aa la sogs pa dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu drug ni a'a li'o //
translated: The sixteen vowels beginning with A are the Alikali.

original: yi ge ka la sogs pa sum cu rtsa bzhi ni k'a li'o //
analyzed: yi ge ka la sogs pa sum cu rtsa bzhi ni k'a li'o //
translated: The thirty-four consonants beginning with Ka are the Kalikali.

original: de dag nyid ni la la n'a dang / ras sa n'a dang / zla ba nyi ma dang / shes rab dang thabs so //
analyzed: de dag nyid ni la la n'a dang / ras sa n'a dang / zla ba nyi ma dang / shes rab dang thabs so //
translated: Those very [vowels and consonants] are the Lalana, Rasana, Moon, Sun, Wisdom, and Means.

original: chos dang longs spyod dang sbrul pa zhes bya ba ni chos kyi 'khor lo dang / longs spyod kyis 'khor lo dang / sprul pa'i 'khor lo ste /
analyzed: chos dang longs spyod dang sbrul pa zhes bya ba ni chos kyi 'khor lo dang / longs spyod kyis 'khor lo dang / sprul pa'i 'khor lo ste /
translated: The Dharma, enjoyment, and emanation wheels are the Dharma wheel, the enjoyment wheel, and the emanation wheel.

original: snying ga dang / mgrin pa dang lte ba rnams su rim pa ji lta ba bzhin no //
analyzed: snying ga dang / mgrin pa dang lte ba rnams su rim pa ji lta ba bzhin no //
translated: They are in the heart, throat, and navel, respectively.üîΩThe body, speech, and mind wheels are the three wheels.

original: sku dang gsung dang thugs zhes bya ba ni 'khor lo gsum po de nyid ni sku'i 'khor lo ni lta bar //
analyzed: sku dang gsung dang thugs zhes bya ba ni 'khor lo gsum po de nyid ni sku'i 'khor lo ni lta bar //
translated: The body wheel is in the head.

original: gsung gi 'khor lo ni mgrin par /
analyzed: gsung gi 'khor lo ni mgrin par /
translated: The speech wheel is in the throat.

original: thugs kyi 'khor po ni thugs kar ro //
analyzed: thugs kyi 'khor po ni thugs kar ro //
translated: The mind wheel is in the heart.

original: gsum po yongs su shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo ste spyi bor shes par bya'o //
analyzed: gsum po yongs su shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo ste spyi bor shes par bya'o //
translated: The wheel of great bliss, which is the nature of the complete knowledge of the three, should be known as being in the head.

original: 'khor lo bzhi po 'di ni sa dang chu dang me dang rlung gi khams kyi ngo bo nyid phyag rgya bzhi dang / 'di skad bdag gis zhes bya bar grags pa yang yin no //
analyzed: 'khor lo bzhi po 'di ni sa dang chu dang me dang rlung gi khams kyi ngo bo nyid phyag rgya bzhi dang / 'di skad bdag gis zhes bya bar grags pa yang yin no //
translated: These four wheels are the nature of the earth, water, fire, and wind elements, and they are the four seals.

original: da ni sprul pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: da ni sprul pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Now, the emanation wheel, etc. is stated.

original: padma drug cu rtsa bzhi pa'i dbus kyi brgyad la ni g-yon skor du aa ka tsa ta ta pa ya sha rnams so //
analyzed: padma drug cu rtsa bzhi pa'i dbus kyi brgyad la ni g-yon skor du aa ka tsa ta ta pa ya sha rnams so //
translated: In the center of the sixty-four-petaled lotus, the eight petals in the counterclockwise direction are the vowels a ka ca ·π≠a ta pa ya ≈õa.

original: lte bar ni yi ge aa'o //
analyzed: lte bar ni yi ge aa'o //
translated: In the center is the syllable a.

original: snying gar ni padma 'dab ma brgyad pa thur du bltas pa'i mtshams kyi 'dab ma bzhi la ni ya ra la wa'o //
analyzed: snying gar ni padma 'dab ma brgyad pa thur du bltas pa'i mtshams kyi 'dab ma bzhi la ni ya ra la wa'o //
translated: In the heart is an eight-petaled lotus facing downward. On the four petals in the intermediate directions are ya ra la va.

original: phyogs kyi 'dab ma rnams la ni pa'i a'u ae ao bzhi'o //
analyzed: phyogs kyi 'dab ma rnams la ni pa'i a'u ae ao bzhi'o //
translated: On the petals in the directions are the four vowels i ≈´ ai o.

original: lte bar ni yi ge h'um @6a * //
analyzed: lte bar ni yi ge h'um @6a * //
translated: In the center is the syllable h≈´·πÉ.

original: kha thur du bltas pa'o //
analyzed: kha thur du bltas pa'o //
translated: It faces downward.

original: mgrin pa'i padma ma 'dab ma bcu drug pa kha gyen du bltas pa'i dbus na gnas pa'i phyogs kyi 'dab ma bzhi la ni aa ai au ae rnams g-yon skor du'o //
analyzed: mgrin pa'i padma ma 'dab ma bcu drug pa kha gyen du bltas pa'i dbus na gnas pa'i phyogs kyi 'dab ma bzhi la ni aa ai au ae rnams g-yon skor du'o //
translated: In the throat, the sixteen-petaled lotus faces upward. In the center, on the four petals in the directions, in the counterclockwise direction, are a i u e.

original: lta bar ni aom mo //
analyzed: lta bar ni aom mo //
translated: In the center is o·πÉ.

original: spyi bor ni padma 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'i lte bar yi ge ham kha thur du bltas pa'o //
analyzed: spyi bor ni padma 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'i lte bar yi ge ham kha thur du bltas pa'o //
translated: In the head, in the center of the thirty-two-petaled lotus, is the syllable ha·πÉ facing downward.

original: 'khor lo bzhi po 'di dag ni 'chad par 'gyur pa'i chos can du bskyed pa'i rim pas mos par bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'khor lo bzhi po 'di dag ni 'chad par 'gyur pa'i chos can du bskyed pa'i rim pas mos par bya ba ste /
translated: These four cakras are to be visualized by the creation stage of the deity explained below.

original: mchog tu gyur pa bsdus pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: mchog tu gyur pa bsdus pa nyid yin no //
translated: It is the very epitome of the supreme.

original: skad cig ma bzhi zhes bya ba ni sprul pa'i 'khor lo la sogs pa bzhi la mos par bya ba'o //
analyzed: skad cig ma bzhi zhes bya ba ni sprul pa'i 'khor lo la sogs pa bzhi la mos par bya ba'o //
translated: The four moments are to be contemplated in the four wheels, beginning with the emanation wheel.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yang 'di nyid la mos par bya ba nyid yin te /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yang 'di nyid la mos par bya ba nyid yin te /
translated: The four noble truths are also to be contemplated in this very [wheel of flame].

original: 'khor lo bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur na 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi bsgom pa yang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o //üîΩsde pa bzhi zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: 'khor lo bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur na 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi bsgom pa yang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o // sde pa bzhi zhes bya ba la /
translated: When the meditation on the wheel is complete, the meditation on the four noble truths is also complete.

original: 'di dag kyang 'di nyid du mos par bya ba nyid yin te /
analyzed: 'di dag kyang 'di nyid du mos par bya ba nyid yin te /
translated: The four classes are also to be contemplated in this very [wheel of flame].

original: 'khor lo bzhi bsgom pa nyid du chos thams cad bsdus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'khor lo bzhi bsgom pa nyid du chos thams cad bsdus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because all dharmas are included in the meditation on the four wheels.

original: bskyed pa'i rim pa bshad pa gcig yin no //
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa bshad pa gcig yin no //
translated: This is the explanation of the creation stage.

original: sdom pa'i dbye ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: sdom pa'i dbye ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The divisions of the vows, etc.

original: sdom pa ni dbang bskur ba'o //
analyzed: sdom pa ni dbang bskur ba'o //
translated: The vows are the consecrations.

original: de'i rab tu dbye ba ni dbye ba ste /
analyzed: de'i rab tu dbye ba ni dbye ba ste /
translated: Their divisions are the divisions,

original: 'chad par 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid can no //
analyzed: 'chad par 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid can no //
translated: which have the characteristics that will be explained.

original: de yang ji skad du /
analyzed: de yang ji skad du /
translated: And that is as follows:

original: sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir //
analyzed: sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir //
translated: For the sake of benefiting sentient beings,

original: dbang bskur ba ni bzhi ru bsgrags //
analyzed: dbang bskur ba ni bzhi ru bsgrags //
translated: the consecration is proclaimed to be fourfold.

original: 'di yis bkrus shing dbang bskur bas //
analyzed: 'di yis bkrus shing dbang bskur bas //
translated: Since one is washed and consecrated by this,

original: de phyir dbang bskur zhes byar brjod //
analyzed: de phyir dbang bskur zhes byar brjod //
translated: therefore it is called consecration.

original: ces gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: ces gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Thus it is stated.

original: dbang bskur ba gzhi po de nyid kyi rab tu dbye ba brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: dbang bskur ba gzhi po de nyid kyi rab tu dbye ba brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to describe the divisions of that very consecration,

original: 'di ltar yang /
analyzed: 'di ltar yang /
translated: it is said:

original: slob dpon gsang ba shes rab dang // de ltar de bzhin bzhi pa yang //
analyzed: slob dpon gsang ba shes rab dang // de ltar de bzhin bzhi pa yang //
translated: The master, secret, wisdom, and likewise the fourth,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'chad par 'gyur ba yin no //üîΩrnal 'byor ma'i rgyud 'dir ni sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las ring du gyur pa kun du spyod pa'i phyir slob dpon te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'chad par 'gyur ba yin no // rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud 'dir ni sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las ring du gyur pa kun du spyod pa'i phyir slob dpon te /
translated: and so on.

original: de nyid kyi de'i sdom pa yin pas so //
analyzed: de nyid kyi de'i sdom pa yin pas so //
translated: The master here in the Yoginƒ´ Tantras is one who has gone far from sinful, nonvirtuous dharmas, because of engaging in the practice of the vows of that very consecration.

original: slob dpon gyis dbang bskur ba'i ngo bo gang las kyi phyag rgya las skad cig ma bzhis dga' ba bzhi'i rang gi ngo bo nyid rab tu bsgrub pa zhes bya ba yin gyi /
analyzed: slob dpon gyis dbang bskur ba'i ngo bo gang las kyi phyag rgya las skad cig ma bzhis dga' ba bzhi'i rang gi ngo bo nyid rab tu bsgrub pa zhes bya ba yin gyi /
translated: The nature of the consecration by the master is the accomplishment of the nature of the four joys by means of the four moments from the karma consort.

original: yang bya ba'i rgyud la sogs pa dang thun mong du gyur pa'i phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang bskur ba thob pas slob dpon gyis dbang bskur bas dbang @6b bskur ba la ni mi bya'o //
analyzed: yang bya ba'i rgyud la sogs pa dang thun mong du gyur pa'i phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang bskur ba thob pas slob dpon gyis dbang bskur bas dbang @6b bskur ba la ni mi bya'o //
translated: Moreover, since it is common to Action Tantras and so on, it should not be conferred by the Master Initiation, which is obtained by the irreversible initiation.

original: de lta bas na rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud la sogs pa thams cad bshad pa dang nyan pa la sogs pa'i skal pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tshig 'di ni ci yang ma yin no //
analyzed: de lta bas na rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud la sogs pa thams cad bshad pa dang nyan pa la sogs pa'i skal pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tshig 'di ni ci yang ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the statement that one becomes fit to explain and listen to all the Yoga and Yoginƒ´ Tantras and so on is meaningless.

original: de lta bas na dang por re zhig dgyes pa'i rdo rje la sogs pa rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud rnams mnyan pa dang bsgom pa la sogs pa la dbang par bya ba'i phyir slob dpon gyi dbang bskur ba nyid kyis dbang bskur bar bya'o //
analyzed: de lta bas na dang por re zhig dgyes pa'i rdo rje la sogs pa rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud rnams mnyan pa dang bsgom pa la sogs pa la dbang par bya ba'i phyir slob dpon gyi dbang bskur ba nyid kyis dbang bskur bar bya'o //
translated: Therefore, first of all, in order to become fit to listen to and meditate on the Yoginƒ´ Tantras such as the Hevajra, one should be initiated by the Master Initiation.

original: yang de ni mngon par rtogs pa ji lta ba bzhin du slob dpon dang gsang ba dang shes rab dbang bzhi pa'i mtshan nyid kyis nye bar mtshon pa yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: yang de ni mngon par rtogs pa ji lta ba bzhin du slob dpon dang gsang ba dang shes rab dbang bzhi pa'i mtshan nyid kyis nye bar mtshon pa yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: Moreover, that should be understood as illustrated by the characteristics of the master, secret, and wisdom initiations, just as they are realized.

original: de lta bu'i slob dpon gyi dbang bskur ba thob pa'i dbang po rtul po rnams la ni mos pas nges par bzung nas /
analyzed: de lta bu'i slob dpon gyi dbang bskur ba thob pa'i dbang po rtul po rnams la ni mos pas nges par bzung nas /
translated: For those of dull faculties who have obtained the master initiation in that way, having been ascertained by faith,

original: las kyi phyag rgya dang spros pa'i phyag rgya bsgom pa bstan par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: las kyi phyag rgya dang spros pa'i phyag rgya bsgom pa bstan par bya ba yin no //
translated: the meditation on the karma consort and the elaborate consort should be taught.

original: de bzhin du rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i phyogs la yang gsang bar gnas pa'i nor bu bla ma'i man ngag nyid kyis skad cig ma bzhi'i rang bzhin dga' ba bzhi po nyams su myong ba de ni gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba zhes bya bar brjod de /
analyzed: de bzhin du rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i phyogs la yang gsang bar gnas pa'i nor bu bla ma'i man ngag nyid kyis skad cig ma bzhi'i rang bzhin dga' ba bzhi po nyams su myong ba de ni gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba zhes bya bar brjod de /
translated: Similarly, in the perfection stage, the experience of the four joys, which have the nature of the four moments, by means of the esoteric instructions of the guru, who is the jewel abiding in the secret place, is called the secret initiation.

original: spros pa bsgom pa la sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor pa rnams la bstan par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: spros pa bsgom pa la sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor pa rnams la bstan par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It should not be taught to yogins who are engaged in the meditation of elaboration.

translated: Moreover, that is the wisdom-intuition, which is the essence of the three consciousnesses, the other-dependent, the imagined, and the perfected, and which is symbolized by the external seal and the moments by the guru's instruction in the heart-jewel.

original: dbang bskur ba des dbang bskur ba'i dbang po rab rnams la ni sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis chos kyi phyag rgya nye bar bstan cing bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: dbang bskur ba des dbang bskur ba'i dbang po rab rnams la ni sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis chos kyi phyag rgya nye bar bstan cing bshad par bya'o //
translated: By that empowerment conferral, the best faculties of those to whom the empowerment is conferred should be shown and explained by the illusion-like meditative stabilization with the reality seal.

original: de bzhin du bzhi pa yang yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin du bzhi pa yang yin te /

analyzed: de zhes pa ni shes rab ye shes so //

original: la don gyi khyad par yod pa ma yin no //

translated: Moreover, that is an external seal, and the yoga of observing the non-observation of the perfection of the instant that is not ascertained as a specific object by the guru‚Äôs intimate instruction alone is called the ‚Äúfourth empowerment.‚Äù

original: dur khrod ces bya ba bdag med pa'i lus la mgon po mchog tu dga' ba'i rang bzhin bzhugs pa yin no //
analyzed: dur khrod ces bya ba bdag med pa'i lus la mgon po mchog tu dga' ba'i rang bzhin bzhugs pa yin no //
translated: The ‚Äúcharnel ground‚Äù is the body of selflessness, in which the Lord, the nature of supreme joy, resides.

original: lus ji ltar dur khrod yin zhe na /
analyzed: lus ji ltar dur khrod yin zhe na /
translated: How is the body a charnel ground?

original: dbugs rgyu zhes pa'i rigs pa 'dis //üîΩdur khrod ces ni mngon par brjod //
analyzed: dbugs rgyu zhes pa'i rigs pa 'dis // dur khrod ces ni mngon par brjod //
translated: This reason, ‚Äúthe movement of breath,‚Äù

original: ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba'o //
translated: is declared to be a ‚Äúcharnel ground.‚Äù

original: da ni dgyes pa'i rdo rje phyag bzhi pa khyad par du brjod par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni dgyes pa'i rdo rje phyag bzhi pa khyad par du brjod par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to describe the distinctive four-armed Hevajra,

original: @13a * // phyag bzhi ni bdud bzhi las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: @13a * // phyag bzhi ni bdud bzhi las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: it is said, ‚ÄúFour arms are the victory over the four mƒÅras,‚Äù and so on.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs can ma //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs can ma //
translated: ‚ÄúThe form of the Bhagavat‚Äù

original: zhes bya ba ni de'i dbyibs dang kha dog can phyag gnyis na gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin par bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de'i dbyibs dang kha dog can phyag gnyis na gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin par bsgom par bya'o //
translated: means that one should meditate on her shape and color, holding a flaying knife and skull cup in two hands.

original: phyag drug pa'i shes rab rdo rje lcags sgrogs ma yang de bzhin no //
analyzed: phyag drug pa'i shes rab rdo rje lcags sgrogs ma yang de bzhin no //
translated: The wisdom Vajra-Bell of the Six-Faced One is also like that.

original: rgyud 'dir dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i phyogs la phyag gnyis pa'i shes rab bdag med ma yin te /
analyzed: rgyud 'dir dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i phyogs la phyag gnyis pa'i shes rab bdag med ma yin te /
translated: In this Tantra, the wisdom Nairatmya with two arms is not in the circle of the mandala.

original: spyir dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i grub pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: spyir dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i grub pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because she is the general of the Hevajra adepts.

original: dombi ni thams cad du mchod pa'i lha mo yin gyi /
analyzed: dombi ni thams cad du mchod pa'i lha mo yin gyi /
translated: It is the doctrine that Dombi is the worship goddess everywhere,

original: phyag rgya ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni gzhung lugs so //
analyzed: phyag rgya ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni gzhung lugs so //
translated: but not the seal.

original: dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i dka' 'grel rnal 'byor rin po che'i phreng ba las le'u gsum pa'i 'grel pa'o /
analyzed: dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i dka' 'grel rnal 'byor rin po che'i phreng ba las le'u gsum pa'i 'grel pa'o /
translated: This concludes the commentary on the third chapter of the Yogaratnamala, the commentary on the Hevajra Tantra.

original: // / dbang bskur ba ni rnal 'byor ba thams cad kyi thun mong gi bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ste /
analyzed: // / dbang bskur ba ni rnal 'byor ba thams cad kyi thun mong gi bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ste /
translated: The consecration is the completion of the meditation common to all yogis.

original: de bstan pa'i phyir lha dbang bskur ba'i le'u zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de bstan pa'i phyir lha dbang bskur ba'i le'u zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: In order to teach that, it is said, The chapter on the consecration of the deity, and so forth.

original: dbang bskur ba ni bag chags dang bcas pa'i sgrib pa thams cad dag par bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dbang bskur ba ni bag chags dang bcas pa'i sgrib pa thams cad dag par bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The consecration is for the sake of purifying all obscurations along with their habitual tendencies.

original: spyi bor rang gi rigs kyi zhes bya ba ni lha rnams la ji ltar 'os par de bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: spyi bor rang gi rigs kyi zhes bya ba ni lha rnams la ji ltar 'os par de bstan par bya'o //
translated: The phrase the one's own lineage means that one should visualize the deity in whatever way is appropriate for the deity.

original: lha'i gzugs su gzhag go zhes bya ba ni rang gi 'dod pa'i lha de'i gzugs su ste der gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: lha'i gzugs su gzhag go zhes bya ba ni rang gi 'dod pa'i lha de'i gzugs su ste der gzhag par bya'o //
translated: The phrase in the form of the deity means that one should visualize the deity in the form of the deity that one desires.

original: dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i dka' 'grel rnal 'byor rin po che'i phreng ba las le'u bzhi pa'i 'grel pa'o /
analyzed: dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i dka' 'grel rnal 'byor rin po che'i phreng ba las le'u bzhi pa'i 'grel pa'o /
translated: This concludes the explanation of the fourth chapter of the Vajra-Tent Tantra, the yoga of the deity, from the commentary called the Jewel-Garland Yoga.

original: // / de ltar lha'i rnal 'byor bstan nas de yang de kho na nyid la mos pa med pa la myur du byang chub thob pa yod pa ma yin pas /
analyzed: // / de ltar lha'i rnal 'byor bstan nas de yang de kho na nyid la mos pa med pa la myur du byang chub thob pa yod pa ma yin pas /
translated: Having thus taught the yoga of the deity, since there is no swift attainment of enlightenment for one who lacks devotion to reality,

original: de nas de kho na nyid kyi le'u zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas de kho na nyid kyi le'u zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: then the chapter called Reality is taught.

original: de kho na nyid gsal bar byed pa de la de skad ces bya ba /
analyzed: de kho na nyid gsal bar byed pa de la de skad ces bya ba /
translated: It is called that because it illuminates reality.

original: gzugs ni sngon po dang ser po la sogs pa ste de ni med do //
analyzed: gzugs ni sngon po dang ser po la sogs pa ste de ni med do //
translated: Form is blue, yellow, and so on, and that does not exist.

original: ja ltar mthong ba nyid ma yin nam de ji ltar med ce na /
analyzed: ja ltar mthong ba nyid ma yin nam de ji ltar med ce na /
translated: But isn't it just what is seen? How can it not exist?

original: rang gi ngo bos med de /
analyzed: rang gi ngo bos med de /
translated: It does not exist by its own nature.

original: gang gi phyir bcos pa ma yin pa gzhan la ltos pa med pa'i gnyug ma'i gzugs rang bzhin can de'i rnam pas med de rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir bcos pa ma yin pa gzhan la ltos pa med pa'i gnyug ma'i gzugs rang bzhin can de'i rnam pas med de rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the intrinsic reality of unfabricated things that do not depend on other things does not exist by way of its own nature, because it is dependently arisen.

original: gang rten cing 'brel par 'byur  ba de nyid ni dngos po rnams kyi skye ba med pa'o //
analyzed: gang rten cing 'brel par 'byur  ba de nyid ni dngos po rnams kyi skye ba med pa'o //
translated: That which is dependently arisen is the non-arising of things.

original: gal te skye ba'i sngon rol du dngos po rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa zhig tu gyur na ni de ltar na bdag bden pa mthong bar bya ba'i phyir rgyu gzhan la ltos par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te skye ba'i sngon rol du dngos po rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa zhig tu gyur na ni de ltar na bdag bden pa mthong bar bya ba'i phyir rgyu gzhan la ltos par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If the entities of things existed prior to their arising, then one would not need to rely on other causes in order to see the truth.

original: rgyu gzhan la ltos na ni dngos po rnams @13b ngo bo nyid du grub po //
analyzed: rgyu gzhan la ltos na ni dngos po rnams @13b ngo bo nyid du grub po //
translated: But if one does rely on other causes, then things are established as having intrinsic reality.

original: de yang ji skad du klu sgrub zhabs kyis /
analyzed: de yang ji skad du klu sgrub zhabs kyis /
translated: And as the venerable NƒÅgƒÅrjuna said:

original: gzhan la ltos pa med pa'i phyir //
analyzed: gzhan la ltos pa med pa'i phyir //
translated: Because it does not depend on another,

original: rang bzhin bcos ma ma yin no //üîΩzhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: rang bzhin bcos ma ma yin no // zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: intrinsic reality is not fabricated.

original: gal te dngos po rnams rang bzhin med pa yin pas rang bzhin dmigs par mi 'gyur na /
analyzed: gal te dngos po rnams rang bzhin med pa yin pas rang bzhin dmigs par mi 'gyur na /
translated: If things do not have intrinsic reality, then intrinsic reality is not observed.

original: rnam pa sna tshogs pa 'di ji ltar snang bar 'gyur zhe na //
analyzed: rnam pa sna tshogs pa 'di ji ltar snang bar 'gyur zhe na //
translated: How can these various aspects appear?

original: byis pa rnams la snang ba kho na yin te /
analyzed: byis pa rnams la snang ba kho na yin te /
translated: They appear only to the childish.

original: snang ba tsam gyis rang gi ngo bo nyid 'grub par 'gyur ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: snang ba tsam gyis rang gi ngo bo nyid 'grub par 'gyur ba ni ma yin no //
translated: But mere appearance does not establish their intrinsic reality.üîΩDo not those with eye disease see such things as floating hairs,

original: skra shad dang zla ba gnyis dang rma bya'i mngongs dang / sbrang ma la sogs pa rnams kyang ci rab rib can rnams la snang ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: skra shad dang zla ba gnyis dang rma bya'i mngongs dang / sbrang ma la sogs pa rnams kyang ci rab rib can rnams la snang ba ma yin nam /
translated: a double moon, peacock feathers, and bees?

original: gal te de dag la ni rab rib kyi stobs kyis snang bar gyur pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te de dag la ni rab rib kyi stobs kyis snang bar gyur pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that they appear to them due to the power of eye disease,

original: gzhan dag gis kyang ma rig pa'i ling tog gis blo'i mig nyams par byas pas dngos po thams cad rang bzhin gyis yod pa ma yin na yang rab rib can gyis nye bar dmigs pa'i skra la sogs pa bzhin du mdun du grub par gyur nas mthong bar
analyzed: gzhan dag gis kyang ma rig pa'i ling tog gis blo'i mig nyams par byas pas dngos po thams cad rang bzhin gyis yod pa ma yin na yang rab rib can gyis nye bar dmigs pa'i skra la sogs pa bzhin du mdun du grub par gyur nas mthong bar
translated: then others, whose eyes of intelligence are impaired by the cataracts of ignorance, see all things as real, even though they are not intrinsically existent, just as those with eye disease observe floating hairs and so on.

original: 'gyur gyi / blo'i mig gi ma rig pa'i ling tog dag par gyur pa'i 'phags pa rnams la ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'gyur gyi / blo'i mig gi ma rig pa'i ling tog dag par gyur pa'i 'phags pa rnams la ni ma yin no //
translated: but not for the noble ones, whose eye of intelligence is purified of the cataracts of ignorance.

original: de yang ji skad du /
analyzed: de yang ji skad du /
translated: And it is said:üîΩIn the BodhisattvabhuÃÑmivyƒÅkhyƒÅÃÑ it says:üîΩThe Lord of the World, the Protector,üîΩtaught the DharmaüîΩin the three vehiclesüîΩfor the sake of sentient beings.üîΩThe Bodhisattva SarvaÃÑnivara·πáavi·π£kambhin‚Äôs Praise of the

original: byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa las /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa las /
translated: Blessed One says:

original: gdod nas zhi ba skye ba med //
analyzed: gdod nas zhi ba skye ba med //
translated: Originally peaceful, unborn,

original: rang bzhin gyis ni mya ngan 'das //üîΩchos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba na //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis ni mya ngan 'das // chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba na //
translated: naturally in a state of nirvana,

original: mgon po khyod kyis chos rnams gsungs //
analyzed: mgon po khyod kyis chos rnams gsungs //
translated: the Protector taught the Dharma

original: zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: in the three vehiclesüîΩfor the sake of sentient beings.

original: de lta bas na gzugs la sogs pa rnams rang gi ngo bo nyid kyis yod pa ma yin no zhes gsungs so //üîΩmthong ba med ces bya ba la sogs pa la gang gzugs la blta ba mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa'i chos de dag ni yod pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de lta bas na gzugs la sogs pa rnams rang gi ngo bo nyid kyis yod pa ma yin no zhes gsungs so // mthong ba med ces bya ba la sogs pa la gang gzugs la blta ba mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa'i chos de dag ni yod pa yang ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, form and so on do not exist inherently.

original: chos thams cad ma skyes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos thams cad ma skyes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: As for the line ‚ÄúThere is no seeing,‚Äù the phenomena such as the eye consciousness that see form do not exist, because all phenomena are unarisen.

original: de bzhin du sgra la sogs pa la yang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du sgra la sogs pa la yang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: Sound and so on should be applied in the same way.

original: sems med ces bya ba la sogs pa la sems ni yongs su grub pa rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: sems med ces bya ba la sogs pa la sems ni yongs su grub pa rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: As for the statement, ‚ÄúThere is no mind,‚Äù etc., mind refers to the perfected, which is consciousness.

original: sems las byung ba ni gzhan gyi dbang dang kun tu brtags pa ste /
analyzed: sems las byung ba ni gzhan gyi dbang dang kun tu brtags pa ste /
translated: Mental factors are the dependent and the imagined.

original: gsum po 'di dag don dam par yod pa ma yin pa nyid do //
analyzed: gsum po 'di dag don dam par yod pa ma yin pa nyid do //
translated: These three do not exist ultimately.

original: gal te de ji ltar med /
analyzed: gal te de ji ltar med /
translated: If they do not exist, how can they be mind only?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang /
translated: The Lord has said,

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras dag khams gsum po 'di dag ni sems tsam mo zhes gsungs pa de ji ltar yin zhe na /üîΩde ni bden la 'on kyang gzugs la sogs pa la mngon par zhen pa'i gdul bya rnams kyi mngon @14a * //
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras dag khams gsum po 'di dag ni sems tsam mo zhes gsungs pa de ji ltar yin zhe na / de ni bden la 'on kyang gzugs la sogs pa la mngon par zhen pa'i gdul bya rnams kyi mngon @14a * //
translated: ‚ÄúO Son of the Conqueror, these three realms are mind only.‚ÄùüîΩThis is true, but in order to eliminate the attachment of those who are to be trained and who cling to form, etc.,

original: par zhen pa spang ba'i phyir yin no //üîΩdon de nyid klu sgrub zhabs kyis //
analyzed: par zhen pa spang ba'i phyir yin no // don de nyid klu sgrub zhabs kyis //
translated: as real,üîΩthe venerable Nagarjuna has said,

original: 'di dag thams cad sems tsam zhes //
analyzed: 'di dag thams cad sems tsam zhes //
translated: ‚ÄúAll this is mind only.‚Äù

original: thub pa yis ni gang gsungs pa //
analyzed: thub pa yis ni gang gsungs pa //
translated: This was said

original: byis pa'i skrag pa spang phyir te //
analyzed: byis pa'i skrag pa spang phyir te //
translated: in order to eliminate the fears of the childish.

original: de ni yang dag de nyid min //
analyzed: de ni yang dag de nyid min //
translated: It is not the ultimate truth.

original: zhes gsungs pas des na sems de ni yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: zhes gsungs pas des na sems de ni yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Thus, that mind does not exist.

original: 'di ni dngos po thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni dngos po thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bstan pa yin no //
translated: This is the teaching of the reality of all things.

original: da ni nang gi bdag nyid can gyi rnal 'byor bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni nang gi bdag nyid can gyi rnal 'byor bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to teach the yoga of the inner nature,

original: skyed byed ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: skyed byed ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: [the BhagavƒÅn] declares the mother who gives birth, etc.

original: skyed byed ma ni phan pa ston par byed pa'o //
analyzed: skyed byed ma ni phan pa ston par byed pa'o //
translated: The mother who gives birth is the one who shows what is beneficial.

original: srid mo ni brtse ba can no //
analyzed: srid mo ni brtse ba can no //
translated: The aunt is the loving one.

original: gar ma ni gsal bar spyod pa'o //
analyzed: gar ma ni gsal bar spyod pa'o //
translated: The dancing girl is the one who acts with clarity.

original: chos ma ni dkar po'i las la dga' ba'o //
analyzed: chos ma ni dkar po'i las la dga' ba'o //
translated: The religious woman is the one who delights in virtuous actions.

original: rdo rje ma ni bsam gtan la dga' ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje ma ni bsam gtan la dga' ba'o //
translated: The vajra woman is the one who delights in meditation.

original: gdol pa mo ni nga rgyal spangs shing bzod pa'i ngang tshul can no //
analyzed: gdol pa mo ni nga rgyal spangs shing bzod pa'i ngang tshul can no //
translated: The untouchable woman is the one who has abandoned pride and is of a patient disposition.

original: bram ze ma ni kha na mtho ba med pa'i las la dga' ba'o //
analyzed: bram ze ma ni kha na mtho ba med pa'i las la dga' ba'o //
translated: The brahmin woman is the one who delights in actions that are not reprehensible.

original: thabs dang shes rab ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: With regard to the method and wisdom, etc.,

original: bdag med ma ni shes rab bo //
analyzed: bdag med ma ni shes rab bo //
translated: the NairƒÅtmyƒÅ is the wisdom.

original: dgyes pa'i rdo rje ni thabs so //
analyzed: dgyes pa'i rdo rje ni thabs so //
translated: The Hevajra is the method.

original: 'di dag nyid kyi gzugs can la 'chad par 'gyur ba'i lugs kyis mchod par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di dag nyid kyi gzugs can la 'chad par 'gyur ba'i lugs kyis mchod par bya'o //
translated: One should worship these very [channels] with the worship of the form [worshippers] explained below.

original: de nyid rig pas zhes bya ba ni de nyid dga' ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid rig pas zhes bya ba ni de nyid dga' ba'o //
translated: The one who knows reality is the one who delights in reality.

original: rab tu 'bad pas zhes bya ba ni gsang ba'i phyir 'bad pa ste /
analyzed: rab tu 'bad pas zhes bya ba ni gsang ba'i phyir 'bad pa ste /
translated: With effort is effort for the sake of secrecy.

original: ji ltar grags par mi 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: ji ltar grags par mi 'gyur ba'o //
translated: So that it is not known is so that it is not known as it is known.

original: grags na mthong ba dang ma mthong ba'i skyon bstan pa'i phyir ma gsang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste yi ge'i don to //
analyzed: grags na mthong ba dang ma mthong ba'i skyon bstan pa'i phyir ma gsang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste yi ge'i don to //
translated: In order to show the faults of being known and unknown, [the BhagavƒÅn] declares not secret and so on. This is the meaning of the words.

original: skyed byed ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa la skyed byed ma ni gnyis spangs pa'o //
analyzed: skyed byed ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa la skyed byed ma ni gnyis spangs pa'o //
translated: The mother of generation is the one who abandons the two [channels].

original: srin mo ni rkyang ma'o //
analyzed: srin mo ni rkyang ma'o //
translated: The rƒÅk·π£asƒ´ is the lalanƒÅ.

original: dang zhes bya ba ni ro ma bsdus te de dag mchod par bya'o //
analyzed: dang zhes bya ba ni ro ma bsdus te de dag mchod par bya'o //
translated: The word and includes the rasanƒÅ. One should worship those [channels].

original: rnal 'byor ni yang dag par sbyar ba'o /
analyzed: rnal 'byor ni yang dag par sbyar ba'o /
translated: Yoga is correct application.

original: shes rab dang thabs kyi rang bzhin can gyi rtsa gsum po de dag nyid 'byor pa las bde ba chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: shes rab dang thabs kyi rang bzhin can gyi rtsa gsum po de dag nyid 'byor pa las bde ba chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: From the union of those very three channels, which are the nature of wisdom and method, great bliss arises.

original: de'i phyir de'i rnal 'byor rig pa'i rnal 'byor pas so //
analyzed: de'i phyir de'i rnal 'byor rig pa'i rnal 'byor pas so //
translated: Therefore, the yogin who is aware of that yoga should always worship with the nature of great bliss.

original: rtag tu zhes bya ba ni dus thams cad du bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin gyis mchod pa bya'o //
analyzed: rtag tu zhes bya ba ni dus thams cad du bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin gyis mchod pa bya'o //
translated: Always means at all times.

original: gar ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa la lce dang ro dang de'i rnam par shes pa dang gsum ni gar ma'o //
analyzed: gar ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa la lce dang ro dang de'i rnam par shes pa dang gsum ni gar ma'o //
translated: The dancer, etc. The tongue, taste, and the consciousness of that are the dancer.

original: reg pa dang reg bya'i dang po dang / de'i rnam par shes pa ni tshos ma'o //
analyzed: reg pa dang reg bya'i dang po dang / de'i rnam par shes pa ni tshos ma'o //
translated: Touch, the first tangible, and the consciousness of that are the singer.

original: rna ba'i dbang po dang sgra dang de'i rnam par shes pa ni rdo rje ma'o //
analyzed: rna ba'i dbang po dang sgra dang de'i rnam par shes pa ni rdo rje ma'o //
translated: The ear faculty, sound, and the consciousness of that are the vajra woman.

original: rna dang dri dang de'i rnam par shes pa ni gdol pa ma'o //
analyzed: rna dang dri dang de'i rnam par shes pa ni gdol pa ma'o //
translated: The nose, smell, and the consciousness of that are the candali.

original: mig dang @14b gzugs dang de'i rnam par shes pa ni bram ze ma'o //
analyzed: mig dang @14b gzugs dang de'i rnam par shes pa ni bram ze ma'o //
translated: The eye, form, and the consciousness of that are the brahmani.

original: thabs dang shes rab ces bya ba la sogs pa la chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni shes rab bo //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab ces bya ba la sogs pa la chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni shes rab bo //
translated: Wisdom and means, etc. The emptiness of all phenomena is wisdom.

original: snying rje chan po ni thabs so //
analyzed: snying rje chan po ni thabs so //
translated: Great compassion is means.

original: de dag gi cho ga ni bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin gyi ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: de dag gi cho ga ni bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin gyi ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: Their rite is the meditative concentration whose nature is great bliss.

original: des rtag tu mchod pa ni /
analyzed: des rtag tu mchod pa ni /
translated: By that, one should always worship,

original: rtag tu nyams su myong bar bya //
analyzed: rtag tu nyams su myong bar bya //
translated: always experience.

original: zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning.

original: ci sgra dang gzugs dang ro la sogs pa 'di dag rnal 'byor bas yongs su spang bar bya ba zhig gam zhe na /
analyzed: ci sgra dang gzugs dang ro la sogs pa 'di dag rnal 'byor bas yongs su spang bar bya ba zhig gam zhe na /
translated: Are these sounds, forms, tastes, etc. to be completely abandoned by the yogin?

original: bstan pa nyid ces bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: bstan pa nyid ces bya ba gsungs te /
translated: He says, ‚Äútaught,‚Äù etc.

original: rab tu 'bad pas zhes bya ba ni shin tu 'bad pas so //
analyzed: rab tu 'bad pas zhes bya ba ni shin tu 'bad pas so //
translated: With great effort means with intense effort.

original: ji lar grags par zhes bya ba ni ji ltar sgra la sogs pa gsum du dmigs par mi 'gyur bar ro //
analyzed: ji lar grags par zhes bya ba ni ji ltar sgra la sogs pa gsum du dmigs par mi 'gyur bar ro //
translated: As they are known means as they are known as the three, sound, etc.

original: gal te gsum dmigs par 'gyur na skyon yod ce na /
analyzed: gal te gsum dmigs par 'gyur na skyon yod ce na /
translated: If they are known as the three, what is the problem?

original: ma gsang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: ma gsang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: He says, ‚Äúnot concealed,‚Äù etc.

original: sprul la sogs pa ni 'khor ba pa'i sdug bsngal gyis zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: sprul la sogs pa ni 'khor ba pa'i sdug bsngal gyis zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The emanation, etc. are overwhelmed by the suffering of transmigrators.

original: sbrul ni sbrul dang stag la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sbrul ni sbrul dang stag la sogs pa'o //
translated: The emanation is the snake, tiger, etc.

original: sa spyod ni sha za la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sa spyod ni sha za la sogs pa'o //
translated: The earth-wanderer is the flesh-eater, etc.

original: gal te mig la sogs pa 'di dag phyag rgya'i sgras ji ltar brjod par bya ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: gal te mig la sogs pa 'di dag phyag rgya'i sgras ji ltar brjod par bya ba yin zhe na /
translated: If these eyes, etc. are to be called seals, how are they to be called?

original: gzugs la sogs pa 'di dag nyid rigs lnga zhes byas so //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa 'di dag nyid rigs lnga zhes byas so //
translated: These very forms, etc. are called the five clans.

original: de lta na yang mi shes so zhe na /
analyzed: de lta na yang mi shes so zhe na /
translated: Even so, they are not known.

original: de'i phyir rdo rje 'dis ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir rdo rje 'dis ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: Therefore, he says, ‚ÄúBy this vajra, etc. ‚Äù

original: rdo rje ni mi phyed pa'i ye shes te 'di dag gdab pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje ni mi phyed pa'i ye shes te 'di dag gdab pa'o //
translated: Vajra is the indivisible intuition. It is the seal.

original: rgyas gdab pa ni gdab pa ste /
analyzed: rgyas gdab pa ni gdab pa ste /
translated: The sealing is the seal.

original: 'dis bde ba chen po skyed par byed pas na de'i rgyus phyag rgya zhes brjod par bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'dis bde ba chen po skyed par byed pas na de'i rgyus phyag rgya zhes brjod par bya ba'o //
translated: Since it generates the great bliss, it is to be called a seal by reason of that.üîΩBy the vajra lotus, etc. he clarifies that very meaning which was taught.üîΩThe clan, etc. is the vajra lotus, etc.üîΩThe clan, etc. is the vajra lotus, etc.

original: rdo rje padma zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni bstan pa'i don de nyid gsal bar byed do //
analyzed: rdo rje padma zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni bstan pa'i don de nyid gsal bar byed do //
