original: rigs ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rdo rje padma zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //üîΩde bzhin nyid gshegs shing zhes bya ba ni 'od gsal bar zhugs pa'o //
analyzed: rigs ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rdo rje padma zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //üîΩde bzhin nyid gshegs shing zhes bya ba ni 'od gsal bar zhugs pa'o //
translated: The clan, etc. is the vajra lotus, etc.üîΩThe clan,

original: dpal ldan zhes bya ba ni bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yang dag par bsags pa'o //
analyzed: dpal ldan zhes bya ba ni bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yang dag par bsags pa'o //
translated: The glorious one is the one who has accumulated the collections of merit and knowledge.

original: slar yang gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni 'od gsal ba las langs nas 'gro ba rnams kyi don mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: slar yang gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni 'od gsal ba las langs nas 'gro ba rnams kyi don mdzad pa'o //
translated: Again, gone means that, having arisen from clear light, he performs the welfare of transmigrators.

original: rigs ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la thugs dang / rtag pa dang / rin po che dang / gsung dang don yod pa dang / snying stobs can te rigs drug go //
analyzed: rigs ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la thugs dang / rtag pa dang / rin po che dang / gsung dang don yod pa dang / snying stobs can te rigs drug go //
translated: The family and so forth are the six families of mind, permanence, jewel, speech, Amogha, and sattva.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' bsdus na rigs lnga'o //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' bsdus na rigs lnga'o //
translated: When condensed, Vajrasattva is the five families.

original: de dag kyang bsdus na mi bskyod pa dang rtag pa dang gsung gi bdag po zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de dag kyang bsdus na mi bskyod pa dang rtag pa dang gsung gi bdag po zhes bya ba'o //
translated: When condensed, those are Akshobhya, Ratnasambhava, and Amitabha, called the lord of speech.

original: 'di skad @15a * //üîΩbstan par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di skad @15a * // bstan par 'gyur te /
translated: This is taught:

original: mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid ces bya ba'i rigs drug ni mdor bsdus na gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'o //
analyzed: mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid ces bya ba'i rigs drug ni mdor bsdus na gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'o //
translated: The six families called eye, ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind are, in brief, the five Tathagatas called form, feeling, discrimination, compositional factors, and consciousness.

original: yang de ni rnal 'byor pa'i lus dang ngag dang yid ces bya ba'i rigs gsum mo //
analyzed: yang de ni rnal 'byor pa'i lus dang ngag dang yid ces bya ba'i rigs gsum mo //
translated: Moreover, that is the three types of the yogi's body, speech, and mind.

original: sgom pa po med ces bya ba la sogs pa la chos thams cad de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir sgom pa po dang / bsgoms pa dang / bsgom par bya ba gsum don dam par dmigs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sgom pa po med ces bya ba la sogs pa la chos thams cad de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir sgom pa po dang / bsgoms pa dang / bsgom par bya ba gsum don dam par dmigs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: As for there is no meditator, and so on, because all phenomena are the nature of suchness, the three: meditator, meditation, and object of meditation, are ultimately not observed.

original: de ltar na ji ltar 'jig rten gyis mthong bar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar na ji ltar 'jig rten gyis mthong bar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: If that is so, then how can the world see?

original: spros pa med pa'i rang bzhin las //üîΩzhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: spros pa med pa'i rang bzhin las // zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: As for from the nature free of elaborations,

original: spros pa ni sna tshogs kyi mtshan nyid can no //
analyzed: spros pa ni sna tshogs kyi mtshan nyid can no //
translated: elaboration has the characteristic of variety.

original: de'i gcig dang du ma'i rang bzhin dang bral ba nyid kyi de dag gi skye ba med pa'i mtshan nyid ni de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: de'i gcig dang du ma'i rang bzhin dang bral ba nyid kyi de dag gi skye ba med pa'i mtshan nyid ni de bzhin nyid do //
translated: Since that is free from the nature of one and many, their characteristic of non-arising is suchness.

original: rnam pa de lta bur yod do zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: rnam pa de lta bur yod do zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o //
translated: It is intended that it exists in that way.

original: rnam snang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: rnam snang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: As for Vairochana, and so on,

original: 'od gsal ba de nyid ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi rang bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: 'od gsal ba de nyid ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi rang bzhin nyid do //
translated: That very luminosity is the nature of Vairocana.

original: de nyid ni mi bskyod pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid ni mi bskyod pa ste /
translated: That very [luminosity] is Ak·π£obhya,

original: nyon mongs pa las bskyod par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa las bskyod par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it cannot be shaken by afflictions.

original: de nyid ni don yod de /
analyzed: de nyid ni don yod de /
translated: That very [luminosity] is Amoghasiddhi,

original: rnam pa thams cad kyis 'gro ba rnams kyi don mdzad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad kyis 'gro ba rnams kyi don mdzad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it accomplishes the welfare of beings in all aspects.

original: de nyid ni rin chen te /
analyzed: de nyid ni rin chen te /
translated: That very [luminosity] is Ratnasa·πÉbhava,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos rin po che thams cad kyi rten du gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos rin po che thams cad kyi rten du gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the basis of all the precious qualities of a buddha.

original: de nyid ni 'khor 'das te /
analyzed: de nyid ni 'khor 'das te /
translated: That very [luminosity] is AmitƒÅbha,

original: de dag rnam pa thams cad yongs su spyod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag rnam pa thams cad yongs su spyod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it enjoys all those [qualities] in all aspects.

original: de nyid ni sems dpa' ste /
analyzed: de nyid ni sems dpa' ste /
translated: That very [luminosity] is Vajrasattva,

original: ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin gyi phyir ro //
analyzed: ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin gyi phyir ro //
translated: because it has the nature of the five wisdoms.

original: tshangs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: tshangs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: As for BrahmƒÅ and so forth,

original: de nyid ni tshangs pa la sogs pa yin par brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid ni tshangs pa la sogs pa yin par brjod par bya'o //
translated: it should be said that that very [luminosity] is BrahmƒÅ and so forth.

original: ji ltar byas nas she na /
analyzed: ji ltar byas nas she na /
translated: How is that?

original: sgrib bral zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: sgrib bral zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: It is said, free from obscurations.

original: nyon mongs pa rnams lhag ma ma lus par bral ba ni thar pa ste /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa rnams lhag ma ma lus par bral ba ni thar pa ste /
translated: Liberation is the complete separation from the afflictions.

original: ye shes kyi gzugs can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ye shes kyi gzugs can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is the form of transcendent wisdom.

original: sangs rgyas kyi de kho na nyid ni sangs rgyas te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi de kho na nyid ni sangs rgyas te /
translated: The reality of the Buddha is the Buddha.

original: de lta bas na de nyid ni sangs rgyas so //
analyzed: de lta bas na de nyid ni sangs rgyas so //
translated: Therefore, that is the Buddha.

original: 'jug phyir zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: 'jug phyir zhes bya ba la /
translated: Because of its engagement,

original: de nyid du de'i bdag nyid kyi 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid du de'i bdag nyid kyi 'jug pa'o //
translated: it is engaged in that reality as its own nature.üîΩIt is always virtuous, because that is the suchness of supreme virtue.

original: rtag tu dge ba zhes bya ba ni de nyid ni mchog tu dge ba'i de bzhin nyid yin pa'i phyir zhi ba nyid do //
analyzed: rtag tu dge ba zhes bya ba ni de nyid ni mchog tu dge ba'i de bzhin nyid yin pa'i phyir zhi ba nyid do //
translated: It is peace.

original: thams cad kun gyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: thams cad kun gyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: It is all, etc.

original: ji ltar na de thams cad yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar na de thams cad yin zhe na /
translated: How is it all?

original: gang gi @15b phyir 'dis rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba thams cad la mngon par khyab pa de'i phyir de thams cad ces bya'o //
analyzed: gang gi @15b phyir 'dis rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba thams cad la mngon par khyab pa de'i phyir de thams cad ces bya'o //
translated: Because it pervades all moving and unmoving things, it is called all.

original: dam pa'i bde ba zhes bya ba ni zag pa med pa'i bde ba'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dam pa'i bde ba zhes bya ba ni zag pa med pa'i bde ba'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is the highest bliss, because it is the nature of undefiled bliss.

original: de nyid ni de kho na nyid ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid ni de kho na nyid ces bya ba'o //
translated: That is reality.

original: rnam sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni de nyid bla na med pa'i dka' ba'i tsho rab yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni de nyid bla na med pa'i dka' ba'i tsho rab yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The term fully enlightened is because of being the supreme, unsurpassed, and excellent stage.

original: changs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa mdor bstan pa'i rgyas par bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: changs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa mdor bstan pa'i rgyas par bstan pa yin no //
translated: The term vajra and so forth is the explanation of the brief explanation.

original: gal te 'dis dngos po thams cad la khyab par gyur pa zhig yin na /
analyzed: gal te 'dis dngos po thams cad la khyab par gyur pa zhig yin na /
translated: If this pervades all things,

original: 'di ji ltar goms par bya bar nus //
analyzed: 'di ji ltar goms par bya bar nus //
translated: how can it be cultivated?

original: gang du ni goms par bya zhes som nyi za na de'i phyir /
analyzed: gang du ni goms par bya zhes som nyi za na de'i phyir /
translated: If there is doubt as to where it is cultivated, then for that reason it is said:

original: gang phyir lus las byung ba nyid //
analyzed: gang phyir lus las byung ba nyid //
translated: because it arises from the body itself.üîΩThe term vajra and so forth is the explanation of the brief explanation.üîΩIf this pervades all things,

original: ces bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: ces bya ba gsungs te /
translated: how can it be cultivated?üîΩIf there is doubt as to where it is cultivated, then for that reason it is said:üîΩbecause it arises from the body itself.üîΩThe term vajra and so forth is the explanation of the brief explanation.

original: da ni  lus nyid las byung ba'i phyir de lus nyid la goms par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: da ni  lus nyid las byung ba'i phyir de lus nyid la goms par bya ba yin no //
translated: Now, because it arises from the body itself, it is cultivated in the body itself.

original: de lta bas na /
analyzed: de lta bas na /
translated: Therefore,

original: lha zhes mngon par brjod par bya //
analyzed: lha zhes mngon par brjod par bya //
translated: it should be expressed as the deity.

original: zhes bya ba ste dgyes pa'i rdo rje dang rdo rje rnal 'byor ma la sogs pa'i lha rnams te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste dgyes pa'i rdo rje dang rdo rje rnal 'byor ma la sogs pa'i lha rnams te /
translated: The deities are Hevajra, Vajrayoginƒ´, and so forth.

original: de dag nyid bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin can kyi gnyis su med pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: de dag nyid bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin can kyi gnyis su med pa'i ye shes so //
translated: They are the nondual wisdom that has the nature of great bliss.

original: de nyid ni lus la gnas pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: de nyid ni lus la gnas pa nyid yin no //
translated: That itself is the one abiding in the body.

original: de nyid ni don dam par na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid ni don dam par na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya'o //
translated: That itself is the Bhagavat Buddha in the ultimate sense.

original: ji ltar na bcom ldan 'das zhes brjod par bya zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar na bcom ldan 'das zhes brjod par bya zhe na /
translated: How is he to be called the Bhagavat?

original: bcom pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: bcom pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: He is called the Bhagavat because he has destroyed the afflictions, etc.

original: da ni skyed byed ces bya ba la sogs pa'i sgras bla na med pa'i shes rab brjod par bya ba yin pas phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid can las khyad par du bstan par bya ba'i phyir /üîΩma zhes brjod ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: da ni skyed byed ces bya ba la sogs pa'i sgras bla na med pa'i shes rab brjod par bya ba yin pas phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid can las khyad par du bstan par bya ba'i phyir / ma zhes brjod ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Now, since the word ‚Äúmother,‚Äù etc., is to be explained as unsurpassed wisdom, in order to demonstrate its distinction from the internal and external selves, he says:

original: bde ba chen po'i rnam pa sna tshogs pa 'di dag skyed par byed pas ma zhes brjod do //
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i rnam pa sna tshogs pa 'di dag skyed par byed pas ma zhes brjod do //
translated: She is called ‚Äúmother‚Äù because she gives birth to the various aspects of great bliss.

original: kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bden pa dag rnam par 'byed par byed pa'i phyir sring mo'o //
analyzed: kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bden pa dag rnam par 'byed par byed pa'i phyir sring mo'o //
translated: She is called ‚Äúsister‚Äù because she distinguishes the conventional and ultimate truths.üîΩShe is called ‚Äúwasherwoman‚Äù because she cleanses the stains of the afflictions.

original: btso blag ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: btso blag ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: She is called ‚Äúwife‚Äù because she is the abode of the bliss of no-self.

original: bla na med pa'i bde bas sems can thams cad la chags par 'gyur ba'i phyir btso blag ma'i //
analyzed: bla na med pa'i bde bas sems can thams cad la chags par 'gyur ba'i phyir btso blag ma'i //
translated: Since it is attached to all sentient beings with unsurpassed bliss, it is the washerwoman.

original: bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rnams kyis yongs su 'gengs par byed pa'i phyir bu mo'o //
analyzed: bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rnams kyis yongs su 'gengs par byed pa'i phyir bu mo'o //
translated: Since it fills with the unsurpassed qualities of a Buddha, it is the girl.

original: las dang po'i sems can rnams kyis brtan par bya bar mi nus pa'i phyir gar ma'o //
analyzed: las dang po'i sems can rnams kyis brtan par bya bar mi nus pa'i phyir gar ma'o //
translated: Since it cannot be sustained by beginner sentient beings, it is the dancer.

original: dbang po rnams kyi yul ma yin pa'i phyir g-yung mo zhes bya ba'i sgras brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: dbang po rnams kyi yul ma yin pa'i phyir g-yung mo zhes bya ba'i sgras brjod par bya'o //
translated: Since it is not the object of the senses, it should be expressed by the word ‚Äúprostitute.‚Äù

original: gal te thams cad rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i nang du 'dus par 'gyur na /
analyzed: gal te thams cad rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i nang du 'dus par 'gyur na /
translated: If everything is included in the stage of completion,üîΩthen what is the point of the mantra repetitions, meditative stabilities,

analyzed: de lta bas na gang gi phyir mchog tu snying po 'gyur ba de rnam par bsam par bya'o //

analyzed: 'od gsal ba'i mtshan nyid de nyid rnam par bsam par bya ba yin pas de'i phyir de nyid bsam par bya ba'o //

original: pha ni rdo rje 'chang ste gsum pa'i don @16b gyi bdun pa yin te /
analyzed: pha ni rdo rje 'chang ste gsum pa'i don @16b gyi bdun pa yin te /

analyzed: rdo rje 'chang gis brnyes pa'i bde ba gang yin pa'i bde ba bskyed par bya'o //

analyzed: rang gis zhes bya ba ni phyi rol gyi phyag rgya la ltos pa med pa nyid du nye bar spyod par byed pa'o //

translated: The three terms one who meditates, that which is to be meditated upon, and meditation do not exist in the meditation of clear light, as stated in the lines beginning with there is no meditation, and so on. How then is it to be cultivated?

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /

original: 'chi ba ni thar pa'o //
analyzed: 'chi ba ni thar pa'o //

analyzed: de nyid du sems dang sems las byung ba dang ma rig pa'i mtshan nyid rnams nub par gyur pa de ni 'chi ba zhes bya'o //

original: bde ba gang gis zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa ma lus pa zad pa'i mtshan nyid can bde ba chen po zhes bya ba'o //

original: dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i dka' 'grel rnal 'byor rin po che'i phreng ba las lnga pa de kho na nyid kyi le'u'i 'grel pa'o /
analyzed: dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i dka' 'grel rnal 'byor rin po che'i phreng ba las lnga pa de kho na nyid kyi le'u'i 'grel pa'o /

original: // / da ni rnal 'byor pa rtag tu bsgom pa la dga' ba yin du zin kyang spyod pa med par myur du byang chub thob par mi 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa'i phyir /üîΩde nas gzhan yang rab bshad bya //
analyzed: // / da ni rnal 'byor pa rtag tu bsgom pa la dga' ba yin du zin kyang spyod pa med par myur du byang chub thob par mi 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa'i phyir / de nas gzhan yang rab bshad bya //
translated: Now, in order to teach that even if a yogi is always delighted in meditation, without conduct he will not quickly attain enlightenment,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: [the BhagavƒÅn] declares, ‚ÄúNow, moreover, I will explain . . .‚Äù

analyzed: bla ma sangs rgyas kyi bka' dang / dka' thub kyi sdug bsngal byed pa ni spyod pa ste bshad par bya ba'o //

original: pha rol song zhes bya ba ni shin tu 'jig rten las 'das pa'o //
analyzed: pha rol song zhes bya ba ni shin tu 'jig rten las 'das pa'o //

original: mchog ni gtso bor gyur pa ste /
analyzed: mchog ni gtso bor gyur pa ste /

original: gang gis rtogs par 'gyur zhing rab tu go bar 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: gang gis rtogs par 'gyur zhing rab tu go bar 'gyur ba'o //
translated: It is that by which one realizes and fully understands.

original: gang gis zhes bya ba ni gang gis so //
analyzed: gang gis zhes bya ba ni gang gis so //

original: ci zhig rab tu go bar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: ci zhig rab tu go bar 'gyur zhe na /

original: grub mtha' nges par zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: grub mtha' nges par zhes bya ba'o //

original: dngos grub rgyu zhes bya ba ni dngos grub kyi don du tshe 'di nyid la dngos grub 'byung ngam mi 'byung ba mtshan ma thob pa la nges par 'gyur pa'o //
analyzed: dngos grub rgyu zhes bya ba ni dngos grub kyi don du tshe 'di nyid la dngos grub 'byung ngam mi 'byung ba mtshan ma thob pa la nges par 'gyur pa'o //
translated: ‚Äú The cause of power‚Äù means that for the sake of power, whether power arises in this very life or not is ascertained by obtaining the signs.

original: sgom pa po zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa spyod pa ste /
analyzed: sgom pa po zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa spyod pa ste /
translated: ‚Äú The meditator‚Äù is the practitioner.

original: lha rdzas kyi rung pa'i rang bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: lha rdzas kyi rung pa'i rang bzhin nyid do //
translated: The nature of the divine substance is the five ambrosias.

original: mi 'chi ba cu phyed ni bdud rtsi lnga'o //
analyzed: mi 'chi ba cu phyed ni bdud rtsi lnga'o //
translated: ‚Äú The half-death‚Äù is the five ambrosias.

original: he ru ka sbyor zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: he ru ka sbyor zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: ‚Äú The union of Heruka‚Äù and so on.

original: gnas zhes bya ba ni slong mo pa la sogs pa rgyu ba'o //
analyzed: gnas zhes bya ba ni slong mo pa la sogs pa rgyu ba'o //
translated: ‚Äú The place‚Äù is the wandering of the mendicant and so on.

original: rigs lnga ni shin tu dman par 'gyur ba'am /
analyzed: rigs lnga ni shin tu dman par 'gyur ba'am /
translated: ‚Äú The five clans‚Äù are the five clans of the yoginƒ´s.

analyzed: rigs lnga zhes bya ba 'di bden pa la mngon par zhen pa'i byis pas rnam par brtags pa ste /

analyzed: sdig pa la sogs pa'i skyon dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir zhes @17a * //

original: byas nas so //
analyzed: byas nas so //

analyzed: rang gi ngo bos ni rigs gcig kho na yin te /

original: ji ltar byas nas she na /
analyzed: ji ltar byas nas she na /
translated: How is this so?

original: rigs dag du ma nyid kyis ni //
analyzed: rigs dag du ma nyid kyis ni //
translated: Because of the purity of the family,

original: gang phyir dbye ba mtshon mi bya //üîΩzhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: gang phyir dbye ba mtshon mi bya // zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: the divisions are not to be indicated.

original: skye ba tha dad pa'i srog chags rnams kyi rnam pa tha dad pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: skye ba tha dad pa'i srog chags rnams kyi rnam pa tha dad pa nyid yin no //
translated: The different forms of living beings who are born in different ways are different.

original: 'di lta ste glang po rta dang phag dag gi rigs gcig pa rnams kyi rnam pa ni gcig pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: 'di lta ste glang po rta dang phag dag gi rigs gcig pa rnams kyi rnam pa ni gcig pa nyid yin te /
translated: For example, the different forms of those who are of the same family, such as elephants, horses, and pigs, are the same.

original: ji ltar ba lang dag dang glang po ni glang po dag dang ngo //
analyzed: ji ltar ba lang dag dang glang po ni glang po dag dang ngo //

original: de dag kyang kha dog tha dad kyang rigs tha dad du mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: de dag kyang kha dog tha dad kyang rigs tha dad du mi 'gyur te /

original: de ltar na 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du yang rigs gcig pa nyid du grub na /
analyzed: de ltar na 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du yang rigs gcig pa nyid du grub na /
translated: Thus, even in worldly convention, the family is established as one.

original: rnal 'byor gyi kun rdzob tu lta smos kyang ci dgos te /
analyzed: rnal 'byor gyi kun rdzob tu lta smos kyang ci dgos te /
translated: What need is there to mention the conventional of the yogi?

original: thog pa med pa dang ldan pa'i 'khor bar thams cad kyang rigs thams cad yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thog pa med pa dang ldan pa'i 'khor bar thams cad kyang rigs thams cad yin pa'i phyir ro //

original: spyod pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i gnas bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: spyod pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i gnas bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach the abode that is in accord with conduct, he says,

original: shing gcig gam zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: shing gcig gam zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: The one tree and so forth are stated.

original: gang gi grib ma shing gzhan la mi 'phog cing gang gzhan gyi grib mas kyang mi 'phog pa de ni shing gcig go //
analyzed: gang gi grib ma shing gzhan la mi 'phog cing gang gzhan gyi grib mas kyang mi 'phog pa de ni shing gcig go //
translated: That which is not shaded by another tree, and which does not shade another, is the one tree.

original: gtsor rnal 'byor rgyun mi gcod pa 'di ni spyod pa ste /
analyzed: gtsor rnal 'byor rgyun mi gcod pa 'di ni spyod pa ste /
translated: This is the practice, the principal uninterrupted yoga.

original: shing gcig la sogs pa dben par rigs so zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: shing gcig la sogs pa dben par rigs so zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: It is intended that in a solitary place such as a one tree.

original: 'di ni ma brtags pa dang yid gnyis kyis bya ba ni ma yin no zhes bya ba bslab pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'di ni ma brtags pa dang yid gnyis kyis bya ba ni ma yin no zhes bya ba bslab pa'i phyir /
translated: This is for the purpose of training in the thought, One should not act with doubt and without examination.

original: cung zad drod ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: cung zad drod ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Thus, a little heat and so forth are stated.

original: drod ni ting nge 'dzin dang sngags las byung ba'i mthu ste /
analyzed: drod ni ting nge 'dzin dang sngags las byung ba'i mthu ste /
translated: Heat is the power arising from mantra and samadhi.

original: de thob par gyur nas bya'o zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: de thob par gyur nas bya'o zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o //
translated: Having attained that, one should act, is the intention.

original: sbrul dang stag dang mi dad mi ma yin pa la sogs pas ji ltar zil gyis mi non cing bsrung bar 'gyur la /
analyzed: sbrul dang stag dang mi dad mi ma yin pa la sogs pas ji ltar zil gyis mi non cing bsrung bar 'gyur la /
translated: By what means is one not overcome and protected by snakes, tigers, humans, non-humans, and so forth?

original: de dag gis mi 'jigs pa dang bkres pa dang sgom pa la sogs pas kyang mi gnod pa ste /
analyzed: de dag gis mi 'jigs pa dang bkres pa dang sgom pa la sogs pas kyang mi gnod pa ste /
translated: They are not harmed by fear, hunger, meditation, and so on.üîΩIf one wishes to attain the Great Seal in this very life, then one should practice this conduct.

original: gal te tshe 'di nyid la phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub thob par 'dod par 'gyur pa de'i tshe spyod pa 'di spyad par bya'o zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: gal te tshe 'di nyid la phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub thob par 'dod par 'gyur pa de'i tshe spyod pa 'di spyad par bya'o zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: This is the intended meaning.

original: rdo rje bu mo 'di khyer nas //
analyzed: rdo rje bu mo 'di khyer nas //
translated: Taking this vajra girl,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: and so on.

original: rdo rje rigs kyi bu mo kho na'o //
analyzed: rdo rje rigs kyi bu mo kho na'o //
translated: She is only a girl of the vajra family.

original: rtogs par bya ba ni rigs pa nyid yin pas te /
analyzed: rtogs par bya ba ni rigs pa nyid yin pas te /
translated: Realization is the very lineage,

original: de ni rigs rnams kyi mchog nyid yin pa'i phyir dang / gzhan gyis mi 'phrogs pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni rigs rnams kyi mchog nyid yin pa'i phyir dang / gzhan gyis mi 'phrogs pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the supreme of the lineages and because it is not taken away by others.

original: byang chub sa bon nyams myong ba //
analyzed: byang chub sa bon nyams myong ba //
translated: Experiencing the seed of enlightenment

original: zhes bya ba ni dbang bskur ba la sogs pas de 'dus byas pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dbang bskur ba la sogs pas de 'dus byas pa'o //
translated: is the creation of that by means of initiation and so on.

original: rdo rje mchog dang ldan pa ni bde @17b ba chen po'i ye shes te de brjod pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje mchog dang ldan pa ni bde @17b ba chen po'i ye shes te de brjod pa'o //
translated: Endowed with the supreme vajra is the gnosis of great bliss, which is expressed.üîΩWith vajra feet,

original: rdo rje rkang pas zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: rdo rje rkang pas zhes bya ba la /
translated: and so on.

original: rdo rje ni dgyes pa'i rdo rje'o //
analyzed: rdo rje ni dgyes pa'i rdo rje'o //
translated: Vajra means Hevajra.

original: de'i rkang pa ni go 'phang ste /
analyzed: de'i rkang pa ni go 'phang ste /
translated: His feet are his state,

original: g-yas brkyang ba dang / g-yon brkyang ba dang / zlum po dang / sa ga dang / skyil krung phyed pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: g-yas brkyang ba dang / g-yon brkyang ba dang / zlum po dang / sa ga dang / skyil krung phyed pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: which are right-extended, left-extended, round, half-moon, and so forth.

original: zhe sdang rnam dag ces bya ba ni dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: zhe sdang rnam dag ces bya ba ni dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The pure hatred is the purity of Hevajra.

original: rtag tu zhes bya ba ni rtag par rgyun du'o //
analyzed: rtag tu zhes bya ba ni rtag par rgyun du'o //
translated: Always means constantly.

original: sman zhes bya ba ni bzhi mnyam pa'o //
analyzed: sman zhes bya ba ni bzhi mnyam pa'o //
translated: The medicine is the four equal [substances].

original: chu ni mi bskyod pa'o //
analyzed: chu ni mi bskyod pa'o //
translated: The water is Akshobhya.

original: rtag par zhas bya ba ni rtag pa nyid du'o //
analyzed: rtag par zhas bya ba ni rtag pa nyid du'o //
translated: Always means constantly.

original: rgas pa ni gnyer ma dang skra dkar 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: rgas pa ni gnyer ma dang skra dkar 'byung ba'o //
translated: Old age is the appearance of wrinkles and gray hair.

original: bsrung bar gyur pa zhes bya ba ni 'byung po dang sha phral sogs pas gzung bar mi nus pa'o //
analyzed: bsrung bar gyur pa zhes bya ba ni 'byung po dang sha phral sogs pas gzung bar mi nus pa'o //
translated: The protection is the inability to be seized by bhutas, vetalas, and so forth.

original: rkun ma'i skra zhes bya ba ni dbyangs pa'i skra'o //
analyzed: rkun ma'i skra zhes bya ba ni dbyangs pa'i skra'o //
translated: The hair of the thief is the hair of the chanter.

original: h'um byung zhes bya ba ni dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i gzugs so //
analyzed: h'um byung zhes bya ba ni dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i gzugs so //
translated: The hum-born is the form of Hevajra.

original: thod pa ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas lnga'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: thod pa ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas lnga'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The skull is the nature of the five Buddhas, Akshobhya and so on.

original: rnal 'byor ni thabs dang shes rab kyi rnal 'byor gyi snyoms par 'jug pa'o ;
analyzed: rnal 'byor ni thabs dang shes rab kyi rnal 'byor gyi snyoms par 'jug pa'o ;
translated: Yoga is the meditative concentration of the yoga of means and wisdom.

original: / de'i rol pa ni phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid can gyi mchod pa'o //
analyzed: / de'i rol pa ni phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid can gyi mchod pa'o //
translated: Its play is the worship which is of the nature of the outer and inner.

original: de'i phyir thod pa'i dum bu sor lnga pa 'dzin par mdzad do zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir thod pa'i dum bu sor lnga pa 'dzin par mdzad do zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o //
translated: Therefore, he holds the skull-cup, which is five cubits in size.

original: skra'i skye rags ni skra'i tha gu'o //
analyzed: skra'i skye rags ni skra'i tha gu'o //
translated: The hair-tuft is a lock of hair.

original: thal ba ni thal bas bskus pa'o //
analyzed: thal ba ni thal bas bskus pa'o //

original: skra'i mchod phyir thogs zhes bya ba ni skra'i mchod phyir thogs pa nyid do //
analyzed: skra'i mchod phyir thogs zhes bya ba ni skra'i mchod phyir thogs pa nyid do //

original: ngo tsha ba ni ngo tsha ba nyid do //
analyzed: ngo tsha ba ni ngo tsha ba nyid do //

original: gnyid ni rnal 'byor gyi bar chad chen po'o //
analyzed: gnyid ni rnal 'byor gyi bar chad chen po'o //

original: lus dang srog la chags pa ni de bzhin nyid du spang par bya'o //
analyzed: lus dang srog la chags pa ni de bzhin nyid du spang par bya'o //
translated: Attachment to body and life is to be abandoned in such a way.

original: the tshom med par zhes bya ba ni the tshom dang bral bar gyur pas zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: the tshom med par zhes bya ba ni the tshom dang bral bar gyur pas zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Without doubt means without doubt, i.e. having become free from doubt.

original: lus dag ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: lus dag ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: As for purifying the body, and so forth,

original: dang por de sangs rgyas thams cad dang / sems can thams cad la dbul zhing sbyin pa'o //
analyzed: dang por de sangs rgyas thams cad dang / sems can thams cad la dbul zhing sbyin pa'o //
translated: first, one should offer it to all the Buddhas and all sentient beings.

original: skal dang skal min zhes bya ba ni mkho 'am mi mkho dpyod pa rnam par spangs nas ltos pa med par sbyin pa'o //
analyzed: skal dang skal min zhes bya ba ni mkho 'am mi mkho dpyod pa rnam par spangs nas ltos pa med par sbyin pa'o //
translated: As for whether it is appropriate or not, one should give without regard, having abandoned the analysis of whether it is needed or not.

original: mngon phyag 'tshal zhes bya ba ni phyag bya ba ste /
analyzed: mngon phyag 'tshal zhes bya ba ni phyag bya ba ste /
translated: As for bowing, one should bow.

original: phyag ma byas na mnar med par ltung ba'o //
analyzed: phyag ma byas na mnar med par ltung ba'o //
translated: If one does not bow, one will fall into the Avƒ´ci hell.

original: spang ba'i rgyu'i phyir zhes bya ba ni yongs su spang ba'i ched du'o //
analyzed: spang ba'i rgyu'i phyir zhes bya ba ni yongs su spang ba'i ched du'o //
translated: As for in order to abandon, it is for the sake of complete abandonment.

original: dus su za ba ni bslab pa'o //
analyzed: dus su za ba ni bslab pa'o //
translated: Eating at the proper time is the training.

original: skra breg  pa la sogs pa ni dbang ngo //
analyzed: skra breg  pa la sogs pa ni dbang ngo //
translated: Shaving the head and so forth is the empowerment.

original: dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin gyis //
analyzed: dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin gyis //
translated: By the nature of all things,

original: zhes bya ba ni gnas skabs thams cad du kye'i rdo rje'i nga rgyal gyis gnas pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gnas skabs thams cad du kye'i rdo rje'i nga rgyal gyis gnas pa'o //
translated: one should abide with the pride of Hevajra in all situations.

original: sbyin sreg ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: sbyin sreg ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: As for fire sacrifice, and so forth,

original: dgyes @18a * //
analyzed: dgyes @18a * //
translated: one should delightüîΩin the fire sacrifice of the aggregates.

original: pa'i rdo rjer lhag par mos pa nyid kyis 'di la lhag par rnal 'byor brtan par bya ba'i phyir phyi rol gyi sbyin sreg la sogs pa yongs su spang ba'o //
analyzed: pa'i rdo rjer lhag par mos pa nyid kyis 'di la lhag par rnal 'byor brtan par bya ba'i phyir phyi rol gyi sbyin sreg la sogs pa yongs su spang ba'o //
translated: In order to stabilize the yoga in this [system] by means of the special devotion to Hevajra, [the practitioner] should abandon external fire sacrifices, etc.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: gang gi phyir dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i bdag nyid can 'dis gang cung zhig ci za ba de nyid sbyin sreg yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i bdag nyid can 'dis gang cung zhig ci za ba de nyid sbyin sreg yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because whatever this [practitioner], who is of the nature of Hevajra, eats, that itself is the fire sacrifice.

original: mchod sbyin ni phyag rgyal brten pa'o //
analyzed: mchod sbyin ni phyag rgyal brten pa'o //
translated: The worship is the reliance on the consort.

original: lus kyi las thams cad ni dka' thub bo //
analyzed: lus kyi las thams cad ni dka' thub bo //

original: cang te'u'i sgra dang kha tv'am 'dzin pa ni sngags dang bsam gtan no //
analyzed: cang te'u'i sgra dang kha tv'am 'dzin pa ni sngags dang bsam gtan no //
translated: The sound of the hand-drum and the holding of the kha·π≠vƒÅ·πÖga are the mantra and the meditation.

original: yang na rdo rje glu dang rdo rje gar ni sngags dang bsam gtan no //
analyzed: yang na rdo rje glu dang rdo rje gar ni sngags dang bsam gtan no //
translated: Or else, the vajra song and the vajra dance are the mantra and the meditation.

original: de'i phyir 'dis gang byed pa de ni dam tshig yin la /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'dis gang byed pa de ni dam tshig yin la /
translated: Therefore, whatever is done by this [practitioner] is the commitment.

original: gang mi byed pa de ni sdom pa yin no //
analyzed: gang mi byed pa de ni sdom pa yin no //
translated: And whatever is not done is the vow.

original: rgyud 'dir dman pa dang bar ma dang mchog dang shin tu mchog tu gyur pa'i sems can gyi dbye bas phyag rgya rnam pa bzhi bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: rgyud 'dir dman pa dang bar ma dang mchog dang shin tu mchog tu gyur pa'i sems can gyi dbye bas phyag rgya rnam pa bzhi bstan pa yin no //
translated: In this Tantra, the four seals are taught by the division of inferior, middling, and superior, and very superior sentient beings.

original: de la shin tu mchog tu gyur pa'i sems can gyis ni brgyal dbang bzhi pa bskur ba dang dus mnyam du phyag rgya chen po mngon sum du byed pa yang srid pas logs shig tu spyod pa ma gsungs so //
analyzed: de la shin tu mchog tu gyur pa'i sems can gyis ni brgyal dbang bzhi pa bskur ba dang dus mnyam du phyag rgya chen po mngon sum du byed pa yang srid pas logs shig tu spyod pa ma gsungs so //
translated: There, it is possible that a very superior sentient being will actualize the Great Seal simultaneously with the bestowal of the fourth initiation, so it is not taught separately.

original: de'i phyir dbang po dman pa dang 'bring dang mchog tu gyur pa'i slob ma rnams la spyod pa med par myur du byang chub thob par mi 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa'i phyir spyod pa rnam pa gsum gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir dbang po dman pa dang 'bring dang mchog tu gyur pa'i slob ma rnams la spyod pa med par myur du byang chub thob par mi 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa'i phyir spyod pa rnam pa gsum gsungs pa yin te /
translated: Therefore, it is taught that inferior, middling, and superior disciples will not quickly attain enlightenment without the practice, so three kinds of practice are taught.

original: spros bcas dang spros med dang shin tu spros pa med pa'o //
analyzed: spros bcas dang spros med dang shin tu spros pa med pa'o //
translated: They are elaborate, unelaborate, and very unelaborate.

original: 'di ni spros pa med pa'i spyod pa ste /
analyzed: 'di ni spros pa med pa'i spyod pa ste /

original: dbang po dman pa dang bar ma'i phyir gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: dbang po dman pa dang bar ma'i phyir gsungs pa yin no //

original: dbang po mchog tu gyur pa rnams la ni le'u bcu bzhi pa las kye'i rdo rje'i rnal 'byor ma zhes bya ba la sogs pas shin tu spros pa med pa'i spyod pa ston par mdzad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dbang po mchog tu gyur pa rnams la ni le'u bcu bzhi pa las kye'i rdo rje'i rnal 'byor ma zhes bya ba la sogs pas shin tu spros pa med pa'i spyod pa ston par mdzad par 'gyur ro //
translated: For those of the highest faculties, the fourteenth chapter will teach the extremely unelaborate conduct, beginning with ‚ÄúThe yoginƒ´s of Hevajra‚Äù and so forth.

original: dbang po dman pa rnams kyi spros pa dang bcas pa'i spyod pa yang brtag pa gnyis pa'i le'u bdun pa las mdor bstan pas ston par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dbang po dman pa rnams kyi spros pa dang bcas pa'i spyod pa yang brtag pa gnyis pa'i le'u bdun pa las mdor bstan pas ston par 'gyur ro //
translated: The elaborate conduct for those of the lowest faculties will be taught in the seventh chapter of the second section by way of a brief presentation.

original: snying rje btung bar zhes bya ba la sogs pa la dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i bsgom pa ni snying rje ste /
analyzed: snying rje btung bar zhes bya ba la sogs pa la dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i bsgom pa ni snying rje ste /
translated: ‚ÄúThe drink of compassion‚Äù and so forth. The meditation with reference points is compassion.

original: de nyid kyis bde ba chen po'i ro myong bar byed pa ni btung ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyis bde ba chen po'i ro myong bar byed pa ni btung ba'o //
translated: That itself is the experience of the taste of great bliss, which is the drink.

original: de ni dus thams cad du btung bar bya ba ste /
analyzed: de ni dus thams cad du btung bar bya ba ste /

original: 'gro ba'i don bya ba'i ched du'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i don bya ba'i ched du'o //

original: de nyid kyi phyir rnal 'byor btung bas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir rnal 'byor btung bas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, ‚ÄúThe drink of yoga‚Äù and so forth.

original: rnal 'byor ni ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ni ting nge 'dzin to //

original: de nyid ni btung ba ste /
analyzed: de nyid ni btung ba ste /
translated: That itself is the drink.

original: de la dga' ba ni 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: de la dga' ba ni 'dod pa'o //
translated: Delight is desire.

original: de'i phyir gzhan chang la sogs pa'i btung bas spyod pa @18b byed pa'i rnal 'byor pas bzi bar mi bya ba ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir gzhan chang la sogs pa'i btung bas spyod pa @18b byed pa'i rnal 'byor pas bzi bar mi bya ba ste /
translated: Therefore, the yogi/nƒ´ should not become intoxicated by other drinks such as wine, etc., thinking, I am a yogi/nƒ´.

original: rmongs pa gtsor gyur pas rnal 'byor gyi gegs chen por 'gyur ba'i phyir zhes de ltar bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: rmongs pa gtsor gyur pas rnal 'byor gyi gegs chen por 'gyur ba'i phyir zhes de ltar bslab par bya'o //
translated: One should train thinking, Because of the predominance of delusion, it is a great obstruction to yoga.

original: dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i dka' 'grel rnal 'byor rin po che'i phreng ba las drug pa spyod pa'i le'u'i 'grel pa'o /
analyzed: dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i dka' 'grel rnal 'byor rin po che'i phreng ba las drug pa spyod pa'i le'u'i 'grel pa'o /
translated: This is the commentary on the sixth chapter in the Jewel Lamp of the Commentary, called ‚ÄúThe Yoga of the Practice of the Yoginƒ´.‚Äù

original: // / brda ni kla klo'i skad de ;
analyzed: // / brda ni kla klo'i skad de ;
translated: The code is the language of the barbarians,

original: rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis rtogs pa brda ston pa'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis rtogs pa brda ston pa'o //
translated: which the yoginƒ´s indicate by code.

analyzed: de yang thabs kyi mchog tu gyur pa nyid yin pa nyid du shes par bya'o //

original: de'i phyir de nas brda'i le'u zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir de nas brda'i le'u zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, ‚ÄúThen the chapter on the code,‚Äù etc.

analyzed: brda gsal bar byed pa'i le'u la yang 'di skad ces bya'o // spun ni rnal 'byor pa'o //
translated: The chapter that clarifies the code is also called this.üîΩ‚ÄúBrother‚Äù is the yogi/nƒ´.

original: sring mo ni rnal 'byor ma'o //
analyzed: sring mo ni rnal 'byor ma'o //
translated: ‚ÄúSister‚Äù is the yoginƒ´.

original: sor mo gcig ces bya ba ni mdzub mo ste /
analyzed: sor mo gcig ces bya ba ni mdzub mo ste /

analyzed: 'ongs sam zhes bya ba'i don to //

original: gang zhig ces bya ba ni gang zhig gis blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: gang zhig ces bya ba ni gang zhig gis blta bar bya'o //

analyzed: gnyis kyis zhes bya ba ni mdzub mo dang gung mo dag gis so //

analyzed: rtse gsum zhes bya ba ni mthe'u chung mthe bos mnan nas lhag ma rtse gsum gyi tshul du brkyang pa'o //

analyzed: gtsug phud dgrol ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni drang ba'i don gyi bshad pa'o // sor mo gcig ni ston pa dang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The explanation of the provisional meaning is as follows: ‚ÄúUntie the topknot‚Äù and so on.üîΩDisplaying one finger and so on means:

original: gang yang sor gcig ces bya ba mdzub mo 'am /
analyzed: gang yang sor gcig ces bya ba mdzub mo 'am /
translated: Whoever displays one finger means the index finger or

analyzed: gung mo dang mdzub mo dag gis shes rab kyi padma ston pa ste bskul par bya'o //

original: bsnyun gyi phyag rgyar zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: bsnyun gyi phyag rgyar zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /

original: de rnams shes pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams shes pa'o //

analyzed: de'i padma'i nang ngo //

analyzed: mthe bong ni rdo rje ste des 'dzag pa'i gnas skabs thob par gyur pa ni btsir bar bya ba'o //

original: srin lag ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: srin lag ces bya ba la sogs pa la /

analyzed: srin lag ni shes rab kyi ye shes @19a * //

analyzed: kyi dbang bskur ba'o //

analyzed: de la mthe'u chung ni dbang tha ma ste bzhi pa zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //

analyzed: ji ltar sbyin par bya zhe na /

original: gung mo zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: gung mo zhes bya ba gsungs te /

original: gung mo zhes bya ba aa wa dh'u t'i zhes bya ba bstan pa'o //
analyzed: gung mo zhes bya ba aa wa dh'u t'i zhes bya ba bstan pa'o //
translated: the middle finger is the avadh≈´tƒ´.

original: gang zhig ces bya ba ni bla ma gang zhig gis slob ma la bzhi pa'i man ngag ces bya bar grags pa sdigs mdzub spangs la bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: gang zhig ces bya ba ni bla ma gang zhig gis slob ma la bzhi pa'i man ngag ces bya bar grags pa sdigs mdzub spangs la bstan par bya'o //
translated: The one who, the guru who, should teach the disciple the fourth instruction, which is known as the threatening forefinger.

original: de la mdzub mo dang srin lag ces bya ba ni la la n'a dang ra sa na'o //
analyzed: de la mdzub mo dang srin lag ces bya ba ni la la n'a dang ra sa na'o //
translated: There, the forefinger and ring finger are the lalanƒÅ and rasanƒÅ.

original: sbyin par bya zhes bya ba ni bstan par bya ba'o //
analyzed: sbyin par bya zhes bya ba ni bstan par bya ba'o //

original: ji lta bu la bstan par bya zhe na /üîΩmgrin par rab tu ston pa la ;
analyzed: ji lta bu la bstan par bya zhe na / mgrin par rab tu ston pa la ;
translated: To whom is it taught?

original: / zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: / zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: He says to the one who is taught at the throat, etc.

original: gang zhig zhabs la gtugs pa la sogs pas bla ma yang dag par mnyes par byed pa'i slob ma la bstan par bya zhes bya bar dgongs so //üîΩdar dpyad zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: gang zhig zhabs la gtugs pa la sogs pas bla ma yang dag par mnyes par byed pa'i slob ma la bstan par bya zhes bya bar dgongs so // dar dpyad zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /

original: sor mo gnyis kyis dar dpyad bcings pa'i tshul du byed pa ste /
analyzed: sor mo gnyis kyis dar dpyad bcings pa'i tshul du byed pa ste /

original: shes rab dang thabs mtshon pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab dang thabs mtshon pa'o //

original: de 'dir ston cig ces dri ba la /
analyzed: de 'dir ston cig ces dri ba la /
translated: Here, it is asked, Show that to me!

original: de la rtse gsum du ston zhes bya ba ste rtse gsum ni shes rab dang thabs dang gnyis su med pa'i mtshon par byed pa'i la la n'a dang ras n'a dang aa wa dh'u t'i'o //
analyzed: de la rtse gsum du ston zhes bya ba ste rtse gsum ni shes rab dang thabs dang gnyis su med pa'i mtshon par byed pa'i la la n'a dang ras n'a dang aa wa dh'u t'i'o //
translated: In response, it is said, Show the trident. The trident illustrates wisdom, means, and their nonduality, namely, the lalanƒÅ, rasanƒÅ, and avadh≈´ti.

original: de la rab tu phye nas bstan par bya ba'o //
analyzed: de la rab tu phye nas bstan par bya ba'o //

original: nu ma ston pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: nu ma ston pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /

original: slob ma gang zhig la nu ma ste shes rab dang thabs mtshon par byed pa ste /
analyzed: slob ma gang zhig la nu ma ste shes rab dang thabs mtshon par byed pa ste /

original: de dag nyams su myong bas bstan cing smra bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: de dag nyams su myong bas bstan cing smra bar bya ba'o //

original: mtshams ni bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo ste /
analyzed: mtshams ni bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo ste /

original: de la rab tu bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: de la rab tu bstan par bya'o //

original: sa ni sprul pa'i 'khor lo ste de bstan par bya ba'o ;
analyzed: sa ni sprul pa'i 'khor lo ste de bstan par bya ba'o ;
translated: The feet are the emanation wheel. One should show it.

original: / gang zhig ces bya ba ni phyin ste /
analyzed: / gang zhig ces bya ba ni phyin ste /

original: de la 'khor lo zhes bya ba chos kyi 'khor lo bstan par bya ba'o //
analyzed: de la 'khor lo zhes bya ba chos kyi 'khor lo bstan par bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe wheel‚Äù is the wheel of Dharma. One should show it.

original: khro gnyer zhes bya ba ni longs spyod kyi 'khor lo bstan par bya ba'o //
analyzed: khro gnyer zhes bya ba ni longs spyod kyi 'khor lo bstan par bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúFrowning‚Äù is the wheel of enjoyment. One should show it.

original: gang zhig ces bya ba ni yang ngo //üîΩgtsug phud dgrol bar brjod par bya //
analyzed: gang zhig ces bya ba ni yang ngo // gtsug phud dgrol bar brjod par bya //

original: zhes bya ba la thar pa'i don gyis bslab pa ste ;üîΩkhyod kyis srog chags gsad par bya //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la thar pa'i don gyis bslab pa ste ; khyod kyis srog chags gsad par bya //
translated: ‚ÄúUntie the topknot‚Äù means the meaning of liberation.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod par bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod par bya ba'o //

original: dpral ba ston pa la zhes bya ba ni ngag gis yang phyag bya ba'o //
analyzed: dpral ba ston pa la zhes bya ba ni ngag gis yang phyag bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúShowing the forehead‚Äù is again paying homage with speech.

original: de la rgyab ni zhes bya ba ni lag pas de'i rgyab la reg par bya'o zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: de la rgyab ni zhes bya ba ni lag pas de'i rgyab la reg par bya'o zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe back‚Äù is touching the back with the hand.

original: lag pas reg pa 'ba' zhig ma zad kyi /
analyzed: lag pas reg pa 'ba' zhig ma zad kyi /
translated: Not only does one touch with the hand,üîΩbut also with the sole of the foot.

analyzed: rkang @19b mthil zhes bya ba ni rkang pa'i mthil gyis sa'i dkyil 'khor bstan par bya ba ste /
translated: The sole of the foot is the surface of the earth.

original: rnal 'byor 'di dang ldan pas sa la ji ltar bde ba gnas par bya'o zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor 'di dang ldan pas sa la ji ltar bde ba gnas par bya'o zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: One should say that one should remain on the earth in whatever way is comfortable, endowed with this yoga.üîΩBy whom is one permitted to remain?

original: gang zhig bla mas rjes su gnang bar byas par 'gyur ba gnas pa des /
analyzed: gang zhig bla mas rjes su gnang bar byas par 'gyur ba gnas pa des /

original: lto ba'i rnam par rtse bar bya //
analyzed: lto ba'i rnam par rtse bar bya //

original: zhes bya ba la lto ba zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la lto ba zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa ste /

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das so //

original: rim gyis de dag lhan cig tu de lta bu'i yon tan gyi tshogs kyis brgyan par bya ba'o //
analyzed: rim gyis de dag lhan cig tu de lta bu'i yon tan gyi tshogs kyis brgyan par bya ba'o //
translated: Gradually, all of them together should be adorned with such an assembly of qualities.

original: 'di ni nges pa'i don gyi bshad pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni nges pa'i don gyi bshad pa'o //
translated: This is the explanation of the definitive meaning.

original: phyag rgya lan zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: phyag rgya lan zhes bya ba la /

original: sor mo gnyis zhes bya ba la sogs pas dbye bar bya'o //
analyzed: sor mo gnyis zhes bya ba la sogs pas dbye bar bya'o //
translated: one should divide with two fingers, etc.

original: phreng ba ma'i lag ces bya ba ni skra bcing ba ltar bya ba 'am /
analyzed: phreng ba ma'i lag ces bya ba ni skra bcing ba ltar bya ba 'am /

original: phreng ba drang ba ltar bya ba'o //
analyzed: phreng ba drang ba ltar bya ba'o //

original: de la mngon du phyogs pa ltar ston pa ni /
analyzed: de la mngon du phyogs pa ltar ston pa ni /
translated: There, the indication of the one who is facing is

analyzed: phreng ba mngon par bstan byas na //

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: one should say,üîΩ‚ÄúI am yours, O Goddess.‚Äù

original: 'di dag gnyi ga yang dngos su 'am de lta bu'i tshul gyis rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di dag gnyi ga yang dngos su 'am de lta bu'i tshul gyis rtogs par bya'o //

original: 'di dag thams cad kyang lag pa g-yon pa bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di dag thams cad kyang lag pa g-yon pa bstan par bya'o //
translated: And all of these should be shown with the left hand.

original: phreng ba mngon par gtad byas zhes bya ba'i don bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: phreng ba mngon par gtad byas zhes bya ba'i don bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach the meaning of ‚Äúhaving shown the garland,‚Äù

original: dam tshig la gnas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: dam tshig la gnas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: it is said, ‚Äúabiding in the pledge,‚Äù and so forth.

original: lha rdzas zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor ma'o //
analyzed: lha rdzas zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor ma'o //
translated: Divine substance refers to the yoginƒ´.

original: phyi rol zhes bya ba ni bstan par gyis shig ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: phyi rol zhes bya ba ni bstan par gyis shig ces bya ba'o //
translated: External refers to ‚Äúshow it.‚Äù

original: kye bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /üîΩ'di rnam sa ni bcug gnyis zhes bya ba ni gnas la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: kye bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / 'di rnam sa ni bcug gnyis zhes bya ba ni gnas la sogs pa'o //
translated: O Blessed One, and so forth.üîΩThese are the twelve places, and so forth.

original: 'di las 'byung bar 'gyur bas nas zhes bya ste /
analyzed: 'di las 'byung bar 'gyur bas nas zhes bya ste /

original: rab tu dga' ba dang / dri ma med pa dang / 'od byed pa dang / 'od 'phro ba dang / sbyang dka' ba dang / mngon du gyur pa dang / ring du 'gro ba dang / mi g-yo ba dang ; legs pa'i blo gros dang /
analyzed: rab tu dga' ba dang / dri ma med pa dang / 'od byed pa dang / 'od 'phro ba dang / sbyang dka' ba dang / mngon du gyur pa dang / ring du 'gro ba dang / mi g-yo ba dang ; legs pa'i blo gros dang /
translated: the Joyous, the Stainless, the Radiant, the Brilliant, the Hard-to-conquer, the Realized, the Far-reaching, the Immovable, the Excellent Intelligence,

original: chos kyi sprin dang / kun du 'od dang / dpe med pa zhes bya ba rim bzhin no //
analyzed: chos kyi sprin dang / kun du 'od dang / dpe med pa zhes bya ba rim bzhin no //
translated: the Cloud of Dharma, the Everywhere Light, and the Incomparable.

original: ye shes ldan zhes bya ba bcu gsum pa rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa ni shin tu mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pas de ni ma brjod do //
analyzed: ye shes ldan zhes bya ba bcu gsum pa rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa ni shin tu mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pas de ni ma brjod do //
translated: The thirteenth stage, called the Vajra Holder, is the nature of the non-abiding nirvana, so it is not mentioned.

original: sa bcu'i dbang phyug gi byang chub sems dpa' dang / mgon po sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa yin no zhes sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: sa bcu'i dbang phyug gi byang chub sems dpa' dang / mgon po sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa yin no zhes sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: It should be connected as taught by the Lord Buddha, the Bodhisattva who is the master of the ten stages.

original: gang dag las zhes bya zhe na /
analyzed: gang dag las zhes bya zhe na /

original: gnas la sogs pa 'di dag nyid la zhes bya ba'i don te /
analyzed: gnas la sogs pa 'di dag nyid la zhes bya ba'i don te /
translated: It means from these very abodes and so forth.

original: kye bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: kye bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: Oh Bhagavan, and so forth.

original: ko la gi ri ni pu li ra ma la ya'o //
analyzed: ko la gi ri ni pu li ra ma la ya'o //
translated: Kolgiri is Pulliramalaya.

original: na ga ra ni pa t'a la pu tra'o //üîΩlan @20a * //
analyzed: na ga ra ni pa t'a la pu tra'o // lan @20a * //

original: tshva rgya mtsho nas skyes zhes bya ba ni ha li ke la'i khyad par ro //
analyzed: tshva rgya mtsho nas skyes zhes bya ba ni ha li ke la'i khyad par ro //

original: gser dang ldan pa'i gling zhes bya ba ni gser gling nyid do //
analyzed: gser dang ldan pa'i gling zhes bya ba ni gser gling nyid do //
translated: The island of gold is Suvarnadvipa itself.

original: de nye ba zhes bya ba ni au pa li la ste nye ba'o //
analyzed: de nye ba zhes bya ba ni au pa li la ste nye ba'o //
translated: That is near is Upa-la, which is near.

original: rdzing bu zhes bya ba ni ring ba'o //
analyzed: rdzing bu zhes bya ba ni ring ba'o //
translated: The pond is far.

original: nyin mo nyid kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la yi dags zla phyed ces bya ba ni mar ngo'i phyogs so //
analyzed: nyin mo nyid kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la yi dags zla phyed ces bya ba ni mar ngo'i phyogs so //
translated: Even during the day, etc. - the fortnight of the pretas is the dark fortnight.

original: 'di ni phyi rol gyi bstan pa'o /
analyzed: 'di ni phyi rol gyi bstan pa'o /
translated: This is the external teaching.

original: // / da ni gdug pa can rnams gzhug par bya ba'i phyir dang slob ma'i rnal 'byor bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: // / da ni gdug pa can rnams gzhug par bya ba'i phyir dang slob ma'i rnal 'byor bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to introduce the wicked and to teach the yoga of the disciple,

original: phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid can sgra gcig gis bstan par 'dod nas rgyal mtshan dang ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid can sgra gcig gis bstan par 'dod nas rgyal mtshan dang ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: desiring to teach with one word the external and internal natures, he says the banner and so on.

original: rgyal mtshan ni dpyangs pa'o //
analyzed: rgyal mtshan ni dpyangs pa'o //
translated: The banner is hung.

original: mtshon bsnun nyid ni g-yul ngo la sogs par gsad pa'o //
analyzed: mtshon bsnun nyid ni g-yul ngo la sogs par gsad pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúStabbed by a weapon‚Äù means killed in battle, and so on.

original: lan bdun pa ni skye ba bdun pa'o //
analyzed: lan bdun pa ni skye ba bdun pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúSeven times‚Äù means seven births.

original: snying rjes zhes bya ba ni de'i 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal bsams nas so //
analyzed: snying rjes zhes bya ba ni de'i 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal bsams nas so //
translated: ‚ÄúOut of compassion‚Äù means having considered the suffering of cyclic existence of those beings.

original: mkhas pa zhes bya ba ni rnam par mkhas pa nyid de 'di ni bshad pa gcig go //
analyzed: mkhas pa zhes bya ba ni rnam par mkhas pa nyid de 'di ni bshad pa gcig go //
translated: ‚ÄúThe wise‚Äù means those who are skilled. This is one explanation.

original: rgyal mtshan ni dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i sems so //
analyzed: rgyal mtshan ni dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i sems so //
translated: ‚ÄúBanner‚Äù means a mind that has an object.

original: mtshon bsnun na ni shes rab kyi mtshon gyis bcad pa ste /
analyzed: mtshon bsnun na ni shes rab kyi mtshon gyis bcad pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúStabbed by a weapon‚Äù means cut by the weapon of wisdom.

original: gcig dang du ma'i rang bzhin gyis bcad pas rang bzhin med par byas pa ni mtshon gyis bsnun pa'o //
analyzed: gcig dang du ma'i rang bzhin gyis bcad pas rang bzhin med par byas pa ni mtshon gyis bsnun pa'o //
translated: Since it is cut by the nature of being one or many, it is made essenceless. This is being stabbed by a weapon.

original: nyid ces bya ba ni gang gis gcod par byed pa'i sems nyid kyang bcad pas rang bzhin med par byed par bstan pa'o //
analyzed: nyid ces bya ba ni gang gis gcod par byed pa'i sems nyid kyang bcad pas rang bzhin med par byed par bstan pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúJust‚Äù means that the very mind that cuts is also cut, and so it is shown to be made essenceless.

original: lan bdun pa yang zhes bya ba ni lan bdun gyis bar du yang yang bltas nas bza' bar bya ba ste /
analyzed: lan bdun pa yang zhes bya ba ni lan bdun gyis bar du yang yang bltas nas bza' bar bya ba ste /
translated: ‚ÄúSeven times‚Äù means that one should eat after looking again and again, up to seven times.

original: rang bzhin med par byas zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rang bzhin med par byas zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is made essenceless.

original: 'di ni gnas ji lta bur yang bdag dang gzhan mchog tu bsrung bar byas par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di ni gnas ji lta bur yang bdag dang gzhan mchog tu bsrung bar byas par 'gyur te /
