original: bdud la sogs pas kyang nye bar 'tsho bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bdud la sogs pas kyang nye bar 'tsho bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: And one will not be harmed even by demons, etc.

original: stong ba nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la mngon du phyogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: stong ba nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la mngon du phyogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: One will be oriented toward the meditative absorption of emptiness.

original: snying rje bskyed ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: snying rje bskyed ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: As for ‚Äúgenerating compassion,‚Äù etc.,

original: dang por tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom pa byas nas so //
analyzed: dang por tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom pa byas nas so //
translated: one should first cultivate the four Brahma abodes.

original: 'bad pas zhes bya ba ni nges pa kho nar ro //
analyzed: 'bad pas zhes bya ba ni nges pa kho nar ro //
translated: ‚ÄúWith effort‚Äù means with certainty.

original: mkhas pas zhes bya ba ni rnam par mkhas pa'o ;
analyzed: mkhas pas zhes bya ba ni rnam par mkhas pa'o ;
translated: ‚ÄúThe wise‚Äù means the skilled.

original: / gal te 'gro ba rnams gsad cing mi dmigs par bya ba yin na /
analyzed: / gal te 'gro ba rnams gsad cing mi dmigs par bya ba yin na /
translated: If one should kill and not apprehend any beings,

original: de ltan ci'i phyir tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi dang por bsgom par bya zhe na /
analyzed: de ltan ci'i phyir tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi dang por bsgom par bya zhe na /
translated: why should one cultivate the four Brahma abodes in the first place?

original: snying rje med na zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: snying rje med na zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: He says, ‚ÄúWithout compassion,‚Äù etc.

original: gang gi tshe dang por tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom pa med na de'i tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i @20b byang chub kyi ngo bo med par yang 'gyur te /
analyzed: gang gi tshe dang por tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom pa med na de'i tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i @20b byang chub kyi ngo bo med par yang 'gyur te /
translated: If at first there is no cultivation of the four Brahma abodes, then the nature of perfect complete enlightenment would not exist.

original: stong pa nyid 'ba' zhig bsgoms pas nyan thos la sogs pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa nyid du yang 'gyur ba srid do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid 'ba' zhig bsgoms pas nyan thos la sogs pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa nyid du yang 'gyur ba srid do //
translated: It is possible that by cultivating emptiness alone, one would attain the nirvana of the Sravakas, etc.

original: de lta bas na de'i phyir snying rje bskyed pa nyid ces bya bas nye bar bsdus pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta bas na de'i phyir snying rje bskyed pa nyid ces bya bas nye bar bsdus pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is said, ‚Äúin order to generate compassion,‚Äù which is the summary.

original: thams cad gdug pa zhes bya ba ni bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa la sdang ba ste rgyang pan pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad gdug pa zhes bya ba ni bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa la sdang ba ste rgyang pan pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúAll evildoers‚Äù are those who hate the teachings of the Sugata, such as the Lokayatas.

original: de dag gsang sngags kyi theg pa la sbyar bar bya ba'i phyir gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de dag gsang sngags kyi theg pa la sbyar bar bya ba'i phyir gsungs pa yin no //
translated: It is said in order to engage them in the Mantra Vehicle.

original: cho ga'i gtso bo zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'dir cho ga'i gtso bos dgag par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: cho ga'i gtso bo zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'dir cho ga'i gtso bos dgag par bya ba yin no //
translated: Here, in the verse that begins ‚Äúthe principal rite,‚Äù the principal rite is to be refuted.

original: gang dag gang du gsad pa la sogs pa'i sgra dang ldan pa mthong ba de dang der 'di bzhin du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: gang dag gang du gsad pa la sogs pa'i sgra dang ldan pa mthong ba de dang der 'di bzhin du rig par bya'o //
translated: Wherever one sees the words ‚Äúkilling‚Äù and so forth, one should understand it in this way.

original: nyin mo bcom ldan rdo rje can //
analyzed: nyin mo bcom ldan rdo rje can //
translated: The Blessed One, Vajra, is in the day,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: and so forth.

original: rtag tu zhes bya ba ni dus thams cad du'o //
analyzed: rtag tu zhes bya ba ni dus thams cad du'o //
translated: ‚ÄúAlways‚Äù means at all times.

original: 'jig rten pa la sogs pa'i drung du ni rgyal mtshan la sogs pa spang bar bya ba la tshogs kyi 'khor lo la sogs pa dben pa'i gnas su ni longs spyod par bya'o zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa la sogs pa'i drung du ni rgyal mtshan la sogs pa spang bar bya ba la tshogs kyi 'khor lo la sogs pa dben pa'i gnas su ni longs spyod par bya'o zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: In the presence of worldly people and so forth, one should avoid the banner and so forth, but in a solitary place, such as a ga·πáa-cakra, one should enjoy them.

original: mi bsam yod ma yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: mi bsam yod ma yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: ‚ÄúNot thinking of anything else‚Äù and so forth.

original: mi bsam zhes bya ba ni bsam pa gzhan ci yang mi bsam pa ste /
analyzed: mi bsam zhes bya ba ni bsam pa gzhan ci yang mi bsam pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúNot thinking of anything else‚Äù means not thinking of anything else at all.

original: ji ltar bdag nyid dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i nga rgyal byed pa de bzhin du sems can gzhan la yang bya ba'o //
analyzed: ji ltar bdag nyid dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i nga rgyal byed pa de bzhin du sems can gzhan la yang bya ba'o //
translated: Just as one should do with oneself, one should do with other sentient beings.

original: de bzhin bdag nyid ces bya ba ni kun bsdu ba ste /
analyzed: de bzhin bdag nyid ces bya ba ni kun bsdu ba ste /
translated: ‚ÄúIn the same way‚Äù means to include everything.

original: de dag dang bdag gyi ga dgyes pa'i rdo rjer ba lta bar bya'o //
analyzed: de dag dang bdag gyi ga dgyes pa'i rdo rjer ba lta bar bya'o //
translated: Delight.

original: bdag nyid gzhan zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid dang gzhan dag go //
analyzed: bdag nyid gzhan zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid dang gzhan dag go //
translated: One's own and others means oneself and others.

original: gnas bzhugs pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: gnas bzhugs pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The abode and so forth.

original: gnyis med ces bya ba ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: gnyis med ces bya ba ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid do //
translated: Nondual means the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: de nyid shra'i ste chos thams cad 'od gsal ba'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid shra'i ste chos thams cad 'od gsal ba'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: That itself is light, because the nature of all phenomena is clear light.

original: rgyu zhes bya ba ni byed rgyu'o //
analyzed: rgyu zhes bya ba ni byed rgyu'o //
translated: Cause means the efficient cause.

original: sogs pa zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin no //
analyzed: sogs pa zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin no //
translated: And so forth means the inherent nature.

original: stong pa nyid ni de dag dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid ni de dag dang bral ba'o //
translated: Emptiness is the absence of those.

original: tshogs ni rnam par rtog pa ste de dang bral ba ni yongs su spangs pa nyid do //
analyzed: tshogs ni rnam par rtog pa ste de dang bral ba ni yongs su spangs pa nyid do //
translated: The aggregate is conceptualization, and the absence of that is complete abandonment.

original: ka zhes bya ba ni mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
analyzed: ka zhes bya ba ni mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
translated: Ka means nonabiding nirvana.

original: 'di dag gis ni stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang mngon par 'du byas pa med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i don rnams ni he ru ka zhes bya ba'i sgras bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di dag gis ni stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang mngon par 'du byas pa med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i don rnams ni he ru ka zhes bya ba'i sgras bstan pa yin no //
translated: These [lines] teach the meanings of emptiness, signlessness, wishlessness, and non-formation by the word Heruka.

original: 'gro drug tu skye bar 'gyur bas na skye bo ste phung po lta'o //
analyzed: 'gro drug tu skye bar 'gyur bas na skye bo ste phung po lta'o //
translated: The people are the aggregates, because they are born in the six migrations.

original: sha zhes bya ba ni de'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: sha zhes bya ba ni de'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The meat is their nature.

original: bza' bya ba zhes bya ba ni snang ba med par bya ba'o /
analyzed: bza' bya ba zhes bya ba ni snang ba med par bya ba'o /
translated: The eating is the non-appearance of that.

original: @21a * // mkhas pa zhes bya ba ni dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: @21a * // mkhas pa zhes bya ba ni dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'o //
translated: The wise are those endowed with the yoga of Hevajra.

original: sems can de de zhes bya ba ni dngos po de dang de'o //
analyzed: sems can de de zhes bya ba ni dngos po de dang de'o //
translated: The beings are those things.

original: dbang du 'gyur zhes bya ba ni de dang de la dbang thob par 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: dbang du 'gyur zhes bya ba ni de dang de la dbang thob par 'gyur ba ste /
translated: They become means they attain mastery over those things.

original: gzugs la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa sprul pas gdul bya sna tshogs 'dul bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa sprul pas gdul bya sna tshogs 'dul bar 'gyur ro //
translated: By emanating various forms and so forth, they will tame the various disciples.

original: rdo rje ni dgyes pa'i rdo rje'o //
analyzed: rdo rje ni dgyes pa'i rdo rje'o //
translated: The vajra is Hevajra.

original: thod pa ni bde ba srung bar byed pa'i phyir bdag med pa ste /
analyzed: thod pa ni bde ba srung bar byed pa'i phyir bdag med pa ste /
translated: The skull is the selflessness that protects bliss,

original: stong pa nyid dang snying rje'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid dang snying rje'o //
translated: that is, emptiness and compassion.

original: de'i sbyor ba ni ting nge 'dzin te de yis so //
analyzed: de'i sbyor ba ni ting nge 'dzin te de yis so //
translated: Its yoga is concentration, and by that.üîΩThis is the commentary on the seventh chapter in the Ornament of Yoga

original: dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i dka' 'grel rnal 'byor rin po che'i phreng ba las brnga dang gnas kyi nges par bstan pa le'u bdun pa'i 'grel pa'o /
analyzed: dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i dka' 'grel rnal 'byor rin po che'i phreng ba las brnga dang gnas kyi nges par bstan pa le'u bdun pa'i 'grel pa'o /
translated: Gnosis, a commentary on the difficult points in the Hevajra Tantra,

original: // / de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'khor lo ni dkyil 'khor te /
analyzed: // / de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'khor lo ni dkyil 'khor te /
translated: Then, etc. The wheel is the mandala,

original: mchog dang po'i pho brang thar ba chen po'i grong khyer zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: mchog dang po'i pho brang thar ba chen po'i grong khyer zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: the palace of the supreme first stage, the city of great liberation.

original: de yang rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: de yang rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: That is of two kinds:

original: rten dang brten pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: rten dang brten pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: the mandala of the support and the supported.

original: de la 'dir ni dang po'i rnal 'byor dang / dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog dang las rgyal mchog ste /
analyzed: de la 'dir ni dang po'i rnal 'byor dang / dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog dang las rgyal mchog ste /
translated: Here, the yoga of the first stage, the king of mandalas, and the king of actions

original: ting nge 'dzin gsum gyi rnal 'byor bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gsum gyi rnal 'byor bstan par bya'o //
translated: are taught, the yoga of the three concentrations.

original: de yang lha'i le'ur ni dpa' bo gcig pu'i rnal 'byor gyi skabs yin pas bsam gtan no //
analyzed: de yang lha'i le'ur ni dpa' bo gcig pu'i rnal 'byor gyi skabs yin pas bsam gtan no //
translated: Moreover, since this is the context of the hero's yoga in the chapter on the deities, it is meditation.

original: rnal 'byor ma ni bdag med ma'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma ni bdag med ma'o //
translated: The yoginƒ´ is NairƒÅtmya.

original: de'i 'khor lo ni rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: de'i 'khor lo ni rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo'o //
translated: Her wheel is the yoginƒ´ wheel.

original: nam mkha'i khams su zhes bya ba la sogs pa /
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams su zhes bya ba la sogs pa /
translated: In the realm of space, etc.

original: rdo rje ra ba dang gur gyi nang du nam mkha'i khams so //
analyzed: rdo rje ra ba dang gur gyi nang du nam mkha'i khams so //
translated: means in the interior of the vajra fence and pavilion.

original: chos 'byung ni ston ka'i zla ba lta bu'i gru gsum ste chos 'byung zhes bya ba bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: chos 'byung ni ston ka'i zla ba lta bu'i gru gsum ste chos 'byung zhes bya ba bsgom par bya'o //
translated: The source of phenomena is a triangle like the autumn moon, and one should meditate on the source of phenomena.

original: dbus su rnam par bsgom par bya ba ni de'i dbus kyi rten gyi 'khor lo bskyed pa'i rgyur gyur pa 'byung ba chen po bzhi bsgom par bya ba'o //
analyzed: dbus su rnam par bsgom par bya ba ni de'i dbus kyi rten gyi 'khor lo bskyed pa'i rgyur gyur pa 'byung ba chen po bzhi bsgom par bya ba'o //
translated: In the middle, one should meditate on the cause for the generation of the wheel of the abode in its middle, the meditation on the four great elements.

original: ci ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar zhe na /
translated: How?

original: 'khor lo mngon du zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: 'khor lo mngon du zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: It is said, the wheel, the earth, etc.

original: 'di ni mdor bstan pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni mdor bstan pa'o //
translated: This is the brief explanation.

original: rgyas par ni 'khor lo sa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: rgyas par ni 'khor lo sa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: The extensive explanation is the wheel, the earth, etc.

original: sa ni sa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: sa ni sa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: Earth is the earth mandala.üîΩ

original: 'di'i sngon du zhes bya ba dang por chu ste chu'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: 'di'i sngon du zhes bya ba dang por chu ste chu'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: Before this means first the water, the water mandala.

original: 'di'i sngon du ni ci ltar rigs par te me'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: 'di'i sngon du ni ci ltar rigs par te me'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: Before this means as appropriate, the fire mandala.

original: 'di yang sngon du lha rnams zhes bya ba ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: 'di yang sngon du lha rnams zhes bya ba ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: This also means before this, the gods, the wind mandala.

original: sgom pa po'i sems 'di lta bu'i rnam par nges par gnas pa ni ji ltar sgom pa po 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: sgom pa po'i sems 'di lta bu'i rnam par nges par gnas pa ni ji ltar sgom pa po 'byung ba'o //
translated: The meditator's mind definitely abides in this way, and the meditator arises.

original: de la 'dir dang por chos 'byung gi dbus su yam yongs su gyur pa @21b las byung ba'i gzhu'i dbyibs can sngon po ba dan gnyis kyis mtshan pa'i rtse mo gnyis g-yo ba'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: de la 'dir dang por chos 'byung gi dbus su yam yongs su gyur pa @21b las byung ba'i gzhu'i dbyibs can sngon po ba dan gnyis kyis mtshan pa'i rtse mo gnyis g-yo ba'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: Here, first, in the center of the source of phenomena, from the transformation of yam, there is a blue bow-shaped wind mandala, marked with two banners, the two tips moving.

original: de'i steng du ram las byung ba gru gsum zur rnams su yi ge ram gyis mtshan pa'i me'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: de'i steng du ram las byung ba gru gsum zur rnams su yi ge ram gyis mtshan pa'i me'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: Above that, from ram, there is a triangular fire mandala, marked with ram in the corners.

original: de'i steng du bam las byung ba chu'i dkyil 'khor dkar zhing zlub  pa bum pas mtshan pa'o //
analyzed: de'i steng du bam las byung ba chu'i dkyil 'khor dkar zhing zlub  pa bum pas mtshan pa'o //
translated: Above that, from vam, there is a white, round water mandala, marked with a vase.

original: de'i steng du lam las byung ba gru bzhi pa ser po mtshams rnams su rdo rjes mtshan pa'i sa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i steng du lam las byung ba gru bzhi pa ser po mtshams rnams su rdo rjes mtshan pa'i sa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya'o //
translated: On top of that, one should meditate on the earth mandala, which is yellow, square, and marked with vajras in the corners, which arises from the path.

original: chos 'byung zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: chos 'byung zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: In the dharmodaya and so on,

original: chos 'byung de nyid ni phyag rgya gru gsum mo //
analyzed: chos 'byung de nyid ni phyag rgya gru gsum mo //
translated: the dharmodaya itself is the triangular mudra.

original: de las skyes pa'i rlung la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhi yongs su gyur pa las 'der 'di skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de las skyes pa'i rlung la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhi yongs su gyur pa las 'der 'di skad ces bya'o //
translated: From that, the four mandalas of wind and so on arise, and from their transformation, this is said.

original: 'khor lo ni rten gyi dkyil 'khor te gru bzhi pa la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: 'khor lo ni rten gyi dkyil 'khor te gru bzhi pa la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'o //
translated: The wheel is the supporting mandala, which has the qualities of being square and so on.üîΩTherefore, it is said:

original: de'i phyir / bdag gi 'khor lo khyod bshad na //
analyzed: de'i phyir / bdag gi 'khor lo khyod bshad na //
translated: I will explain your wheel.

original: zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: zhes bya ba nas /
translated: Up to:

original: do shal do shal phyed pas brgyan //
analyzed: do shal do shal phyed pas brgyan //
translated: Adorned with half-garlands and garlands.

original: zur bzhi ba la sgo bzhi pa //
analyzed: zur bzhi ba la sgo bzhi pa //
translated: With four corners and four doors.üîΩAnd:

original: zhes bya ba'i bar dang / rdo rje srad bus yang dag brgyan //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i bar dang / rdo rje srad bus yang dag brgyan //
translated: Adorned with vajra threads.

original: zhes bya bas ston par 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya bas ston par 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: This is taught.

original: 'phar ma gnyis rim zhes bya ba ni rim pa gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: 'phar ma gnyis rim zhes bya ba ni rim pa gnyis pa'o //
translated: The two-storied one is the second story.

original: bre'u 'bru las zhes bya ba ni dbus kyi padma 'dab ma brgyad pa ni rim pa gcig go //
analyzed: bre'u 'bru las zhes bya ba ni dbus kyi padma 'dab ma brgyad pa ni rim pa gcig go //
translated: The ‚Äúpitcher-measure‚Äù is the single-tiered eight-petaled lotus in the center.

original: gru gsum zhes bya ba ni chos 'byung gis mngon par khyab par byas pa'i gzhi gru bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: gru gsum zhes bya ba ni chos 'byung gis mngon par khyab par byas pa'i gzhi gru bzhi pa'o //
translated: The ‚Äútriangle‚Äù is the square base completely covered by the source of phenomena.

original: de'i dbus su zhes bya ba ni gzhal yas khang rim pa gnyis kyi dbus su ste rnal 'byor ma bco lnga'i gdan gyi bdag nyid de /
analyzed: de'i dbus su zhes bya ba ni gzhal yas khang rim pa gnyis kyi dbus su ste rnal 'byor ma bco lnga'i gdan gyi bdag nyid de /
translated: ‚ÄúIn its center‚Äù is in the center of the two-tiered celestial palace, which is the nature of the seats of the fifteen yoginƒ´s.

original: de dag nyid kyi gnas rnams so sor ro'i gdan bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: de dag nyid kyi gnas rnams so sor ro'i gdan bsam par bya'o //
translated: Their individual seats of corpses should be imagined in their respective places.

original: de dbus bsam zhes bya ba ni dbus kyi ro'i gdan gyi snying gar a'a li yongs su gyur pa las zla ba'o //
analyzed: de dbus bsam zhes bya ba ni dbus kyi ro'i gdan gyi snying gar a'a li yongs su gyur pa las zla ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIn its center, imagine‚Äù means that in the center of the seat of the corpse in the center, the moon arises from the transformation of the ƒÅli.

original: de'i steng du sa bon nyid ces bya ba ni dbyangs kyi dang po'o //
analyzed: de'i steng du sa bon nyid ces bya ba ni dbyangs kyi dang po'o //
translated: ‚ÄúOn that, the seed itself‚Äù is the first vowel.

original: de'i steng du k'a li yongs su gyur pa las bdud las rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: de'i steng du k'a li yongs su gyur pa las bdud las rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: ‚ÄúOn that, the ma·πá·∏çala of victory over the mƒÅras arises from the transformation of the kƒÅli.

original: gnyis 'dus zhes bya ba ni shes rab dang thabs kyi ngo bo nyid nyi ma dang zla ba'o //
analyzed: gnyis 'dus zhes bya ba ni shes rab dang thabs kyi ngo bo nyid nyi ma dang zla ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe union of the two‚Äù is the sun and moon, which are the nature of wisdom and method.

original: de'i dbus su bde ba chen po'i ngo bo nyid kyi sa bon bstan pa'o //
analyzed: de'i dbus su bde ba chen po'i ngo bo nyid kyi sa bon bstan pa'o //
translated: In the middle of that, the seed-syllable of the nature of great bliss is taught.

original: yang nyi ma dang zla ba'i ngo bo nyid ci yin zhe na /
analyzed: yang nyi ma dang zla ba'i ngo bo nyid ci yin zhe na /
translated: What is the nature of the sun and moon?

original: a'a li zla ba'i gzugs kyis gnas //
analyzed: a'a li zla ba'i gzugs kyis gnas //
translated: The ƒÅli is located in the form of the moon,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: and so forth.

original: goo r'i la sogs pa rnal 'byor ma bco lnga nyid do //
analyzed: goo r'i la sogs pa rnal 'byor ma bco lnga nyid do //
translated: The fifteen yoginƒ´s are Gaurƒ´ and so forth.üîΩFrom this,

original: 'di las zhes bya ba ni zla ba dang nyi ma dang sa bon las kun du byung ba'o //
analyzed: 'di las zhes bya ba ni zla ba dang nyi ma dang sa bon las kun du byung ba'o //
translated: arising from the moon, sun, and seed-syllable,

original: sa bon dbye bas zhes bya @22a * //
analyzed: sa bon dbye bas zhes bya @22a * //
translated: the seed-syllable division

original: ba ni yi ge tha dad pa nyid do //
analyzed: ba ni yi ge tha dad pa nyid do //
translated: is the very different syllables.

original: 'di dag gis ni shes rab dang thabs dang bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin gyi rnal 'byor ma rnams ni rdo rje 'chang gi ngo bo nyid du bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di dag gis ni shes rab dang thabs dang bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin gyi rnal 'byor ma rnams ni rdo rje 'chang gi ngo bo nyid du bstan pa yin no //
translated: By these, the yoginƒ´s of the nature of wisdom, method, and great bliss are taught to be the nature of Vajradhara.

original: da ni me long lta bu la sogs pa ye shes lnga'i ngo bo nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rang bzhin du bstan pa'i phyir zla ba me long zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: da ni me long lta bu la sogs pa ye shes lnga'i ngo bo nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rang bzhin du bstan pa'i phyir zla ba me long zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Now, in order to teach the nature of the five tathƒÅgatas by way of the nature of the five gnoses such as mirror-like gnosis, he says ‚Äúthe moon is the mirror,‚Äù and so forth.

original: sa bon yongs su gyur pa las byung ba'i gri gug gi chang zungs la zla ba las sa bon blta ba ni phyag mtshan no //
analyzed: sa bon yongs su gyur pa las byung ba'i gri gug gi chang zungs la zla ba las sa bon blta ba ni phyag mtshan no //
translated: The seed-syllable is seen on the moon in the handle of the flaying knife that arises from the complete transformation of the seed-syllable. This is the hand implement.

original: rang lha'i zhes bya ba ni lha mo rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: rang lha'i zhes bya ba ni lha mo rnams kyi'o //
translated: ‚ÄúOf one‚Äôs own deity‚Äù means of the goddesses.

original: so sor rtog par zhes bya ba ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes zhes brjod pa'o //
analyzed: so sor rtog par zhes bya ba ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes zhes brjod pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúOne should imagine‚Äù means one should imagine the gnosis being.

original: gcig gyur zhes bya ba ni phyag mtshan la gnas pa'i sa bon las spros pa'i rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs kyis sna tshogs 'di khyab par byas nas /
analyzed: gcig gyur zhes bya ba ni phyag mtshan la gnas pa'i sa bon las spros pa'i rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs kyis sna tshogs 'di khyab par byas nas /
translated: ‚ÄúHaving become one‚Äù means that the assembly of yoginƒ´s emanated from the seed-syllable located in the hand implement pervade the entire variety of phenomena.

original: thams cad ces kun yang dag par bsdus nas sa bon dang gcig tu gyur ba'i sa bon de ni bya ba nan tan no //
analyzed: thams cad ces kun yang dag par bsdus nas sa bon dang gcig tu gyur ba'i sa bon de ni bya ba nan tan no //
translated: ‚ÄúHaving gathered everything‚Äù means that having gathered everything into the seed-syllable, that seed-syllable is the gnosis of successful activities.

original: rdzogs pa zhes bya ba ni zla ba dang nyi ma dang phyag mtshan dang sa bon yongs su gyur pa las lha'i sku yongs su rdzogs pa ste /
analyzed: rdzogs pa zhes bya ba ni zla ba dang nyi ma dang phyag mtshan dang sa bon yongs su gyur pa las lha'i sku yongs su rdzogs pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúComplete‚Äù means the complete form of the deity arises from the complete transformation of the moon, sun, hand implement, and seed-syllable.

original: chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i ye shes so //
translated: This is the gnosis of the completely pure realm of phenomena.

original: rnam pa lnga po zhes bya ba ni me long lta bu la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: rnam pa lnga po zhes bya ba ni me long lta bu la sogs pa rnams so //
translated: The five aspects are the mirror-like and the others.

original: mkhas pas zhes bya ba ni shes rab can gyis so //
analyzed: mkhas pas zhes bya ba ni shes rab can gyis so //
translated: The wise one is the one with wisdom.

original: a'a li k'a li mnyam sbyor zhes bya ba ni zla ba dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor zung du 'byor pa'o //
analyzed: a'a li k'a li mnyam sbyor zhes bya ba ni zla ba dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor zung du 'byor pa'o //
translated: The union of the vowels and consonants is the union of the moon and sun mandalas.

original: gdan zhes bya ba ni bzhugs pa'i gdan no //
analyzed: gdan zhes bya ba ni bzhugs pa'i gdan no //
translated: The seat is the seat of the one who sits.

original: rdo rje ni phyag mtshan no //
analyzed: rdo rje ni phyag mtshan no //
translated: The vajra is the hand implement.

original: sems dpa' ni sa bon gyi ye she ste /
analyzed: sems dpa' ni sa bon gyi ye she ste /
translated: The sattva is the seed syllable.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' de yi gdan //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' de yi gdan //
translated: The seat of that Vajrasattva

original: zhes bya ba'i don ston to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i don ston to //
translated: teaches the meaning of the verse.

original: yi ge las byung zhes bya ba la sogs pa la yi ge ni dang po'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: yi ge las byung zhes bya ba la sogs pa la yi ge ni dang po'i yi ge'o //
translated: The one arisen from the syllable, etc. The syllable is the first syllable.

original: de las byung ba ni gong bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de las byung ba ni gong bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: The one arisen from that is the one arisen from the syllable, etc.üîΩThe one arisen from the syllable is the one arisen from the aggregate, etc.üîΩThe one arisen from the aggregate is the one arisen from the mandala, etc.

original: dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo'o //
translated: The one arisen from the mandala is the principal of the mandala.

original: h'um zhes bya ba la sogs pa la phat rnam pa zhes bya ba ni yi ge aa dang aam dang shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid can gyi lus zhu bar gyur pa la sogs pa ni bdag med ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo bskyed pa la mi 'dod
analyzed: h'um zhes bya ba la sogs pa la phat rnam pa zhes bya ba ni yi ge aa dang aam dang shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid can gyi lus zhu bar gyur pa la sogs pa ni bdag med ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo bskyed pa la mi 'dod
translated: Hum and so forth. The aspect of phat is the melting of the body, which is the nature of wisdom and means, and so on. This is not desired for the generation of the principal of the Nairatma mandala.üîΩ

original: pa yin no //
analyzed: pa yin no //
translated: As for hum and so forth, the aspect of phat is the melting of the body, which is the nature of wisdom and means, and so forth, which is not desired for the generation of the principal of the Nairatma mandala.

original: gal te zhu bar gyur pa las 'byung bar mi 'gyur na /
analyzed: gal te zhu bar gyur pa las 'byung bar mi 'gyur na /
translated: If it does not arise from the melting,

original: 'o na gang las 'byung bar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na gang las 'byung bar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: then from what does it arise?

original: sems dpa'i gzungs brnyan zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: sems dpa'i gzungs brnyan zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: It is said, from the reflection of the sattva, and so forth.

original: sems dpa' ni sa bon gyi yi ge'o //
analyzed: sems dpa' ni sa bon gyi yi ge'o //
translated: The sattva is the seed syllable.

original: gzugs brnyan ni phyag mtshan te de dag las byung ba'o //
analyzed: gzugs brnyan ni phyag mtshan te de dag las byung ba'o //
translated: Reflection is the insignia, and it arises from those.

original: dkyil 'khor bdag @22b po zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo ste /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor bdag @22b po zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo ste /

original: bdag med ma zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bdag med ma zhes bya ba'i don to //

original: gong ma bzhin zhes bya ba ni ji ltar lha'i le'ur rdo rje lcags sgrog bstan pa'i g-yas dang g-yon pa'i phyag la gri gug dang thod pa bzhin no //
analyzed: gong ma bzhin zhes bya ba ni ji ltar lha'i le'ur rdo rje lcags sgrog bstan pa'i g-yas dang g-yon pa'i phyag la gri gug dang thod pa bzhin no //

original: phyag mtshan zhal sogs zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: phyag mtshan zhal sogs zhes bya ba la /

original: zhal ni zhal gdong ngo ;
analyzed: zhal ni zhal gdong ngo ;
translated: The faces are the faces, the face-regions.

original: / phyag mtshan ni gri gug dang thod pa dang kha tv'am ga'o //
analyzed: / phyag mtshan ni gri gug dang thod pa dang kha tv'am ga'o //
translated: The emblems are the flaying knife, skull-bowl, and kha·π≠vƒÅ·πÖga.

original: sogs pa'i sgras ni pags pa'i gos kyis brgyan pa la sogs pa bsdu'o //
analyzed: sogs pa'i sgras ni pags pa'i gos kyis brgyan pa la sogs pa bsdu'o //
translated: The word etc. includes the adornment with a human skin, etc.

original: zla ba dang chu shel gyi nor bu dang 'dra ba'i 'od 'di la yod pas /üîΩzla ba chu shel nor bu'i 'od //
analyzed: zla ba dang chu shel gyi nor bu dang 'dra ba'i 'od 'di la yod pas / zla ba chu shel nor bu'i 'od //
translated: This has the light of the moon and water-crystal gem,üîΩso it is called the light of the moon, water-crystal gem.

original: ces bya ste zla ba'i gdan dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od lta bu zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ces bya ste zla ba'i gdan dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od lta bu zhes bya ba'i don to //

original: 'di ltar zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo bzhi no //
analyzed: 'di ltar zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo bzhi no //
translated: Thus means the four principal deities of the mandala.

analyzed: thams cad ces bya ba ni rdo rje goo r'i la sogs pa'o //

original: rdzogs pa nyid ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: rdzogs pa nyid ji lta bu zhe na /

original: thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin las //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin las //

original: zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste /

original: goo r'i la sogs pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: goo r'i la sogs pa zhes bya ba'o //

analyzed: 'di las zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo'i thugs ka'i zla ba dang / phyag mtshan la gnas pa'i sa bon la ste /

analyzed: zla ba dang nyi ma dang phyag mtshan dang sa bon yongs su gyur pa las goo r'i ma la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ba'o //

original: ci de dag gi sa bon yang de yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: ci de dag gi sa bon yang de yin nam zhe na /
translated: Are their seed syllables also those?

original: yi ge'i dbye bas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: yi ge'i dbye bas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /

original: yi ge ni sa bon te /
analyzed: yi ge ni sa bon te /

analyzed: de'i dbye ba ni sa bon gzhan dang gzhan no zhes bya ba'i don to //

analyzed: de yang rgyud thams cad la rgyas btab pa'i don bsdus pa'i le'u las /
translated: And that is stated in the chapter summarizing the meaning of the seal of all tantras:

original: a'a li dang po bdag med ma //
analyzed: a'a li dang po bdag med ma //

original: a'a li gnyis pa rdo rje ma //
analyzed: a'a li gnyis pa rdo rje ma //
translated: the second ƒÅli is Vajrƒ´,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //

original: da ni rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi gnas bstan pa'i phyir /üîΩre zhig nang gi 'phar ma la //
analyzed: da ni rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi gnas bstan pa'i phyir / re zhig nang gi 'phar ma la //
translated: Now, in order to teach the places of the yoginis,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: he says,üîΩFirst, in the inner courtyard,

original: nang gi zhes bya ba ni nang rol gyi rim pa la phung po lnga'i rnam par bdag pa bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: nang gi zhes bya ba ni nang rol gyi rim pa la phung po lnga'i rnam par bdag pa bsgom par bya'o //

original: dbang por zhes bya ba ni shar phyogs su'o //
analyzed: dbang por zhes bya ba ni shar phyogs su'o //

analyzed: phyi rol gyi 'phang ma la zhes bya ba ni shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su goo r'i dang tsoo r'i dang be t'a li dang ghasma r'i'o //

analyzed: dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su ni pukka s'i dang sha ba r'i dang tsanda l'i dang dombi n'i rnams so //

original: 'og ldan ma ni 'og gi phyogs srung bar byed pas 'og ldan ma zhes bya ba ste sa spyod ma'o //
analyzed: 'og ldan ma ni 'og gi phyogs srung bar byed pas 'og ldan ma zhes bya ba ste sa spyod ma'o //

analyzed: @23a * // de bzhin du steng ldan ma nyid ni mkha' skyod ma'o //
translated: Similarly, the one with the upper part is the one who moves in the sky.

original: srid dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: srid dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa rnam par dag pa'o //

original: sangs rgyas lnga ni rnam dag pas //
analyzed: sangs rgyas lnga ni rnam dag pas //
translated: ‚ÄúThe five Buddhas are pure‚Äù

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: means

original: sangs rgyas lnga'i ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas lnga'i ngo bo nyid do //
translated: the nature of the five Buddhas.

original: phyag rgya zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya'o //

analyzed: de ltar zhes bya ba ni de bzhin du zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: ‚ÄúThus‚Äù means ‚Äúin that way.‚Äù

original: 'bar zhing gsal zhes bya ba lus 'bar zhing sems ni gsal ba'o //
analyzed: 'bar zhing gsal zhes bya ba lus 'bar zhing sems ni gsal ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúBlazing and clear‚Äù means the body is blazing and the mind is clear.

analyzed: nga rgyal la sogs zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gri gug la sogs pa'i ngo bo gsungs so //

original: 'dis ni zhes bya ba ni 'di ltar bsgoms pas so //
analyzed: 'dis ni zhes bya ba ni 'di ltar bsgoms pas so //

original: myur du zhes bya ba ni mgyogs par ro //
analyzed: myur du zhes bya ba ni mgyogs par ro //
translated: ‚ÄúQuickly‚Äù means rapidly.

original: da ni sems mnyam pa nyid du bya ba'i phyir //üîΩyan lag drug bsgom rnal 'byor pas //
analyzed: da ni sems mnyam pa nyid du bya ba'i phyir // yan lag drug bsgom rnal 'byor pas //
translated: Now, in order to make the mind equal,

original: zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin te /
translated: [the BhagavƒÅn] declares, ‚ÄúThe yogin should meditate on the six-branched yoga.‚Äù

original: kha dog drug gis 'khor los sgyur ba drug dang mnyam pa nyid du bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: kha dog drug gis 'khor los sgyur ba drug dang mnyam pa nyid du bstan pa'i phyir ro //

original: yang zhes bya ba ni phyi nas so //

analyzed: dga' 'bral mthar zhes bya ba ni lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba tsam zhes bya ba'i don to //

original: da ni bskyed pa'i rim pa bshad nas /
analyzed: da ni bskyed pa'i rim pa bshad nas /

analyzed: gnyis pa rdzogs pa'i rim pa yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to correctly teach the second, the completion stage,üîΩ[the BhagavƒÅn] declares,

analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa nyid dang ni //
translated: the creation stage itself,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: and so on.

original: rim pa zhes bya ba ni rnam pa'o //
analyzed: rim pa zhes bya ba ni rnam pa'o //
translated: Stage means form.

original: gang gi rim pa zhe na ting nge 'dzin gyis te /
analyzed: gang gi rim pa zhe na ting nge 'dzin gyis te /

analyzed: sa bon dang zla ba dang phyag mtshan dang sa bon yongs su gyur pa las lha'i rnam par yongs su rdzogs pa ni bskyed pa'o //

original: de'i ting nge 'dzin gang la yod pa de ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: de'i ting nge 'dzin gang la yod pa de ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //

original: rdzogs pa ni ngo bo nyid kyi gzugs can te /

analyzed: de nyid la de kho na nyid du mos par byas nas rnal 'byor gang gis sgom par byed pa de ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o //

original: de lta bu'i rim pa gnyis la mnyam par gnas nas /
analyzed: de lta bu'i rim pa gnyis la mnyam par gnas nas /

original: zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ston pa'o //

original: de nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir nam mkha'i khams zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /

original: padma zhes bya ba ni shes rab @23b kyi padma'o //
analyzed: padma zhes bya ba ni shes rab @23b kyi padma'o //
translated: ‚ÄúLotus‚Äù is the lotus of wisdom.

original: ye shes zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'o //
analyzed: ye shes zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'o //

original: bsgom zhes bya ba ni 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: bsgom zhes bya ba ni 'jug pa'o //

original: gsum po 'di ni dang por yin la /

analyzed: 'khor lo zhes brjod pa ni rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo zhes brjod par bya ba ste /
translated: The ‚Äúwheel‚Äù is to be called the yoginƒ´ wheel.

original: bde ba chen po de nyid kyis de dag bsdus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bde ba chen po de nyid kyis de dag bsdus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is included in that very great bliss.

original: de'i bde ba de ji lta bu zhig ce na /
analyzed: de'i bde ba de ji lta bu zhig ce na /

original: ji ltar rigs par zhes bya bar gsungs te /

analyzed: rang rig ni gzhan gyi rkyen la mi ltos par so so rang gis rig pa'i ngo bo nyid ces bya ba'i don to //

analyzed: bya ba zhes bya ba'i sgra ni bsdu ba'i don to //

original: lus gnas par byed pas de nyid ni lha zhes bya ba'o ;
analyzed: lus gnas par byed pas de nyid ni lha zhes bya ba'o ;
translated: It is called ‚Äúgod‚Äù because it makes the body abide.

original: / ji ltar 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni don ji lta ba bzhin 'byung ba ste /
analyzed: / ji ltar 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni don ji lta ba bzhin 'byung ba ste /

analyzed: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa la mi ltos par ji ltar 'byung ba'o //

original: khu ba ni kun da dang zla ba lta bu'i khu ba'i gzugs so //
analyzed: khu ba ni kun da dang zla ba lta bu'i khu ba'i gzugs so //

original: gang gi phyir de ltar na /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de ltar na /

original: lhan cig skyes pa rnam pa gnyis //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa rnam pa gnyis //

original: zhes bya ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ste /

original: lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba rnam pa gnyis yin no //üîΩgal te de lta bu lhan cig skyes pa yin na /
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba rnam pa gnyis yin no // gal te de lta bu lhan cig skyes pa yin na /

original: skyes pa dang bud med ci zhig yin zhe na /
analyzed: skyes pa dang bud med ci zhig yin zhe na /

original: re zhig btsun mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: re zhig btsun mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: First, it is said, ‚Äúqueen,‚Äù and so on.

original: 'di dag la zhes bya ba ni bdun te /
analyzed: 'di dag la zhes bya ba ni bdun te /

original: dga' ba rnam pa gnyis so //
analyzed: dga' ba rnam pa gnyis so //

original: ji lta bu zhig ce na /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhig ce na /

original: kun rdzob don dam zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: kun rdzob don dam zhes bya ba ste /

original: ji lta ba bzhin 'byung ba ni kun rdzob ste /
analyzed: ji lta ba bzhin 'byung ba ni kun rdzob ste /

original: de nyid phyir na zhes bya ba ni rnam pa gnyis kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid phyir na zhes bya ba ni rnam pa gnyis kyi phyir ro //

analyzed: bzhi'i zhes bya ba ni bzhi rnams so //

original: rab tu dbye ba zhes bya ba ni lhan cig skyes pa'i spyi'i rab tu dbye bas so //
analyzed: rab tu dbye ba zhes bya ba ni lhan cig skyes pa'i spyi'i rab tu dbye bas so //

original: gal te gzhan du ni dga' ba bzhir 'dod pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te gzhan du ni dga' ba bzhir 'dod pa ma yin nam /

analyzed: 'dir gzhan du 'dod pa ji ltar 'gal bar mi 'gyur zhe na /

original: 'di ltar lhan cig skyes zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: 'di ltar lhan cig skyes zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Thus, it is said, ‚ÄúThe connate is differentiated as fourfold.‚Äù

original: dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba la sogs pa bzhi'i rim pas 'byung bar 'gyur zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba la sogs pa bzhi'i rim pas 'byung bar 'gyur zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The connate is differentiated as fourfold by the sequence of joy, supreme joy, and so on.

original: bskyed pa'i rim pa'i phyogs @24a * //
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa'i phyogs @24a * //
translated: The sequence of the creation stage

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: is the sequence of the four joys.

original: de ltar lhan cig skyes pa'i rnam pa gnyis rnam pa bzhir bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: de ltar lhan cig skyes pa'i rnam pa gnyis rnam pa bzhir bstan pa yin te /
translated: Thus, the two aspects of the connate are taught as fourfold.

original: 'di ni bshad pa gcig go //
analyzed: 'di ni bshad pa gcig go //

original: nam mkha'i khams zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: In the line beginning ‚ÄúIn the realm of space,‚Äù

original: padma la zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas spyan la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: padma la zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas spyan la sogs pa rnams so //
translated: ‚Äúin the lotus‚Äù refers to BuddhalocanƒÅ and so forth.

original: ye shes ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: ye shes ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes so //
translated: ‚ÄúWisdom‚Äù is nondual wisdom.

original: nyon mongs pa'i bdud la sogs pa rnams 'jig par byed pas na bha ga zhes brjod do //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i bdud la sogs pa rnams 'jig par byed pas na bha ga zhes brjod do //
translated: The bhaga is so called because it destroys the mƒÅras of afflictions and so forth.

original: bsgom pa zhes bya ba ni phyi rol gyi phyag rgya dang lhan cig tu'o //
analyzed: bsgom pa zhes bya ba ni phyi rol gyi phyag rgya dang lhan cig tu'o //
translated: ‚ÄúCultivation‚Äù is with an external consort.

original: padma dang rdo rje'i sbyor bas dus mnyam du 'bab par gyur pa ni snyoms par 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: padma dang rdo rje'i sbyor bas dus mnyam du 'bab par gyur pa ni snyoms par 'jug pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúUnion‚Äù is the simultaneous descent of the lotus and vajra.

original: de'i bde ba ni snyoms par 'jug pa'i bde ba'o //
analyzed: de'i bde ba ni snyoms par 'jug pa'i bde ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIts bliss‚Äù is the bliss of union.

original: 'khor lor brjod par bya ba ni 'khor lo rnam pa bzhir brjod pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'khor lor brjod par bya ba ni 'khor lo rnam pa bzhir brjod pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: ‚ÄúThe wheel should be spoken of‚Äù means that the fourfold wheel should be spoken of.

original: ji ltar rigs par bya zhes bya ba ni rim pa bzhin du brjod do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ji ltar rigs par bya zhes bya ba ni rim pa bzhin du brjod do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: ‚ÄúAs is appropriate‚Äù means that they should be spoken of in order.

original: rang rig ces bya ba ni las kyi phyag rgya las slob dpon gyi dbang bskur ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi bde ba gang zhig bla ma'i man ngag nyid kyis 'khor lo dang por bstan pa ni rang rig nyid de rang rig pa zhes brjod par bya ba'o //
analyzed: rang rig ces bya ba ni las kyi phyag rgya las slob dpon gyi dbang bskur ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi bde ba gang zhig bla ma'i man ngag nyid kyis 'khor lo dang por bstan pa ni rang rig nyid de rang rig pa zhes brjod par bya ba'o //
translated: What is called ‚Äúself-awareness‚Äù is the bliss that is characterized by the master‚Äôs initiation from the karma consort, which is taught in the first wheel by the guru‚Äôs instructions alone. It is called ‚Äúself-awareness.‚Äù

original: chos kyi phyag rgya sa gang bskyed pa de ni byang chub kyi sems zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: chos kyi phyag rgya sa gang bskyed pa de ni byang chub kyi sems zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The bliss that is generated from the dharma consort is called ‚Äúbodhicitta.‚Äù

original: bde ba de nyid la byang chub kyi sems zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bde ba de nyid la byang chub kyi sems zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of that bliss is called ‚Äúbodhicitta.‚Äù

original: dam tshig gi phyag rgya las gang dmigs pa'i bde ba de ni lha zhes bya'o //
analyzed: dam tshig gi phyag rgya las gang dmigs pa'i bde ba de ni lha zhes bya'o //
translated: The bliss that is observed from the samaya consort is called ‚Äúthe deity.‚Äù

original: phyag rgya chen po las bde ba'i mtshan nyid gang zhig ji ltar 'byung ba'i rim gyis nye bar 'byung bar mtshan nyid can gyi bde ba chen po de ni khu ba zhes bya ste /
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po las bde ba'i mtshan nyid gang zhig ji ltar 'byung ba'i rim gyis nye bar 'byung bar mtshan nyid can gyi bde ba chen po de ni khu ba zhes bya ste /
translated: The bliss that is characterized by the great seal, which arises in the reverse order, is called ‚Äúsemen.‚Äù

original: shu zhes bya ba mya ngan te 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal yin la tra ni gcod par byed pa dang 'dra bas khu ba zhes bya ba yin no //üîΩrnam pa gnyis zhes bya ba ni de lta bu'i phyag rgya rnam pa bzhi las nyams su myong ba'i bde ba nyid ni lhan cig skyes pa rnam pa gnyis zhes bya ste bde ba chen po'i rnam pa ni gcig go //
analyzed: shu zhes bya ba mya ngan te 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal yin la tra ni gcod par byed pa dang 'dra bas khu ba zhes bya ba yin no // rnam pa gnyis zhes bya ba ni de lta bu'i phyag rgya rnam pa bzhi las nyams su myong ba'i bde ba nyid ni lhan cig skyes pa rnam pa gnyis zhes bya ste bde ba chen po'i rnam pa ni gcig go //
translated: Shu means sorrow, which is the suffering of cyclic existence, and tra is like cutting, so it is called semen.üîΩThe two aspects are that the bliss of experience from those four kinds of consorts is called the two kinds of connate, which are the aspect of great bliss and the aspect of cutting off sorrow.

original: mya ngan gcod pa'i rnam pa ni gnyis pa ste /
analyzed: mya ngan gcod pa'i rnam pa ni gnyis pa ste /
translated: The two aspects are that the bliss of experience from those four kinds of consorts is called the two kinds of connate, which are the aspect of great bliss and the aspect of cutting off sorrow.

original: las dang chos la sogs pa'i phyag rgya'i dbye bas lhan cig skyes pa rnam pa gnyis gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: las dang chos la sogs pa'i phyag rgya'i dbye bas lhan cig skyes pa rnam pa gnyis gsungs pa yin no //
translated: The two kinds of connate are taught by the divisions of karma, dharma, and so on.

original: ci 'di skyes pa kho na la 'byung bar 'gyur ram bud med la yang 'byung bar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: ci 'di skyes pa kho na la 'byung bar 'gyur ram bud med la yang 'byung bar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: Is this only for men or also for women?

original: de'i phyir shes rab la yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir shes rab la yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Therefore it is said, Also for wisdom.

original: de nyid phyir na zhes bya ba la sogs pa la dga' ba ni bzhi zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya rnam pa @24b bzhis dbye ba byas pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de nyid phyir na zhes bya ba la sogs pa la dga' ba ni bzhi zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya rnam pa @24b bzhis dbye ba byas pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Therefore, etc.  means that the four joys are differentiated by the four seals.

original: rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud 'dir bud med ji lta ba bzhin du skyes pa yang dman pa dang 'bring dang mchog gi dbye bas dbang la sogs pa rjes su gzung bar bya'o zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud 'dir bud med ji lta ba bzhin du skyes pa yang dman pa dang 'bring dang mchog gi dbye bas dbang la sogs pa rjes su gzung bar bya'o zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: In this Yoginƒ´ Tantra, just as women are, so men are also to be accepted in initiation, etc., by the differentiation of inferior, middling, and superior.

original: phyag rgya bzhi'i dbye bas dga' ba bzhi'i dbye ba byas par ji ltar 'gyur zhe na ;
analyzed: phyag rgya bzhi'i dbye bas dga' ba bzhi'i dbye ba byas par ji ltar 'gyur zhe na ;
translated: How is it that the four joys are differentiated by the differentiation of the four seals?

original: 'di ltar lhan cig skyes zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: 'di ltar lhan cig skyes zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Thus, it is said, co-emergent, etc.

original: bskyed pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba la /
translated: The stage of generation means

original: bde ba bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid kyi skad cig ces bya bar dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: bde ba bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid kyi skad cig ces bya bar dgongs pa'o //
translated: the moment characterized by the generation of bliss.

original: bshad pa gnyis pa ste /
analyzed: bshad pa gnyis pa ste /
translated: This is the second explanation.

original: 'di dag thams cad bla ma'i man ngag las shes par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di dag thams cad bla ma'i man ngag las shes par bya'o //
translated: All of this should be known from the guru's instruction.

original: da ni mdor bsdus nas gsum du bstan pa'i phyir dga' ba dang po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: da ni mdor bsdus nas gsum du bstan pa'i phyir dga' ba dang po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Now, in order to teach the three in brief, he declares the first joy, etc.

original: dba' bo zhes bya ba ni sgrub pa po ste brtson 'grus brtsams pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: dba' bo zhes bya ba ni sgrub pa po ste brtson 'grus brtsams pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The hero is the adept, because he has undertaken perseverance.

original: mchog tu dga' ba'i rnal 'byor ma //
analyzed: mchog tu dga' ba'i rnal 'byor ma //
translated: The yoginƒ´ of supreme joy

original: zhes bya ba ni de med na kun du dga' ba mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de med na kun du dga' ba mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: is the consort, because without her there is no arising of the universal joy.

original: shin tu dga' ba ni ma lus pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i mtshan nyid de kun kyang gsum nyid do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: shin tu dga' ba ni ma lus pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i mtshan nyid de kun kyang gsum nyid do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The joy is the nature of the universal innate, and all of them are the three itself.

original: de nyid bstan pa'i phyir thabs las zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de nyid bstan pa'i phyir thabs las zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: In order to teach just that, he declares from the method, etc.

original: thabs ni phyag rgya'i man ngag bstan pa'o //
analyzed: thabs ni phyag rgya'i man ngag bstan pa'o //
translated: The method is the teaching of the consort‚Äôs esoteric instructions.

original: de bsgoms pa las skyes pa'i bde ba ni des bde ba'o //
analyzed: de bsgoms pa las skyes pa'i bde ba ni des bde ba'o //
translated: The bliss born from its cultivation is the bliss of that.

original: thams cad rig ces bya ba ni rdo rje 'chang ngo //
analyzed: thams cad rig ces bya ba ni rdo rje 'chang ngo //
translated: The knower of all is Vajradhara.

original: bskyed pa'i rim par 'di lhan cig skyes pa mtshon par bya ba'i phyir dga' ba bzhi 'dod par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim par 'di lhan cig skyes pa mtshon par bya ba'i phyir dga' ba bzhi 'dod par byed pa yin no //
translated: In the stage of generation, these four joys are desired in order to illustrate the innate.

original: rdzogs pa'i rim par ni lhan cig skyes pa gcig nyid bsgom par bya ba'o //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim par ni lhan cig skyes pa gcig nyid bsgom par bya ba'o //
translated: In the stage of completion, the innate alone is to be cultivated.

original: don dam nyid rig pa gsum dang tshigs su bcad pa gsum gyis bstan pa'i phyir dga' bas bde bya ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: don dam nyid rig pa gsum dang tshigs su bcad pa gsum gyis bstan pa'i phyir dga' bas bde bya ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: In order to teach the ultimate itself by means of the three knowledges and three verses, he says, ‚ÄúJoy is the bliss-maker,‚Äù and so on.

original: lhag mas lhan cig skyes dga' nyid //
analyzed: lhag mas lhan cig skyes dga' nyid //
translated: The rest is the innate itself.

original: ces bya ba ni kun gyi phyi ma nyid do //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni kun gyi phyi ma nyid do //
translated: The last of all is ‚Äúthe innate itself.‚Äù

original: gang yang gsum po 'di dag ni 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir dang / 'khrul pa nyid yin pa'i phyir 'khor ba kun tu 'byung bar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: gang yang gsum po 'di dag ni 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir dang / 'khrul pa nyid yin pa'i phyir 'khor ba kun tu 'byung bar byed pa yin no //
translated: Moreover, since these three are the nature of samsara and nirvana, and since they are error itself, they cause the arising of all samsara.

original: des na de'i phyir bsgrub par bya ba bde ba chen po'i chos kyi sku'i mtshan nyid thob par byed pa ni lhan cig skyes pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: des na de'i phyir bsgrub par bya ba bde ba chen po'i chos kyi sku'i mtshan nyid thob par byed pa ni lhan cig skyes pa zhes bya ste /
translated: Therefore, in order to attain the object to be attained, the nature of the great bliss dharmakƒÅya, there is what is called the ‚Äúinnate.‚Äù

original: de'i bsgom par bya ba gcig yin no //
analyzed: de'i bsgom par bya ba gcig yin no //
translated: That is the one to be cultivated.

original: yang ci'i phyir gsum po 'di dag thar par 'dren par byed pa ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: yang ci'i phyir gsum po 'di dag thar par 'dren par byed pa ma yin zhe na /
translated: Again, why are these three not the liberators?

original: dang por reg par zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /üîΩreg par zhes bya @25a * //
analyzed: dang por reg par zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te / reg par zhes bya @25a * //
translated: He says, ‚ÄúFirst, the contact,‚Äù and so on.

original: ba ni padmar rdo rjes so //
analyzed: ba ni padmar rdo rjes so //
translated: The contact is with the lotus by the vajra.

original: gnyis pa zhes bya ba ni de bas lhag par gyur pa'i bde ba 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: gnyis pa zhes bya ba ni de bas lhag par gyur pa'i bde ba 'dod pa'o //
translated: The second is the desire for the bliss that is greater than that.

original: gsum pa zhes bya ba ni dga' bral gyi dga' ba'o //
analyzed: gsum pa zhes bya ba ni dga' bral gyi dga' ba'o //
translated: The third is the joy of the separation from joy.

original: 'dod chags 'jig pa nyid ces bya ba ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dod chags 'jig pa nyid ces bya ba ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The destruction of passion is because of the nature of being free from passion.

original: des na zhes bya ba ni de'i phyir bzhi bzhes bya ba lhan cig skyes pa bsgom par bya'o zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: des na zhes bya ba ni de'i phyir bzhi bzhes bya ba lhan cig skyes pa bsgom par bya'o zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o //
translated: Therefore, for that reason, the fourth is the one to be cultivated, which is the connate bliss.

original: mchog tu dga' ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: mchog tu dga' ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Supreme joy and so on.

original: srid par zhes bya ba ni 'khor ba'i mtshan nyid can de /
analyzed: srid par zhes bya ba ni 'khor ba'i mtshan nyid can de /
translated: Existence is the characteristic of samsara.

original: lhan cig skyes pa la 'dod pa dang chags pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa la 'dod pa dang chags pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The connate is desired and clung to.

original: dga' bral las ni zhes bya ba ni dga' bral ni mya ngan las 'das par bstan pa'o //
analyzed: dga' bral las ni zhes bya ba ni dga' bral ni mya ngan las 'das par bstan pa'o //
translated: The line from the separation of joy teaches that the separation of joy is nirvana.

original: dbu ma zhes bya ba ni dga' ba dang po ni dga' ba tsam ste thun mong gi bde ba tsam nyid do //
analyzed: dbu ma zhes bya ba ni dga' ba dang po ni dga' ba tsam ste thun mong gi bde ba tsam nyid do //
translated: The line the middle means that the first joy is just joy, just the common bliss.

original: 'di dag ces bya ba ni bstan pa'i gsum po spangs pa'i lhan cig skyes pa ste 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa dag gi skyon gyis mtshon par ma gyur pa'i ngo bo nyid de /
analyzed: 'di dag ces bya ba ni bstan pa'i gsum po spangs pa'i lhan cig skyes pa ste 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa dag gi skyon gyis mtshon par ma gyur pa'i ngo bo nyid de /
translated: The line these means that the connate bliss that is the abandonment of the three that were taught is the nature that is not characterized by the faults of samsara and nirvana.

original: da bsgom par bya ba yin gyi /
analyzed: da bsgom par bya ba yin gyi /
translated: It is to be cultivated.

original: gzhan ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //üîΩgal te de ltar na lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba bsgrub par bya ba rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang thob par byed pa yin na shes rab kyi ze'u 'bru nyid du nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba'i phyir bya ba byas pa yin pas bsgoms pas ci
analyzed: gzhan ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du'o // gal te de ltar na lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba bsgrub par bya ba rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang thob par byed pa yin na shes rab kyi ze'u 'bru nyid du nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba'i phyir bya ba byas pa yin pas bsgoms pas ci
translated: It is not the other, up to here.

original: zhig bya zhe na /
analyzed: zhig bya zhe na /
translated: If it is like that, if the connate bliss is to be accomplished, it is the cause of attaining the state of Great Vajradhara. Since it is experienced as the pistil cup of wisdom, it has done its job. What is the use of cultivating it?

original: gzhan gyis brjod min zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: gzhan gyis brjod min zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: The line not expressed by others and so forth is stated.

original: bla ma dang rdo rje 'chang la sogs pas gang du yang ma yin la 'khor lo bzhi dang shes rab kyi padma dang mnyam par sbyor bas kyang ma yin te /
analyzed: bla ma dang rdo rje 'chang la sogs pas gang du yang ma yin la 'khor lo bzhi dang shes rab kyi padma dang mnyam par sbyor bas kyang ma yin te /
translated: It is not expressed anywhere by the guru, Vajradhara, and so forth, nor is it expressed by the union with the four wheels, the lotus of wisdom, and so forth.

original: de ni so so rang gis rig par bya ba dag gis rtogs pa'i yul las 'das pa'o zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: de ni so so rang gis rig par bya ba dag gis rtogs pa'i yul las 'das pa'o zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o //
translated: It is the domain of realization by those who have the individual self-empowerment, and it is beyond the domain of conceptual thought.

original: gal te de ltar na de bstan pa dang thos par ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: gal te de ltar na de bstan pa dang thos par ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: If it is like that, how can it be taught and heard?

original: kun rdzob gyis brjod pa yin gyi /
analyzed: kun rdzob gyis brjod pa yin gyi /
translated: It is expressed by the relative,

original: gang gi ngo bos ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gang gi ngo bos ni ma yin te /
translated: but not by its own nature.

original: lha dang dmyal ba'i bde ba dang sdug bsngal bstan pa dang thos pa bzhin no //
analyzed: lha dang dmyal ba'i bde ba dang sdug bsngal bstan pa dang thos pa bzhin no //
translated: It is like the teaching and hearing of the happiness and suffering of gods and hell beings.

original: gal te de ltar na de ji ltar shes pa nyid yin zhe na /
analyzed: gal te de ltar na de ji ltar shes pa nyid yin zhe na /
translated: If it is like that, how can it be knowledge?

original: bdag gi bsod nams zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: bdag gi bsod nams zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: The line by the power of my merit and so forth is stated.

original: bsgom pa'i khyad par nyid kyis dmigs par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: bsgom pa'i khyad par nyid kyis dmigs par bya ba yin no //
translated: It is the object of observation by the special cultivation.

original: de'i phyir bsgom pa don med pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir bsgom pa don med pa ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, meditation is not meaningless,

original: bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs pa med par de mngon sum du bya bar @25b mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs pa med par de mngon sum du bya bar @25b mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because without the completion of meditation, one cannot actualize it.

original: de yang ji skad du /
analyzed: de yang ji skad du /
translated: And that is stated:

original: srid pa'i brug rngu sel byed pa'o //
analyzed: srid pa'i brug rngu sel byed pa'o //
translated: The one who removes the abscess of existence,

original: da yis khyod la lam bstan byas //
analyzed: da yis khyod la lam bstan byas //
translated: I have shown you the path.

original: khyod nyid kyis ni bya ba sta //üîΩde bzhin gshegs pa ston pa tsam //
analyzed: khyod nyid kyis ni bya ba sta // de bzhin gshegs pa ston pa tsam //
translated: You yourself must do it.

original: zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: The Tathagata is merely a teacher.

original: gal te dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo la sogs pa bsgom pa 'di ni rigs kyi ;
analyzed: gal te dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo la sogs pa bsgom pa 'di ni rigs kyi ;
translated: If this meditation on the mandala wheel, etc. is the family,

original: lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba ni mngon sum du nye bar dmigs pa yin pas mngon sum du 'gyur ba'i don de gzhan la bstan par rigs pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba ni mngon sum du nye bar dmigs pa yin pas mngon sum du 'gyur ba'i don de gzhan la bstan par rigs pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: and the innate joy is the object of direct perception, then it is not right to teach that object of direct perception to another.

original: de'i phyir bsod nams las zhes bya ba la gsungs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir bsod nams las zhes bya ba la gsungs so //
translated: Therefore, it is said, ‚Äúfrom merit.‚Äù

original: 'di snyam du dgongs te /
analyzed: 'di snyam du dgongs te /
translated: The idea is this:

original: 'jig rten pa nyid kyis lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba ni bsgrub par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: 'jig rten pa nyid kyis lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba ni bsgrub par bya ba ma yin te /
translated: The innate joy is not to be accomplished by the worldly person.

original: grub pa nyid kyi phyir dang zag pa dang bcas pas dri ma can yin pa'i phyir dang 'khor ba pa rnams de'i rtsa ba can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: grub pa nyid kyi phyir dang zag pa dang bcas pas dri ma can yin pa'i phyir dang 'khor ba pa rnams de'i rtsa ba can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is established, because it is defiled by being associated with outflows, and because those in cyclic existence are rooted in it.

original: 'o na ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: If that is so, then how is it?

original: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis gang so so yang dag par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis gang so so yang dag par rig par bya'o //
translated: It is to be realized by the TathƒÅgatas themselves.

original: chos kyi sku zhes bya ba lhan cig skyes pa de 'dir bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: chos kyi sku zhes bya ba lhan cig skyes pa de 'dir bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
translated: The so-called dharma body, which is co-emergent, is to be accomplished here.

original: de yang thabs gzhan yod pa ma yin pas 'dir 'jig rten pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' bas man ngag ji lta ba bzhin du lhag par mos par byas nas bsgoms pa las yongs su smin par 'gyur ba'i stobs kyis bdag nyid kyis shes par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: de yang thabs gzhan yod pa ma yin pas 'dir 'jig rten pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' bas man ngag ji lta ba bzhin du lhag par mos par byas nas bsgoms pa las yongs su smin par 'gyur ba'i stobs kyis bdag nyid kyis shes par 'gyur gyi /
translated: Moreover, since there is no other method, here, through the worldly co-emergent joy, having cultivated it by way of the instructions, it will be ripened by the power of meditation and will be known by oneself.

original: sngar gyi ni ma yin no //
analyzed: sngar gyi ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not the previous one.

original: de'i phyir thos pa dang bsams pa dang bsgoms pa don med par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir thos pa dang bsams pa dang bsgoms pa don med par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, hearing, reflection, and meditation are not meaningless.

original: thabs ni lam mo //
analyzed: thabs ni lam mo //
translated: The method is the path.

original: de bsten pa ni yang dag par bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: de bsten pa ni yang dag par bsgom pa'o //
translated: Relying on it is correct meditation.

original: de'i dus ni mang po nyid de /
analyzed: de'i dus ni mang po nyid de /

original: rnam pa du ma zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rnam pa du ma zhes bya ba'i don to //

original: bla ma las rnyed pa'i dus ni bla ma'i dus te /
analyzed: bla ma las rnyed pa'i dus ni bla ma'i dus te /

original: gang snod du gyur pa'i slob ma la bla mas cho ga bzhin du byin pa ste /
analyzed: gang snod du gyur pa'i slob ma la bla mas cho ga bzhin du byin pa ste /
translated: That which the guru gives to the disciple who is a proper vessel, in accordance with the rite.

original: man ngag ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: man ngag ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is: the oral instruction.

original: gal te lhan cig skyes pa de ji ltar bsgom par bya /üîΩyul gcig nyid du 'am /
analyzed: gal te lhan cig skyes pa de ji ltar bsgom par bya / yul gcig nyid du 'am /
translated: If that innate is to be cultivated,üîΩis it to be cultivated in one object,

analyzed: 'on te sna tshogs la mngon par khyab pa nyid du zhe na /
translated: or is it to be cultivated in the pervasion of the variety?

original: dman pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: dman pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: The inferior, etc.

original: 'di ni mdor bstan pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni mdor bstan pa'o //

original: 'di bshad pa ni phra ba'i don zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: 'di bshad pa ni phra ba'i don zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /

analyzed: phra ba'i don ni bdag nyid kyi sems dang sems las byung ba'o //
translated: The subtle object is one's own mind and mental factors.

analyzed: dngos por zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyi lus so //

analyzed: gnyis kyis zhes bya ba ni rang gi lus dang yan lag @26a * //

analyzed: de ji lta bu zhig ce na /

analyzed: ro zhes bya ba ni snying po ste dngos po zhes bya ba'i rnam grangs so //
translated: The animate and inanimate are my body.üîΩ The animate and inanimate

original: gang ro yin zhe na /
analyzed: gang ro yin zhe na /
translated: What is the flavor?

original: 'khor lo'i steng bde ba chen po'i mtshan nyid can lhan cig skyes pa'i zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'khor lo'i steng bde ba chen po'i mtshan nyid can lhan cig skyes pa'i zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of the term ‚Äúcoemergent‚Äù is the characteristic of great bliss above the wheel.

original: mdor bsdus pa'i don bstan pa'i phyir ;üîΩbsgom pa ro gcig mnyam pa nyid //
analyzed: mdor bsdus pa'i don bstan pa'i phyir ; bsgom pa ro gcig mnyam pa nyid //
translated: In order to teach the meaning in brief,

original: ces gsungs so //
analyzed: ces gsungs so //
translated: [the BhagavƒÅn] declares, ‚ÄúThe meditation is the sameness of one taste.‚Äù

original: yang ro gcig pa'i mnyam pa nyid ji ltar bsgom par bya zhe na /
analyzed: yang ro gcig pa'i mnyam pa nyid ji ltar bsgom par bya zhe na /
translated: Again, how should one meditate on the sameness of one taste?

original: nga las zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: nga las zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: [The BhagavƒÅn] declares, ‚ÄúFrom me,‚Äù and so on.

original: de ltar rnal 'byor pas shes nas zhes bya ba ni de ltar nges par bzung nas so //
analyzed: de ltar rnal 'byor pas shes nas zhes bya ba ni de ltar nges par bzung nas so //
translated: ‚Äú Having understood thus‚Äù means having ascertained thus.
