analyzed: shin tu mnyam gzhag ces bya ba ni gnas skabs thams cad du'o //
translated: ‚Äú Very equipoised‚Äù means in all situations.

original: de nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir bza' ba dang btung ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir bza' ba dang btung ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: In order to clarify just that, [the BhagavƒÅn] declares, ‚Äúfood and drink,‚Äù and so on.

original: ngang gi zhes bya ba ni rang gi ngang gis 'jug pa'o //üîΩphyag rgya chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: ngang gi zhes bya ba ni rang gi ngang gis 'jug pa'o // phyag rgya chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: ‚Äú Naturally‚Äù means engaging by one‚Äôs own nature.üîΩWith regard to ‚Äúthe accomplishment of the great seal,‚Äù and so on,

original: phyag rgya chen po bsgrub pa'i phyir //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po bsgrub pa'i phyir //
translated: [the BhagavƒÅn] declares, ‚ÄúFor the sake of accomplishing the great seal,‚Äù and so on.

original: zhas bya ba'i don te 'dis ni lhag par mos pa'i rnal 'byor bstan to //
analyzed: zhas bya ba'i don te 'dis ni lhag par mos pa'i rnal 'byor bstan to //
translated: This shows the yoga of resolute intent.

original: da ni 'di nyid la sems bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni 'di nyid la sems bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to show just this, he says:

original: 'gro ba thams cad bsgom par 'gyur //üîΩzhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad bsgom par 'gyur // zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: One should meditate on all beings.

original: 'gro ba thams cad ces bya ba ni sems can dang snod kyi 'jig rten te /
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad ces bya ba ni sems can dang snod kyi 'jig rten te /
translated: All beings refers to the world of sentient beings and the world of their vessels.

original: de thams cad bsgoms pa las 'byung ba nyid do //
analyzed: de thams cad bsgoms pa las 'byung ba nyid do //
translated: All of that arises from meditation.

original: gang gi phyir zhe na /
analyzed: gang gi phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: yid kyis zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: yid kyis zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: He says, ‚Äúwith the mind.‚Äù

original: rnam par rtog pa can gyi shes pas so //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa can gyi shes pas so //
translated: With conceptual cognition.

original: gal te brtag par mi bya na bsgom par yang mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: gal te brtag par mi bya na bsgom par yang mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If it is not to be imagined, then it will not be meditated on.

original: thams cad chos ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: thams cad chos ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: To respond, he says, ‚Äúall phenomena,‚Äù and so on.

original: lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo bo nyid yongs su shes @26b par 'gyur ba ni bsgom par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo bo nyid yongs su shes @26b par 'gyur ba ni bsgom par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the nature that is connate is to be known and meditated on.

original: brtan dang g-yo ba'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: brtan dang g-yo ba'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: With respect to ‚Äúthe animate and inanimate,‚Äù and so on,

original: de thams cad dam pa'i de nyid ces bya ba de kho na nyid kyi gzugs su bsgom par bya ba'o //
analyzed: de thams cad dam pa'i de nyid ces bya ba de kho na nyid kyi gzugs su bsgom par bya ba'o //
translated: All of that is to be cultivated in the form of the reality called the ‚Äúsupreme reality.‚Äù

original: yang de'i dam pa'i de nyid gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: yang de'i dam pa'i de nyid gang yin zhe na /
translated: Again, what is that supreme reality of those?

original: bdag gi dngos po'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: bdag gi dngos po'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: It is stated with ‚Äúthe entity of self,‚Äù and so on.

original: bdag gi zhes bya ba ni rang gi sems lhan cig skyes pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi ngo bo'o //
analyzed: bdag gi zhes bya ba ni rang gi sems lhan cig skyes pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi ngo bo'o //
translated: ‚Äú Self‚Äù is the entity of one‚Äôs mind, which has the character of being connate.

original: de rnams dam pa gcig yod min //
analyzed: de rnams dam pa gcig yod min //
translated: ‚Äú They do not have a supreme unity‚Äù

original: zhes bya ba ni lan cig skyes pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi de kho na nyid do //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni lan cig skyes pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi de kho na nyid do //
translated: means that reality has the character of being produced once.

original: yang de dag gcig yod min pa ci zhe na /
analyzed: yang de dag gcig yod min pa ci zhe na /
translated: Again, why do they not have a unity?

original: rang rig ces bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: rang rig ces bya ba gsungs so //
translated: It is stated with ‚Äúself-awareness.‚Äù

original: gal te yang chos thams cad kyi de kho na nyid ni yang dag pa'i mtha' yin pas de las gzhan pa'i de kho na ni yod pa ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: gal te yang chos thams cad kyi de kho na nyid ni yang dag pa'i mtha' yin pas de las gzhan pa'i de kho na ni yod pa ma yin zhe na /
translated: If the reality of all phenomena is the limit of reality, then there is no reality other than that.

original: rang rig nas ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: rang rig nas ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: It is stated with ‚Äúhaving realized self-awareness,‚Äù and so on.

original: bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin gyi sems kho na las phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub tu 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin gyi sems kho na las phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub tu 'gyur ba'o //
translated: Only from the mind, which is of the nature of great bliss, is there the spiritual attainment of the Great Seal.

original: rang rig phyir ni zhes bya ba ni bde ba chen po'i mtshan nyid can gyi sems kho na rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i phyogs na bsgom par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: rang rig phyir ni zhes bya ba ni bde ba chen po'i mtshan nyid can gyi sems kho na rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i phyogs na bsgom par bya ba yin no //
translated: Because of self-awareness means that only the mind, which is characterized by great bliss, is to be cultivated in the context of the perfection stage.

original: rang gis rig ces bya ba la /
analyzed: rang gis rig ces bya ba la /
translated: As for self-awareness,

original: gang cung zhig sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i brtan pa dang g-yo ba la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs mthong ba de nyid ni las yin no //
analyzed: gang cung zhig sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i brtan pa dang g-yo ba la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs mthong ba de nyid ni las yin no //
translated: whatever is seen of the various kinds of sentient beings, such as the stable and the moving, is born from the evolution of their karma.

original: gal te de ltar rang rig pa las 'byung bar 'gyur na phyag rgya chen po 'grub par ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: gal te de ltar rang rig pa las 'byung bar 'gyur na phyag rgya chen po 'grub par ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: If it arises in this way from self-awareness, how is there the spiritual attainment of the Great Seal?

original: de'i phyir rtog pa las ni zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir rtog pa las ni zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, he says,

original: rtog pa ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i ngo bo nyid bsgrub pa'o //
analyzed: rtog pa ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i ngo bo nyid bsgrub pa'o //
translated: Conceptualization is the essence of subject and object.

original: de las skyes par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: de las skyes par 'gyur gyi /
translated: It is born from that.

original: yang sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin gyi lhan cig skyes pa bsgoms pa las ni ma yin no //
analyzed: yang sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin gyi lhan cig skyes pa bsgoms pa las ni ma yin no //
translated: Moreover, it is not from the cultivation of the innate nature of diversity.

original: de lta bas na gang gis phyir las rnams ni lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de lta bas na gang gis phyir las rnams ni lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, since the actions are of an innate nature,

original: rang gis 'phrog cing rang gis byed //
analyzed: rang gis 'phrog cing rang gis byed //
translated: one seizes oneself and one acts oneself.

original: ces bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: ces bya ba gsungs te /
translated: This is what is stated.

original: de las ma gtogs pa'i byed pa po gzhan med pa phyir ro //
analyzed: de las ma gtogs pa'i byed pa po gzhan med pa phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no other agent apart from that.

original: rang gis 'phrog cing zhes bya ba ni legs par spyad pa dang nyes par spyad pa'i las rnams so //
analyzed: rang gis 'phrog cing zhes bya ba ni legs par spyad pa dang nyes par spyad pa'i las rnams so //
translated: One seizes oneself means the actions of good conduct and bad conduct.

original: rang nyid rgyal po zhes bya ba ni rgyal po nyid do //
analyzed: rang nyid rgyal po zhes bya ba ni rgyal po nyid do //
translated: One is the king means sovereignty.

original: nyon mongs pa ma lus pa zad par byed pa'i mthu dang ldan pas rang gtso bo zhes bya ba'o //üîΩ'dod chags @27a * //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa ma lus pa zad par byed pa'i mthu dang ldan pas rang gtso bo zhes bya ba'o // 'dod chags @27a * //
translated: One is the chief means having the power to bring about the complete destruction of the afflictions.üîΩAttachment, etc.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'o //
translated: means attachment, etc.

original: de kun gnas ni zhes bya ba ni rang rig pa'i go 'phang bsgom par bya ba 'di'o //
analyzed: de kun gnas ni zhes bya ba ni rang rig pa'i go 'phang bsgom par bya ba 'di'o //
translated: The abode of all means the cultivation of the state of self-awareness.

original: bcu drug char yang zhes bya ba ni nyams par byed par mi nus pa'o //
analyzed: bcu drug char yang zhes bya ba ni nyams par byed par mi nus pa'o //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúin all sixteen‚Äù means that it is not possible to destroy it.

original: da ni rang rig pa'i rang bzhin bstan pa'i phyir chos 'byung las skyes zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: da ni rang rig pa'i rang bzhin bstan pa'i phyir chos 'byung las skyes zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Now, in order to teach the nature of self-awareness, [the BhagavƒÅn] declares the emergence of phenomena, etc.

original: chos zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa'i chos so //
analyzed: chos zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa'i chos so //
translated: The term ‚Äúphenomena‚Äù refers to the ƒÅrya‚Äôs Dharma.

original: de rnams 'di las 'byung bas na chos 'byung zhes bya ste chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: de rnams 'di las 'byung bas na chos 'byung zhes bya ste chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: Since they emerge from it, it is called the ‚Äúsource of phenomena,‚Äù i.e., the dharmadhƒÅtu.

original: 'dir ni de'i phyag rgyar bstan pa btsun mo'i padma la chos 'byung zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'dir ni de'i phyag rgyar bstan pa btsun mo'i padma la chos 'byung zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Here, it is taught as the seal of that, i.e., the lotus of the queen, which is called the ‚Äúsource of phenomena.‚Äù

original: de la mos pa'i stobs kyis so //
analyzed: de la mos pa'i stobs kyis so //
translated: It is due to the power of devotion to that.

original: de las byung ba 'di la yod pas na chos 'byung las skyes zhes bya ba ste ye shes so //
analyzed: de las byung ba 'di la yod pas na chos 'byung las skyes zhes bya ba ste ye shes so //
translated: Since that emergence exists here, it is called ‚Äúborn from the source of phenomena,‚Äù i.e., gnosis.

original: de ji lta bu zhig ce na /
analyzed: de ji lta bu zhig ce na /
translated: What is it like?

original: nam mkha' mnyam zhes bya ba ste nam mkha'i rang bzhin can no //
analyzed: nam mkha' mnyam zhes bya ba ste nam mkha'i rang bzhin can no //
translated: It is equal to space, i.e., it has the nature of space.

original: thabs ni lam mo //
analyzed: thabs ni lam mo //
translated: The method is the path.

original: de yang rnam pa du mar bshad cing bstan to //
analyzed: de yang rnam pa du mar bshad cing bstan to //
translated: And that is explained and taught in many ways.

original: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i phyogs la lhan cig skyes pa'i nyid gcig pu tsam bsgom par bya ba la yang thabs du ma nyid kyis yin no //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i phyogs la lhan cig skyes pa'i nyid gcig pu tsam bsgom par bya ba la yang thabs du ma nyid kyis yin no //
translated: In the perfection stage, one should meditate on the very same innate nature by means of many methods.

original: 'dis ji ltar na rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang thob par 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: 'dis ji ltar na rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang thob par 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How does one attain the state of Great Vajradhara by this?

original: 'jig rten gsum po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: He says, ‚Äúthe three worlds,‚Äù etc.

original: phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams ni sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba so so yang dag dpag tu med pas 'jig rten gsum zhes bya'o //
analyzed: phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams ni sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba so so yang dag dpag tu med pas 'jig rten gsum zhes bya'o //
translated: The Buddhas of the ten directions and three times are the three worlds, because of their immeasurable individual secrets of body, speech, and mind.

original: de dag bsdus pa ni 'jig rten gsum zhes bya ba rdo rje 'chang chen po ste /
analyzed: de dag bsdus pa ni 'jig rten gsum zhes bya ba rdo rje 'chang chen po ste /
translated: Their collection is the ‚Äúthree worlds,‚Äù i.e., Great Vajradhara.

original: de de las skyes pa'o //
analyzed: de de las skyes pa'o //
translated: He is born from that.

original: de'i phyir ye shes de bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir ye shes de bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, one should meditate on that intuition.

original: ci'i ngo bo zhe na /üîΩthabs dang shes rab rang bzhin las //
analyzed: ci'i ngo bo zhe na / thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin las //
translated: What is its nature?

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: He says, ‚Äúfrom the nature of means and insight,‚Äù etc.

original: khyad par can gyi ye shes ni shes rab ste chos kyi sku'o //
analyzed: khyad par can gyi ye shes ni shes rab ste chos kyi sku'o //
translated: The intuition of the special stage is insight, the Dharma Body.

original: thabs ni 'gro ba'i don byed pa'i thabs so //
analyzed: thabs ni 'gro ba'i don byed pa'i thabs so //
translated: The means is the means of acting for the welfare of beings.

original: de dag gi rgyu mthun par 'gyur ba ni longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul pa'i sku gnyis te /
analyzed: de dag gi rgyu mthun par 'gyur ba ni longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul pa'i sku gnyis te /
translated: The natural outflow of those is the two bodies, the beatific and the emanation bodies.

original: de dag gi rang bzhin nyid ni de dag gi rang bzhin las skyes pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de dag gi rang bzhin nyid ni de dag gi rang bzhin las skyes pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The nature of those is the nature of those, which means that they are born from the nature of those.

original: ji ltar de dag gi rang bzhin las skye zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar de dag gi rang bzhin las skye zhe na /
translated: How are they born from the nature of those?

original: khu ba'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: khu ba'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: The statement beginning with ‚Äúsemen‚Äù is made.

original: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya bas ni sku gnyis kyi bsdus pa'i thabs gsungs so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya bas ni sku gnyis kyi bsdus pa'i thabs gsungs so //
translated: The Blessed One refers to the means included in the two bodies.

original: de'i bde zhes bya ba ni gang yang nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i ye shes zhes pa @27b de ni chags can ma ste shes rab ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de'i bde zhes bya ba ni gang yang nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i ye shes zhes pa @27b de ni chags can ma ste shes rab ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: The bliss of that is the wisdom that is equal to space, which is the passionate one, meaning the wisdom.

original: gcig dang du ma bral ba zhes bya ba la 'di zhes bya ba ni thabs kyi cha ste khu ba'i rnam pa'o //
analyzed: gcig dang du ma bral ba zhes bya ba la 'di zhes bya ba ni thabs kyi cha ste khu ba'i rnam pa'o //
translated: Free from one and many refers to the aspect of means, which is the form of semen.

original: gcig dang du ma'i rang bzhin dang bral ba'i phyir brtags na stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gcig dang du ma'i rang bzhin dang bral ba'i phyir brtags na stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúemptiness‚Äù is that it is empty when examined, because it is devoid of the nature of one and many.

original: de'i phyir na bsgom par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir na bsgom par bya ba ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, it is not to be cultivated,

original: mi bden pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir myur du byang chub thob pa'i sbyor ba ma yin pa nyid do //
analyzed: mi bden pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir myur du byang chub thob pa'i sbyor ba ma yin pa nyid do //
translated: because it is not the practice for quickly attaining enlightenment, due to its unreal nature.

original: skad cig ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: skad cig ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: In the line ‚Äúmomentary,‚Äù etc.,

original: gcig las mchog dga' zhes bya ba ni lhag par dga' bas te /
analyzed: gcig las mchog dga' zhes bya ba ni lhag par dga' bas te /
translated: ‚Äúsupreme bliss‚Äù is the special bliss,

original: lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba chen po'i ye shes so //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba chen po'i ye shes so //
translated: the exalted wisdom of the great simultaneously born bliss.

original: de nyid ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid de bsgom par bya ba'i mchog gtso bo zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de nyid ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid de bsgom par bya ba'i mchog gtso bo zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: That is the supreme meditation on the emptiness of all phenomena, the chief one, is the meaning of the words.

original: de la gcig dang du ma'i dpyad pa yod pa ma yin no zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: de la gcig dang du ma'i dpyad pa yod pa ma yin no zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o //
translated: It is intended that there is no analysis of one and many in that.

original: gal te de la dpyod pa'i skabs yod pa ma yin na de ji ltar shes par 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: gal te de la dpyod pa'i skabs yod pa ma yin na de ji ltar shes par 'gyur zhe na /
translated: If there is no opportunity for analysis in that, how is it known?

original: rang gis rig pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: rang gis rig pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: It is said, ‚Äúself-cognizant,‚Äù etc.

original: so so rang gis rig par bya ba yin pas gzhan gyis brjod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: so so rang gis rig par bya ba yin pas gzhan gyis brjod pa ma yin no //
translated: Since it is to be known by oneself, it is not expressed by another.

original: dag gi lam 'das zhes bya ba ni ngag gi lam ni sgrub pa ste ngag gi lam zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dag gi lam 'das zhes bya ba ni ngag gi lam ni sgrub pa ste ngag gi lam zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The path of speech is the path of speech, that is, the path of speech.

original: de las 'das pa ni spyod yul ma yin pa ste /
analyzed: de las 'das pa ni spyod yul ma yin pa ste /
translated: Beyond that, it is not the domain,

original: de'i yul las shin tu 'das pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de'i yul las shin tu 'das pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: the meaning is far beyond its domain.

original: 'di ni byin rlabs rim pa'i phyir //
analyzed: 'di ni byin rlabs rim pa'i phyir //
translated: This is because of the stage of blessing,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: and so on.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs bsdus pa nyid kyis de'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs bsdus pa nyid kyis de'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The stage of blessing is the stage of the blessing of the body, speech, and mind of all tathƒÅgatas.

original: sa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis ni lhan cig skyes pa bsgoms pa'i 'bras bu gsungs so //
analyzed: sa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis ni lhan cig skyes pa bsgoms pa'i 'bras bu gsungs so //
translated: The two verses beginning with earth explain the result of the cultivation of the innate.

original: ji ltar nas la sogs pas mi gnod ce na /
analyzed: ji ltar nas la sogs pas mi gnod ce na /
translated: How is it not harmed by seeds and so on?

original: gal te bsgom pa po 'dod par gyur nas la 'og tu 'dzul zhing steng du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te bsgom pa po 'dod par gyur nas la 'og tu 'dzul zhing steng du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If the cultivator wishes, he can enter the earth below and emerge above.

original: thad kar yang ri dang rtsig pa la mi thogs par 'gro ba yang byed do //
analyzed: thad kar yang ri dang rtsig pa la mi thogs par 'gro ba yang byed do //
translated: One also goes directly through mountains and walls without impediment.

original: dug dang mtshon la sogs pas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dug dang mtshon la sogs pas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur ro //
translated: One is not afflicted by poison, weapons, and so forth.

original: chu'i steng du gnas shing nang du 'jug par yang 'gyur la /
analyzed: chu'i steng du gnas shing nang du 'jug par yang 'gyur la /
translated: One stands on water and enters into it,

original: nyal ba dang 'dug pa dang 'chag par yang byed do //
analyzed: nyal ba dang 'dug pa dang 'chag par yang byed do //
translated: and one also sleeps, sits, and walks on it.

original: rlung dang char 'bab pa la sogs pas kyang nyon mongs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rlung dang char 'bab pa la sogs pas kyang nyon mongs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: One is not afflicted by wind, rain, and so forth.

original: de bzhin du gzhan dag la yang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du gzhan dag la yang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: One should apply this also to the others.

original: rang gzhan rig pa'i tshor ba yis //üîΩzhes bya ba ni @28a * //
analyzed: rang gzhan rig pa'i tshor ba yis // zhes bya ba ni @28a * //
translated: One knows the feelings of oneself and others.

original: bdag dang gzhan gyi 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar gyi sems shes pa'o //
analyzed: bdag dang gzhan gyi 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar gyi sems shes pa'o //
translated: One knows the past, future, and present minds of oneself and others.

original: mtho ris mi yul zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: mtho ris mi yul zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: In the heavens and the human world, etc.,

original: gzugs gcig ces bya ba ni rang bzhin gcig pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs gcig ces bya ba ni rang bzhin gcig pa'o //
translated: one form means one nature.

original: rang gzhan cha'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don bstan zin to //
analyzed: rang gzhan cha'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don bstan zin to //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúone‚Äôs own and others‚Äô parts,‚Äù etc., has already been explained.

original: lung gzhan dag las dgyes pa'i rdo rje khyad par can rab tu bstan pa'i phyir thams cad rig byed ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: lung gzhan dag las dgyes pa'i rdo rje khyad par can rab tu bstan pa'i phyir thams cad rig byed ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: In order to teach the special Hevajra Tantra, he says, ‚Äúall the Vedas,‚Äù and so on.

original: rig byed ni nges brjod dang srid srung dang snyan dngags dang mchod sbyin no //
analyzed: rig byed ni nges brjod dang srid srung dang snyan dngags dang mchod sbyin no //
translated: The Vedas are the ·πög Veda, the Yajur Veda, the SƒÅma Veda, and the Atharva Veda.

original: grub mtha' ni mu stegs kyi 'dod pa ste rnying ba la sogs pa dang / nyan thos kyi sde snod kyi mdo sde la sogs pa ste yang srid kyi mthar byed par 'dis 'gyur pas so //
analyzed: grub mtha' ni mu stegs kyi 'dod pa ste rnying ba la sogs pa dang / nyan thos kyi sde snod kyi mdo sde la sogs pa ste yang srid kyi mthar byed par 'dis 'gyur pas so //
translated: The philosophical systems are the assertions of the tƒ´rthikas, such as the ƒÄjƒ´vikas, and the scriptures of the ≈õrƒÅvakas, such as the s≈´tras, because they lead to the end of rebirth.

original: las rgyas ni bya ba'i rgyud la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: las rgyas ni bya ba'i rgyud la sogs pa'o //
translated: The tantras of action are the tantras of action, and so on.

original: 'di dag la bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi dngos grub yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di dag la bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi dngos grub yod pa ma yin no //
translated: There is no spiritual power that has the characteristics of an explanation in these.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa la yod dam 'o na te med ce na /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa la yod dam 'o na te med ce na /
translated: If you ask, ‚ÄúIs it in the vehicle of the perfections or not?‚Äù

original: srid pa dag 'gyur zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: srid pa dag 'gyur zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: He says, ‚ÄúIt is in the pure,‚Äù and so on.

original: dag pa ni 'dis nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa zad par byed pas na dag pa ste /
analyzed: dag pa ni 'dis nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa zad par byed pas na dag pa ste /
translated: Pure means that it is pure because it eliminates the afflictive obstructions and the obstructions to omniscience.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi mtshan nyid can gyi lam mo //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi mtshan nyid can gyi lam mo //
translated: The path is characterized by the six perfections.

original: dag pa des byang chub thob par 'gyur te /
analyzed: dag pa des byang chub thob par 'gyur te /
translated: By that purity, one attains enlightenment.

original: 'on kyang srid mthar zhes bya ba bskal ba grangs med pa gsum du skye ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud par zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'on kyang srid mthar zhes bya ba bskal ba grangs med pa gsum du skye ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud par zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: However, the end of existence is the continuation of one birth after another for three incalculable aeons.

original: gal te rnal 'byor gyi rgyud du yang tshe 'di la byang chub thob par gsungs na /
analyzed: gal te rnal 'byor gyi rgyud du yang tshe 'di la byang chub thob par gsungs na /
translated: If enlightenment is attained in this life even in the Yoga Tantra,

original: de las ci yis lhag par 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de las ci yis lhag par 'gyur zhe na /
translated: what is superior about that?

original: de med pas kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de med pas kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: It is said, Even without that, etc.

original: de zhes bya ba rang reg ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi lhan cig skyes pa med na skye ba 'di'am skye ba gzhan dag la yang dngos grub yod par ma gsungs so //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba rang reg ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi lhan cig skyes pa med na skye ba 'di'am skye ba gzhan dag la yang dngos grub yod par ma gsungs so //
translated: If there is no that, i.e., the innate characterized by self-contact, then even in this life or in other lives, there is no mention of success.

original: de ltar na de dang 'di la khyad par ci yod ce na /
analyzed: de ltar na de dang 'di la khyad par ci yod ce na /
translated: If that is so, what is the difference between that and this?

original: gang gis mi shes dgyes ba rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: gang gis mi shes dgyes ba rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: It is said, He who does not know Hevajra, etc.

original: rgyud gzhan las ni lhan cig skyes pa bstan pa tsam zhig tu zad la /
analyzed: rgyud gzhan las ni lhan cig skyes pa bstan pa tsam zhig tu zad la /
translated: In other tantras, the connate is taught only in brief.

original: dgyes pa'i rdo rje 'di las ni yongs su gsal ba'i rnam pa gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dgyes pa'i rdo rje 'di las ni yongs su gsal ba'i rnam pa gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: But in this Vajra of Delight, it is taught in a very clear way.üîΩTherefore, for one who does not know the Vajra of Delight, the hardships of listening, reflecting, and meditating are pointless.

original: de'i phyir gang gis dgyes pa'i rdo rje mi shes pa de'i thos pa dang bsam pa dang bsgom pa'i ngal ba don med par 'gyur ro zhes shin tu gsal bar bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir gang gis dgyes pa'i rdo rje mi shes pa de'i thos pa dang bsam pa dang bsgom pa'i ngal ba don med par 'gyur ro zhes shin tu gsal bar bstan pa yin no //
translated: Thus it is taught very clearly.

original: gal te byang @28b chub ni rnyed par dka' ba yin na /
analyzed: gal te byang @28b chub ni rnyed par dka' ba yin na /
translated: If enlightenment is difficult to attain,

original: skye ba 'di la ji ltar thob par 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: skye ba 'di la ji ltar thob par 'gyur zhe na /
translated: how can it be attained in this life?

original: chu bo'i rgyun zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: chu bo'i rgyun zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: The reply is given in the line beginning ‚Äúlike the flow of a river,‚Äù and so on.

original: chu bo'i rgyun ni chu rgyun 'bab pa ste de bzhin du rgyun mi 'chad pa'o //
analyzed: chu bo'i rgyun ni chu rgyun 'bab pa ste de bzhin du rgyun mi 'chad pa'o //
translated: The flow of a river is the flow of water, and it is uninterrupted.

original: mar me'i rtse mo ni mar me'i 'od kyi rtse mo ste de'i rgyun bzhin du'o //
analyzed: mar me'i rtse mo ni mar me'i 'od kyi rtse mo ste de'i rgyun bzhin du'o //
translated: The tip of a flame is the tip of the light of a lamp, and it is like the flow of that.

original: rtag tu mi rgyun mi 'chad par ro ;
analyzed: rtag tu mi rgyun mi 'chad par ro ;
translated: Always means uninterruptedly.

original: / de nyid rnal 'byor ni lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i rnal 'byor te /
analyzed: / de nyid rnal 'byor ni lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i rnal 'byor te /
translated: The yoga of that is the yoga of innate joy.

original: des nyin mtshan du gnas par bya ba'o //
analyzed: des nyin mtshan du gnas par bya ba'o //
translated: One should abide in that day and night.

original: nges par de ltar gnas par gyur na tshe 'di nyid la byang chub 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //

original: rnal 'byor ma ni bdag med ma la sogs pa'o //

original: de gsal bar byed pa'i le'u la yang de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de gsal bar byed pa'i le'u la yang de skad ces bya'o //

original: dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i dka' 'grel rnal 'byor rin po che'i phreng ba las le'u brgyad pa'i 'grel ba'o /

original: // / rnam par dag pa'i le'u zhes bya ba la 'dis rnam par dag par byed pas na rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: // / rnam par dag pa'i le'u zhes bya ba la 'dis rnam par dag par byed pas na rnam par dag pa ste /

original: gang gis srid pa thams cad skyon dang bral bar 'gyur ba de ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: gang gis srid pa thams cad skyon dang bral bar 'gyur ba de ni rnam par dag pa'o //

original: de gsal bar byed pa'i le'u la yang rnam par dag pa'i le'u zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de gsal bar byed pa'i le'u la yang rnam par dag pa'i le'u zhes bya ba'o //

original: dngos po thams cad la khyab pa ni rnam par dag pa ste /

original: 'gro ba ni brtan pa dang g-yo ba'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba ni brtan pa dang g-yo ba'o //

analyzed: mig ces bya ba la sogs pa la gzung bar bya zhes bya ba ni / yongs su spyad par bya ba'o //

analyzed: thob par zhes bya ba ni gzung bar bya ba'o //

analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir de nyid rnal 'byor pas zhes gsungs pa yin no //

analyzed: dbang ldan du ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni phyi rol gyi rim pa nas brtsams pa'o //

analyzed: gal te nang gi rim par yang goo ri'i brjod pa ma yin nam /

analyzed: yang 'di dag gi rnam par dag pa ni ma bstan pa de bstan pa'i phyir /

original: gzugs la goo r'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: gzugs la goo r'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /

analyzed: de nyid rnal 'byor pas zhes bya ba lha'i de kho na nyid kyi rnal 'byor pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe yogin of reality‚Äù is the yogin of the reality of the deity.

original: phyag gi zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni dgyes pa'i rdo rje phyag bcu drug @29b pa'i phyag rnams kyi rnam par dag pa gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: phyag gi zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni dgyes pa'i rdo rje phyag bcu drug @29b pa'i phyag rnams kyi rnam par dag pa gsungs pa yin te /

analyzed: phyag bcu drug po rnams kyi de kho na nyid ni stong pa nyid bcu drug ste /

original: 'di lta ste nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: 'di lta ste nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
translated: They are as follows: inner emptiness, outer emptiness, inner-outer emptiness, great emptiness, emptiness of emptiness, emptiness of the ultimate, emptiness of the conditioned,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /
translated: The emptiness of the compounded, the emptiness of the uncompounded, the emptiness of what is beyond extremes, the emptiness of what is without beginning or end, the emptiness of what is not to be discarded, the emptiness of the intrinsic nature, the emptiness of what is not lost,

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid de 'di dag kho na phyag tu byas pa'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid de 'di dag kho na phyag tu byas pa'o //
translated: the emptiness of all things, the emptiness of what is not existent, and the emptiness of what has no intrinsic nature.

original: zhabs rnams ni bdud rnams bcom pa'i rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: zhabs rnams ni bdud rnams bcom pa'i rnam par dag pa ste /

original: phung po'i bdud dang / nyon mongs pa'i bdud dang / 'chi bdag gi bdud dang / lha'i bu ba'i 'dud ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: phung po'i bdud dang / nyon mongs pa'i bdud dang / 'chi bdag gi bdud dang / lha'i bu ba'i 'dud ces bya ba'o //

analyzed: zhal rnams zhes bya ba ni zhal rnams so //

analyzed: rdo rje gsum zhes bya ba ni sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'o //

analyzed: sa ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni sa la sogs pa rnams kyi rnam par dag pa bstan te /

original: pukka s'i la sogs pa'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: pukka s'i la sogs pa'o zhes bya ba'i don to //

original: 'dis ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: 'dis ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /

original: phung po zhes bya ba ni phung po la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: phung po zhes bya ba ni phung po la sogs pa'o //

original: de ltar re zhig bskyed pa'i rim pa'i phyogs kyi rnam par dag pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar re zhig bskyed pa'i rim pa'i phyogs kyi rnam par dag pa bstan nas /

analyzed: yang rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i phyogs la de nyid ro gcig pa'i rnam par dag pa stan pa'i phyir /

original: gang dang gang gis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: gang dang gang gis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: he says ‚Äúwhatever‚Äù and so forth.

original: gzugs la sogs pa gang gis 'jig rten 'ching bar 'gyur ba de nyid kyis bdag nyid grol bar bya'o //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa gang gis 'jig rten 'ching bar 'gyur ba de nyid kyis bdag nyid grol bar bya'o //
translated: Whatever forms, etc., bind the world, by that very thing one should liberate oneself.

analyzed: lha'i rnam pa'i bsgom pa yang mi bya'o //
translated: One should not cultivate the deity‚Äôs form.

analyzed: gal te de dang des grol bar 'gyur ba nyid yin na 'jig rten na bcings pa nyid du 'gyur ba ji lta bu zhe na /

analyzed: 'jig rten rnams rmongs par gyur pas de nyid las 'di bden pa la mngon par zhen pa nyid kyis de nyid mi shes pa ste /

analyzed: de rnams kyi ma skyes pa'i de kho na nyid de ma rtogs pa'o //

analyzed: de nyid rnam spang zhes bya ba ni skye ba med pa'i bsgom pa dang bral ba zhes so //

original: dngos grub ni rdo rje 'chang gi go 'phang ste /
analyzed: dngos grub ni rdo rje 'chang gi go 'phang ste /

original: rnyed par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: rnyed par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o //

original: thams cad rnam par dag ces pa ni 'gro ba thams cad rnam par dag pa'o //

original: rnam par dag ces bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: rnam par dag ces bya ba gsungs te /

original: chos thams cad kyi stong pa nyid kyi rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi stong pa nyid kyi rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: the purification of the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: de'i phyir rang bzhin dag pa'i 'gro la zhes so //
analyzed: de'i phyir rang bzhin dag pa'i 'gro la zhes so //

original: yang de lta bu sus shes sha na /
analyzed: yang de lta bu sus shes sha na /
translated: Now, who knows it in that way?

original: 'gro bar zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: 'gro bar zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: He says, ‚Äúin the world,‚Äù

original: shes par gyur na zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: shes par gyur na zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: meaning ‚Äúif one knows it.‚Äù

original: dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i dka' 'grel rnal 'byor rin po che'i phreng ba las rnam par dag pa'i le'u'i 'grel pa ste dgu pa'o /

analyzed: // / da ni slob ma mngon par dbang bskur ba sbyin par bya ba yin la /
translated: Now, the consecration of the disciple is to be given,

analyzed: de yang bris pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid du sbyin pa yin pas /
translated: and that is to be given in the very drawn ma·πá·∏çala.

The special joy is the joy of the union of the two organs, characterized by the consecration of the two organs.üîΩ The twelfth and so forth. The special joy is the joy of the union of the two organs, characterized by the consecration of the two organs.üîΩ The thirteenth and so forth. The special joy is the joy of the union of the two organs, characterized by the consecration of the two organs.

original: bzhi pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: bzhi pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The fourteenth and so forth. The special joy is the joy of the union of the two organs, characterized by the consecration of the two organs.üîΩ The fifteenth and so forth. The special joy is the joy of the union of the two organs,

original: bzhi pa ni dbang bskur ba bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: bzhi pa ni dbang bskur ba bzhi pa'o //
translated: The fourth is the fourth consecration.

original: lhan cig skyes pa zhes bya ba ni mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid yang dag par rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa zhes bya ba ni mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid yang dag par rtogs pa'o //
translated: The innate is the realization of the nature of the realm of nirvana that does not abide.

original: de lta bu'i lhan cig skyes pa nyid ro mnyam zhes bya ba'i sgra dang skad cig ma'i dbye bas slob ma'i spyod yul du nges par bstan pa na /
analyzed: de lta bu'i lhan cig skyes pa nyid ro mnyam zhes bya ba'i sgra dang skad cig ma'i dbye bas slob ma'i spyod yul du nges par bstan pa na /
translated: When such an innate nature is taught to be of the same taste, by the word sound and the division of moments, in the domain of experience of the disciple,

original: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'khor gang dag gis yongs su bskor ba brjod par 'dod nas /
analyzed: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'khor gang dag gis yongs su bskor ba brjod par 'dod nas /
translated: at that time, the BhagavƒÅn, desiring to speak of the retinue by which he is surrounded,

original: sdud pa pos de skad ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: sdud pa pos de skad ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: the compiler says thus, and so on.

original: ngo mtshar zhes bya ba ni rmad du byung ba rtogs par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: ngo mtshar zhes bya ba ni rmad du byung ba rtogs par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The wonder is the realization of the marvelous.

original: sa zhes bya ba ni sa'o //
analyzed: sa zhes bya ba ni sa'o //
translated: The earth is the ground.

original: ci'i phyir 'gyel bar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir 'gyel bar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: Why does it shake?

original: dang por zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: dang por zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: He says first, and so on.

original: 'gro ba'i gzugs zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba rnams kyi rigs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i gzugs zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba rnams kyi rigs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The forms of beings are the very types of beings.

original: mchog dga' 'gro ba nyid ces bya ba ni lam gyi ngo bo nyid kyis kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mchog dga' 'gro ba nyid ces bya ba ni lam gyi ngo bo nyid kyis kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The supreme joy is the movement itself, because it is the nature of the relative truth by the nature of the path.

original: de bzhin zhes bya ba'i don to //üîΩgang yang dga' bral gyi dga' ba'i ngo bo zhes grags pa de yang shin tu phra ba rang gi @32a * //
analyzed: de bzhin zhes bya ba'i don to // gang yang dga' bral gyi dga' ba'i ngo bo zhes grags pa de yang shin tu phra ba rang gi @32a * //
translated: This is the meaning of ‚Äúthus.‚Äù

original: sems kyis so sor rig par bya ba'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: sems kyis so sor rig par bya ba'i ngo bo'o //
translated: Also, that which is renowned as the essence of the joy of separation is the essence that is extremely subtle and is to be individually cognized by one‚Äôs mind.

original: de yang 'gro ba nyid yin te /
analyzed: de yang 'gro ba nyid yin te /
translated: That is also the movement itself,

original: kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyis te de yang sems tsam nyid yin pas kun rdzob kyi bden par bsdus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyis te de yang sems tsam nyid yin pas kun rdzob kyi bden par bsdus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the nature of the relative truth, and that is also mind only, because it is included in the relative truth.

original: nyid ces bya ba ni nges par gzung par bya bar blta'o //
analyzed: nyid ces bya ba ni nges par gzung par bya bar blta'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúitself‚Äù should be understood as a specification.

original: gsum char yang 'jig rten pa'i 'gro bas rig par 'gyur ba yin pas 'gro ba zhes bya bar brjod do //üîΩgsum la lhan cig skyes pa med //
analyzed: gsum char yang 'jig rten pa'i 'gro bas rig par 'gyur ba yin pas 'gro ba zhes bya bar brjod do // gsum la lhan cig skyes pa med //
translated: Since all three are known by the movement of the world, they are called ‚Äúmovement.‚ÄùüîΩThe three do not have connate joy.

original: ces bya ba ni gsum po 'di dag la lhan cig skyes pa yod pa ma yin zhing /
analyzed: ces bya ba ni gsum po 'di dag la lhan cig skyes pa yod pa ma yin zhing /
translated: The three do not have connate joy.

original: yang dag par rigs pa yang med pa nyid de /
analyzed: yang dag par rigs pa yang med pa nyid de /
translated: and there is no such thing as a correct principle.üîΩThe meaning is that they are devoid of characteristics.

original: mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don to zhes bya ba ni sdud pa po'i tshig yin te /
analyzed: mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don to zhes bya ba ni sdud pa po'i tshig yin te /
translated: This is the statement of the compiler.

original: yongs su rdzogs zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: yongs su rdzogs zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is complete.

original: de lta bur gyur pas ngo mtshar skyes par 'gyur ro zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de lta bur gyur pas ngo mtshar skyes par 'gyur ro zhes bya'o //
translated: One who is like that will be amazed.

original: bcom ldan bka' stsal zhes bya ba ni sdud pa po'i tshig go //
analyzed: bcom ldan bka' stsal zhes bya ba ni sdud pa po'i tshig go //
translated: The statement of the compiler.

original: sangs rgyas kun dang lhan cig gnyis su med bar gyur pa'i sku ni sku gcig bu'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun dang lhan cig gnyis su med bar gyur pa'i sku ni sku gcig bu'o //
translated: The body that is nondual with all the buddhas is the one body.

original: 'dis the tshom nges par sel bar byed pas na the tshom legs par sel ba'o //
analyzed: 'dis the tshom nges par sel bar byed pas na the tshom legs par sel ba'o //
translated: Since this removes doubts, it is the excellent removal of doubt.

original: bzang po zhes bya ba ni gtso bo'o //
analyzed: bzang po zhes bya ba ni gtso bo'o //
translated: The good is the principal.

original: rtogs pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni rab tu bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtogs pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni rab tu bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: In order to realize, means in order to accomplish.

original: 'do chags med cing zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'dod chags ni mchog tu dga' ba'o //
analyzed: 'do chags med cing zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'dod chags ni mchog tu dga' ba'o //
translated: As for without passion, etc. , passion is supreme joy.

original: chags bral ni dga' bral gyi dga' ba'o //
analyzed: chags bral ni dga' bral gyi dga' ba'o //
translated: Freedom from passion is the joy of freedom from joy.

original: dbu ma zhes bya ba ni dang po'i dga' ba'o //
analyzed: dbu ma zhes bya ba ni dang po'i dga' ba'o //
translated: The middle is the first joy.

original: gsum po 'di dag ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi ngo bor dmigs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gsum po 'di dag ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi ngo bor dmigs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: These three are not perceived as the nature of perfect complete enlightenment.

original: gsum po zhes bya ba ni gsum po de dag go //
analyzed: gsum po zhes bya ba ni gsum po de dag go //
translated: The three are those three.

original: spangs pa ni tha dad du byas pa'o //
analyzed: spangs pa ni tha dad du byas pa'o //
translated: Abandonment is made distinct.

original: lhan cig skyes pa zhes bya ba ni lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'o //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa zhes bya ba ni lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'o //
translated: The innate is the innate joy.

original: byang chub ces bya ba ni rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: byang chub ces bya ba ni rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Enlightenment is the cause of perfect enlightenment.

original: 'dod chags zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags la dmigs pa'i phyir 'dod chags te /
analyzed: 'dod chags zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags la dmigs pa'i phyir 'dod chags te /
translated: Passion is passion because it is the object of passion.

original: dbang bskur dang po'o //
analyzed: dbang bskur dang po'o //
translated: The first consecration.

original: chags bral ni khyad par can gyi bde ba la dmigs pa'i phyir dbang bskur ba gsum mo //
analyzed: chags bral ni khyad par can gyi bde ba la dmigs pa'i phyir dbang bskur ba gsum mo //
translated: Passionless is the third consecration because it is the object of special bliss.

original: dbu ma ni de dag gi bar na gnas par gyur pa ste /
analyzed: dbu ma ni de dag gi bar na gnas par gyur pa ste /
translated: The middle is located between those two.

original: gnyis gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'o //
analyzed: gnyis gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'o //
translated: The secret consecration.

original: dmigs par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi de ma thag pa'i rkyen gyi ngo bo nyid ma yin pa'i @32b phyir ro //üîΩde'i phyir / gsum po spangs pa nyid kyi phyir //
analyzed: dmigs par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi de ma thag pa'i rkyen gyi ngo bo nyid ma yin pa'i @32b phyir ro // de'i phyir / gsum po spangs pa nyid kyi phyir //
translated: It is not an object means that it is not the nature of the immediate condition of perfect complete enlightenment.üîΩTherefore, it is said:

original: zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Because the three are abandoned.

original: lhan cig skyes pa zhes bya ba lhan cig skyes pa'i don gyi dbang bskur ba la lhan cig skyes pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa zhes bya ba lhan cig skyes pa'i don gyi dbang bskur ba la lhan cig skyes pa zhes bya ste /
translated: Coemergent means that which is called coemergent is the consecration of the meaning of coemergence.

original: bzhi ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bzhi ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of the fourth isüîΩenlightenment.

original: byang chub brjod ces bya ba ni rgyu la 'bras bu btags pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub brjod ces bya ba ni rgyu la 'bras bu btags pa'o //
translated: Enlightenment is the name of the cause.

original: gal te dbang bskur ba'i khyad par gzhan la yang ci'i phyir brjod par mi bya zhe na /
analyzed: gal te dbang bskur ba'i khyad par gzhan la yang ci'i phyir brjod par mi bya zhe na /
translated: If it is asked why the other distinctions of consecration are not mentioned,

original: rgyu yi rgyu nyid yin pa'i phyir //
analyzed: rgyu yi rgyu nyid yin pa'i phyir //
translated: it is because it is the cause of the cause.

original: zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o //
translated: That is the intention.

original: de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Therefore,üîΩit is said:

original: dga' ba gsum po rnam par spangs //üîΩzhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: dga' ba gsum po rnam par spangs //üîΩzhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Abandon the three joys.

original: gal te gzhan dag la thams cad du de yod pa ma yin na lhan cig skyes pa zhes bya ba khyab pa po nyid du mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: gal te gzhan dag la thams cad du de yod pa ma yin na lhan cig skyes pa zhes bya ba khyab pa po nyid du mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If it does not exist everywhere in others, then the so-called innate would not be the pervader.

original: de'i phyir rgyu'i gtso bo nyid yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i phyir rgyu'i gtso bo nyid yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, because it is the principal cause,

original: lhan cig skyes pa la rdzogs pa'i byang chub ces brjod do //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa la rdzogs pa'i byang chub ces brjod do //
translated: the innate is called perfect enlightenment.

original: da ni yang bstan par gyur pa'i lhan cig skyes pa nyid gsal por bstan pa'i phyir /üîΩde yang dga' bral dang por mtshon //
analyzed: da ni yang bstan par gyur pa'i lhan cig skyes pa nyid gsal por bstan pa'i phyir / de yang dga' bral dang por mtshon //
translated: Now, in order to clearly teach the innate that has been taught,üîΩhe says,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: That is also indicated as the first separation from joy.

original: dga' bral gyi dang po zhes bya ba de mchog tu dga' ba yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: dga' bral gyi dang po zhes bya ba de mchog tu dga' ba yin nam zhe na /
translated: Here, the first separation from joy is the supreme joy, one might ask.

original: de ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach that it is not,üîΩhe says,

original: dga' ba gsum po rnam par spangs //üîΩzhes gsungs te /
analyzed: dga' ba gsum po rnam par spangs // zhes gsungs te /
translated: Abandoning the three joys.

original: shugs kyis na mchog tu dga' ba'i phyi ma zhes bya bar bstan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: shugs kyis na mchog tu dga' ba'i phyi ma zhes bya bar bstan par 'gyur ro //
translated: By implication, it is taught that it is the subsequent to the supreme joy.

original: de yang le'u gsum pa las //
analyzed: de yang le'u gsum pa las //
translated: Moreover, in the third chapter it is said:

original: lhan cig skyes dga'i rang bzhin bdag / mchog mtha' dga' bral dang por ni //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes dga'i rang bzhin bdag / mchog mtha' dga' bral dang por ni //
translated: the supreme, the first separation from joy.

original: zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin no //
translated: This is what is said.

original: bshad pa gcig yin no //
analyzed: bshad pa gcig yin no //
translated: There is one explanation.üîΩThe first separation from joy is indicated,

original: dga' bral dang po mtshon zhes bya ba ni dbang bskur ba gsum pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: dga' bral dang po mtshon zhes bya ba ni dbang bskur ba gsum pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: that is, the third consecration, and so on.

original: mtshon zhes bya ba ni ji ltar rigs par bya'o //
analyzed: mtshon zhes bya ba ni ji ltar rigs par bya'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúindicated‚Äù means that it should be understood as appropriate.

original: khyad par ji lta bu zhig ce na /
analyzed: khyad par ji lta bu zhig ce na /
translated: What kind of distinction?

original: dga' ba gsum po rnams par spangs //
analyzed: dga' ba gsum po rnams par spangs //
translated: The three joys are abandoned.

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: This is what is said.

original: dga' ba dang mchog dga' dang dga' bral spangs pa ste /
analyzed: dga' ba dang mchog dga' dang dga' bral spangs pa ste /
translated: The joy, supreme joy, and separation from joy are abandoned.

original: 'di ni mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i ngo bo nyid yin pas ngo bo nyid gzhan yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ni mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i ngo bo nyid yin pas ngo bo nyid gzhan yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is another nature, because it is the nature free from characteristics.

original: de ltar yang dag par mtshon nas man ngag gis lhan cig skyes pa bsgom pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa gang yin pa de bstan pa ni sprin lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / rmi lam lta bu dang / rmi lam sad pa'o zhes gsungs te /üîΩdang bor zhes bya ba ni goms par byed @33a * //
analyzed: de ltar yang dag par mtshon nas man ngag gis lhan cig skyes pa bsgom pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa gang yin pa de bstan pa ni sprin lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / rmi lam lta bu dang / rmi lam sad pa'o zhes gsungs te / dang bor zhes bya ba ni goms par byed @33a * //
translated: Thus, having indicated the reality, he teaches what is born from the samadhi of the meditation on the innate, by the instruction, like a cloud, like an illusion, like a dream, like the waking from a dream.

original: pa'i dus su'o //
analyzed: pa'i dus su'o //
translated: At first, means at the time of practice.

original: ji ltar sprin dang 'dra zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar sprin dang 'dra zhe na /
translated: How is it like a cloud?

original: sprin srab mos g-yogs pa'i zla ba nya ba ltar mi gsal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sprin srab mos g-yogs pa'i zla ba nya ba ltar mi gsal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not clear, like the full moon covered by a thin cloud.

original: ji ltar sgyu ma lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar sgyu ma lta bu zhe na /
translated: How is it like an illusion?

original: gang gi tshe mngon sum du gyur pa'i tshe grub pa zhes bya ba bde ba chen po'i ros nges par bsgos pas 'gro ba rnams sgyu ma bzhin du mthong ngo //
analyzed: gang gi tshe mngon sum du gyur pa'i tshe grub pa zhes bya ba bde ba chen po'i ros nges par bsgos pas 'gro ba rnams sgyu ma bzhin du mthong ngo //
translated: When it becomes manifest, it is called accomplished, because beings are seen as illusions, by the definite anointing with the flavor of the great bliss.

original: phyi nas zhes bya ba ni de'i rjes la rmi lam dang 'dra ba'o //
analyzed: phyi nas zhes bya ba ni de'i rjes la rmi lam dang 'dra ba'o //
translated: Afterwards, means after that, it is like a dream.

original: ji ltar rmi lam dang 'dra zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar rmi lam dang 'dra zhe na /
translated: How is it like a dream?

original: bdag dang gzhan du mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bdag dang gzhan du mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because one does not observe a self and other.

original: de nas ni rmi lam dang sad pa lta bu ste /
analyzed: de nas ni rmi lam dang sad pa lta bu ste /
translated: Then, it is like a dream and waking,

original: sad pa dang rmi lam gyi gnas skabs la dbye ba med par rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sad pa dang rmi lam gyi gnas skabs la dbye ba med par rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because one is always equipoised, without a distinction between the states of waking and dreaming.

original: de ltar ting nge 'dzin bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i rnal 'byor pa ci ltar 'grub par 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar ting nge 'dzin bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i rnal 'byor pa ci ltar 'grub par 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How does the yogi/nƒ´ who is thus perfecting the four meditative stabilizations become accomplished?

original: mi phyed mtshan nyid ma grub pa //
analyzed: mi phyed mtshan nyid ma grub pa //
translated: The non-differentiated, the unestablished defining characteristic,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: and so forth are stated.

original: gzugs la sogs pa'i dbye ba med pas mi phyed pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa'i dbye ba med pas mi phyed pa'o //
translated: It is non-differentiated because there is no differentiation of form and so forth.

original: dbye ba med pa ji lta bu zhe na ;
analyzed: dbye ba med pa ji lta bu zhe na ;
translated: How is it non-differentiated?

original: mtshan nyid ma grub pa'i phyir dbye ba med pa'o //
analyzed: mtshan nyid ma grub pa'i phyir dbye ba med pa'o //
translated: It is non-differentiated because the defining characteristic is not established.

original: 'dis mtshon par byed pas na mtshan nyid de rang bzhin no //
analyzed: 'dis mtshon par byed pas na mtshan nyid de rang bzhin no //
translated: The defining characteristic is the nature because it is that which defines.

original: de ma grub pa ni dngos po thams cad bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin nyid kyis rang bzhin med par byas pa'o //
analyzed: de ma grub pa ni dngos po thams cad bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin nyid kyis rang bzhin med par byas pa'o //
translated: The non-establishment of that is the non-existence of all things, which is made non-existent by the nature of great bliss.

original: phyag rgya rnal 'byor zhes bya ba //
analyzed: phyag rgya rnal 'byor zhes bya ba //
translated: The yoga of the seal is

original: phyag rgya chen po'i rnal 'byor te ;
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po'i rnal 'byor te ;
translated: The yoga of the great seal.

original: /'grub par 'gyur ba'i zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: /'grub par 'gyur ba'i zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúis accomplished‚Äù is understood.

original: nyid ces bya ba ni de lta bu'i phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub ni dbang bskur ba med na 'byung bar mi 'gyur bas dbang bskur ba sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: nyid ces bya ba ni de lta bu'i phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub ni dbang bskur ba med na 'byung bar mi 'gyur bas dbang bskur ba sbyin par bya'o //
translated: ‚Äú Itself‚Äù means that the power of the great seal does not arise without initiation, therefore, initiation should be given.

original: de'i phyir ston pa zhes bya ba rdo rje 'chang gis de'i ched du dkyil 'khor gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir ston pa zhes bya ba rdo rje 'chang gis de'i ched du dkyil 'khor gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the teacher, that is, Vajradhara, taught the mandala for that purpose.

original: yang dag 'bar ba zhes bya ba ni rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag 'bar ba zhes bya ba ni rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'o //
translated: ‚Äú Perfectly blazing‚Äù means adorned with various jewels.

original: sna tshogs rnga yab ces bya ba ni rgyan sna tshogs can gyi rnga yab dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: sna tshogs rnga yab ces bya ba ni rgyan sna tshogs can gyi rnga yab dang ldan pa'o //
translated: ‚Äú Various chowries‚Äù means having various ornaments and chowries.

original: mgrin pa gos kyis bkab pa dang // zhes bya ba ni gos sar pas mgul pa bcings pa'o //
analyzed: mgrin pa gos kyis bkab pa dang // zhes bya ba ni gos sar pas mgul pa bcings pa'o //
translated: ‚Äú The neck covered with cloth‚Äù means the neck bound with a new cloth.

original: rin chen lnga ni bye ru dang mu tig dang mu men dang gser dang dngul lo //
analyzed: rin chen lnga ni bye ru dang mu tig dang mu men dang gser dang dngul lo //

original: gzhag ces bya ba ni gzhag par bya ba'o //
analyzed: gzhag ces bya ba ni gzhag par bya ba'o //

original: dkyil 'khor bdag po zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sngon gyi bsnyen pa gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor bdag po zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sngon gyi bsnyen pa gsungs pa yin no //
translated: The lord of the ma·πá·∏çala and so forth teaches the prior service.

original: gang du zhes bya ba ni sa sbyang ba'i yang sngon du'o //
analyzed: gang du zhes bya ba ni sa sbyang ba'i yang sngon du'o //
translated: Where is also prior to the purification of the ground.

original: aa sogs sngags kyis zhes bya ba ni aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a n'am a'adya nutpan @33b na tv'a ta aom a'a: h'um phat sv'a h'a zhes bya ba'o //

original: mchod dang gsol ba gdab pa zhes bya ba ni bla ma la'o //
analyzed: mchod dang gsol ba gdab pa zhes bya ba ni bla ma la'o //
translated: Worship and supplication is to the guru.

original: ji ltar bshad pa de bzhin zhas bya ba ni de kho na nyid bsdus pa la sogs par ro //
analyzed: ji ltar bshad pa de bzhin zhas bya ba ni de kho na nyid bsdus pa la sogs par ro //
translated: Just as it is explained is in the Compendium of Principles and so forth.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni dgyes pa'i rdo rje'o //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni dgyes pa'i rdo rje'o //
translated: Vajrasattva is Hevajra.

original: phyi nas zhes bya ba ni dbang bskur ba'i rjes thogs su'o //
analyzed: phyi nas zhes bya ba ni dbang bskur ba'i rjes thogs su'o //
translated: Afterwards is after the initiation.

original: rnam dag ni 'khor ba pa'i skyon dag pa'o //
analyzed: rnam dag ni 'khor ba pa'i skyon dag pa'o //
translated: Pure is pure of the faults of cyclic existence.

original: ye shes gzugs can ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang mnyam pa'o //
analyzed: ye shes gzugs can ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang mnyam pa'o //
translated: Wisdom form is the wisdom of omniscience.

original: 'khor ba dang ni rnam byang dag / ces bya ba ni ye shes gang la srid pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa dag khyad par cung zad kyang med pa zhes bya ba ni lhag pa ste /
analyzed: 'khor ba dang ni rnam byang dag / ces bya ba ni ye shes gang la srid pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa dag khyad par cung zad kyang med pa zhes bya ba ni lhag pa ste /
translated: The meaning is that in this wisdom, samsara and nirvana are not different in the slightest way.

original: spros pa thams cad las shin tu 'das pa'i phyir zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: spros pa thams cad las shin tu 'das pa'i phyir zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: It is thought that this is because it is completely beyond all conceptual elaboration.

original: 'di nyid ni mchog dgar zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis gsal bar ston par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di nyid ni mchog dgar zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis gsal bar ston par 'gyur ro //
translated: This is clarified by two verses beginning with ‚Äúsupreme joy.‚Äù

original: mchog dga' ni mchog tu gyur pa'i shes rab ste 'od gsal ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi ye shes so //üîΩder ni sgom pa med ces bya ba bsgom par bya ba cung zhig kyang med pa'o //
analyzed: mchog dga' ni mchog tu gyur pa'i shes rab ste 'od gsal ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi ye shes so // der ni sgom pa med ces bya ba bsgom par bya ba cung zhig kyang med pa'o //
translated: Supreme joy is the supreme wisdom, which is the wisdom that has the characteristic of clear light.üîΩThere is no meditation there.

original: bsgom pa po ni sems te de yang med pa'o //
analyzed: bsgom pa po ni sems te de yang med pa'o //
translated: The meditator is the mind, and that also does not exist.

original: lus ni lus so //
analyzed: lus ni lus so //
translated: The body is the body.

original: gzung ba ni snang bar 'gyur ba'i dngos po'o //
analyzed: gzung ba ni snang bar 'gyur ba'i dngos po'o //
translated: The object is the thing that appears.

original: 'dzin pa ni mig la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'dzin pa ni mig la sogs pa'o //
translated: The subject is the eye, etc.

original: de bzhin du sha dang khrag la sogs pa yang med pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du sha dang khrag la sogs pa yang med pa'o //
translated: Likewise, flesh, blood, etc. do not exist.

original: de ltar nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa yod pa ma yin no zhes bya bar bsgrubs nas //
analyzed: de ltar nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa yod pa ma yin no zhes bya bar bsgrubs nas //
translated: Thus, having established that the afflictive obstructions do not exist,

original: shes bya'i sgrib pa yang yod pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir mthong ba med ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: shes bya'i sgrib pa yang yod pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir mthong ba med ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: in order to demonstrate that the obstructions to omniscience also do not exist, [the BhagavƒÅn] declares, ‚Äúno seeing,‚Äù and so on.

original: mthong bar bya ba la sogs pa'i phyi rol gyi dngos po yang yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: mthong bar bya ba la sogs pa'i phyi rol gyi dngos po yang yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that external things, such as the object of seeing, and so on, also do not exist.

original: rlabs med pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rlabs ni rnam par rtog pa'o //
analyzed: rlabs med pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rlabs ni rnam par rtog pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúFree from waves,‚Äù and so on. Waves are conceptualizations.

original: de zad par gyur pa ni rlabs med pa'o //
analyzed: de zad par gyur pa ni rlabs med pa'o //
translated: The exhaustion of those is being free from waves.

original: sna tshogs ni rnam pa sna tshogs su snang ba'o //
analyzed: sna tshogs ni rnam pa sna tshogs su snang ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúVarious‚Äù is the appearance of various aspects.

original: de med pa ni sna tshogs med pa'o //
analyzed: de med pa ni sna tshogs med pa'o //
translated: The absence of that is the absence of the various.

original: 'di skad ces bya ba ni 'di skad bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba'o //
analyzed: 'di skad ces bya ba ni 'di skad bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThus‚Äù means ‚Äúthus the BhagavƒÅn declared.‚Äù

original: gsol zhes bya ba ni rdo rje snying pos zhus par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: gsol zhes bya ba ni rdo rje snying pos zhus par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúSaid‚Äù means ‚Äúrequested by Vajragarbha.‚Äù
